story:
Pyramids are always alluring to the world & everyone admire and has a dream to see the Pyramids but not all have the opportunity fulfilled. We the team of six has made "AURA...the Magica," the unique tetrahedron shape Pyramids for admirers of these magnificent wonders of the World.
AURA... the Magica is a novel design concept conceived to achieve the feel of the textures of real Pyramids with Fusion of the Modern Art Designs & luminance. The radiance-less look or the basic look of the AURA... the Magica is similar to the pyramids as we have coated the body with the actual Sand Stone & Beach Stone granulates gathered from many rivers including the sacred "Ganges" River of INDIA to make it authentic. These mini pyramids will surely be the best collections of your Home, Office or Leisure places & viewers will be surprised to see the Magical illuminating designs emerging from a sand stone like structure, hence we named it "AURA...the Magica".
We have created "AURA...the Magica" in 5 sizes with 9 illuminating Designs & the smallest size "AURA...CUB" is available in one design only, rest all the 4 sizes are available in all the 8 designs. We proudly mention - AURA...the Magica is a pure Handmade work of ART, even the illuminating Designs are also rendered from the ancient art of Hand Block Printing by Rajasthani Artisans.


     

 
Inspired by the Pyramids, AURA...the Magica, brings 'Gleam &  Elegance into your life & Ambience. It's Design & Decor will turn your environment into a Radiant Magical World. This lamp will lightens up & gel flawlessly with your habitat, it can be placed on your Car Dashboard or as a decor in a Lobby of your Home, Hotel, Spa, Malls, Studios, Offices or any place needs a great Ambiance. Every AURA...the Magica is exceptional & is really a Wonder for your home & work places. Select the size & design that is perfect for your needs.

The 8 Designs


How AURA...the Magica is created - a brief experiance of our journey

Last year when we conceived the idea of making a Desk Lamp, the first thought was to create something unique that has the traditional value & Contemporary design but we never wanted to make a complex thing. After lots of research and experiments we decided to make a desk lamp as similar to Pyramids. We all know Pyramids has significance of Power, Knowledge, Design, Art & Perseverance. To make it more contemporary we changed the four sides to tetrahedron, the Triangle with all three sides and base of triangular shape.

The next was the looks, making it look as the real pyramid was quite a challenge. We don't wanted to make the steps at the exterior as it requires a larger area so we planed it to give the similar textures. Sand was the quickest remedy but it failed as it was difficult to match the granulates for each lamp & cleaning the sand for application was messy and not resulted as desirable so we concluded to make our own Sand with perfect granulates, Color shade & texture. Not every beach & sand stone is perfect to make sand texture similar to Great Pyramids, we thoroughly studied the colors, shades & granulates that matched the desired results. 

Our journey begins and after 5 months of tiring and rigorous travel to almost all the states in INDIA and collecting beach and sand stones from more than 38 rivers. With hundreds of experiments lastly we found our desired mix of stone granulates that gave us the textures closest to the Pyramids. The final granulates was a mix of seven river stones. The most amazing fact is the seven rivers stones we used was from the seven most sacred rivers of INDIA, The Ganga, Yamuna, Sarasvati, Godavari, Kaveri, Narmada & Shipra, we felt blessed and focused in completing the product. To add a shimmer effect to the texture we added a Natural Mica Stone  granulates found in state of Rajasthan to our sand mix.

To make it durable and sturdy we use the Polypropylene Thermo - Fibre Sheets as the basic body with MDF base and best class luminosity adjustable electronic devises with LED Bulbs. Its luminosity ranges from LUX1 to LUX5. The complete Lamp is coated with clear Non toxic latex coating. The "AURA" is born....


Everything was good enough to launch AURA to the world but we were not satisfied as there was something missing.... we promised ourselves to make it "NOVEL" the one of its kind like the Great Pyramids. We are creative people and wanted to create magic with the "AURA" making it more creative more beautiful and contemporary, Fusion of Magic was the answer, Fusion of "AURA" with Modern Art Graphic designs embedded within, which emerges only when the lamp is illuminated and the magic is created, so we named it "AURA...the Magica". The whole process of making "AURA....the Magica" is completely handmade .  

Exclusive Perks for  Admirers of "Aura...the Magica"

Schedule of Process


Lifelustres Design Studio


We are team of six creative people, Kishore & Vivek are Engineer brothers & consultants to the Construction Industry, Archana is a Fine Art graduate & a very Passionate Designer, Monica is a genius Interior Professional, Pari a Dentist by profession & an excellent painter. Shefali is a school Teacher & an explorer of places, we all are from different professions but our passion for creativity brought us together to form Lifelustres Design Studio.

At Lifelustres we are committed to develop designs & products that are Wonders. AURA... the Magica, is our first creation. We are passionate & confident about our idea & have a dream to see "Aura...the Magica"  in every Home & Heart on earth. To make this possible we need your support. For the last One year we all have put our everything in this project, studied the processes, materials, explored almost all the states of INDIA to identify the stuff required for this Lamp & sourced the suppliers for Raw Materials & Stone dealers of all the seven holy rivers. Arranged workshops to train the artisans to handcraft "Aura...the Magica". Now we are ready for production & needs funds to begin manufacturing of this Unique product. 

Lets be together to bring "AURA...the Magica" to life.


Risks and Challenges

Manufacturing

This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk we carefully select & train each artisan and always have a Plan B.  

Revision Process

We want your feedback! give us feedback on what you want to see changed. Each week we will review all your requests and post updates. Just let us know!

Shipping

We've given a conservative estimate for our delivery dates. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress both during and following our campaign. We assure you that we are all working very hard to produce a sensational product that not only arrives on time but is of optimum quality!

FAQ

1. Q: What are the features of Aura...the Magica ? 

     A: It's water resistant, heat resistant and shatter-proof.

2. Q: When will I receive my order?

     A: Aura...the Magica is a exclusive Handmade Craft so it takes time to produce               the perfect piece. The Early birds perks are expected in March 2016 & second             product shipment are expected in May 2016, as indicated in the campaign. 

3.Q: How do I select the Design I want to order on indiegogo? 

     A: Each supporter will receive an online questionnaire directly from us where you          will have a chance to choose your Design for AURA…the Magica and confirm                your shipping address. We will ask to reconfirm the shipping address 1 week                before the actual ship date of the lamps


 4. Q: Is Aura...the Magica topographically accurate?

     A: Aura...the Magica is a handcrafted product inspired by Great Pyramids, To                  make it more Creative & Contemporary we have changed its shape to                            Tetrahedron. It has its own artistic interpretation.

5. Q: What should I do if I’ve bought one Aura...the Magica and want to buy one                     more?

     A: Please simply contribute to one more perk. :)

6. Q: Do I get a discount on the price/shipping fee if I buy more than one                    Aura...the Magica?

     A: On the prices: The current prices of Aura...the Magica are already discounted             ones!

         On the shipping fee: Two Aura...the Magica doubles the volumetric weight, so              the shipping companies would charge twice. (I.e. no discount will be provided              by them)

7. Q: What color is the light of Aura...the Magica?

     A: It's close to a warm yellow light.

8. Q: What type of plug and voltage is it for Aura...the Magica?

     A: It's two-prong plug and 110V. Since the plug and voltage condition vary in                     different countries, please prepare your own plug adapter and converter if                    needed.

9. Q: How long is the cord of Aura...the Magica?

     A: It's 3 meters (approx - 10 feet) with the luminosity adjusting device.

10. Q: Why is the shipping fee expensive?

     A: Though Aura...the Magica is basically shatter proof and we made careful                       packaging, it is still considered fragile by courier companies. So it'll be charged           a higher shipping fee.

11. Q: Can we change the light bulb inside Aura...the Magica?

     A: Yes. You can remove the below lid and change the light bulb. But notice: we                don’t recommend changing light bulbs. Due to safety concerns, we made the               lid pretty sturdy.So if not necessary, don't change the light bulb.

12. Q: How can I clean Aura...the Magica?

     A: You can clean Aura...the Magica with a damp cloth.

13. Q: Is there a warranty on Aura...the Magica?

    A: Yes, we provide an one-year warranty. Under normal usage, if malfunction or              damage occurs, you can send Aura...the Magica back to us to get it repaired. 

14. Q: Which battery is used inside Aura...the Magica CUB (5.5" X 4.25")?

     A: Mercury batteries (LR41).

15. Q: Will Aura...the Magica be damaged in the shipment process?

     A: We’ve used careful packaging as a way of protection, so you don’t have to                     worry about it.

"Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

If you have any further questions please email : ceo.lifelustres@gmail.com

story:
Solid Titanium 

At Solid Titanium, we make awesome stuff out of rare metals. We are introducing Alpha: Solid Titanium Wolf Tooth Necklace - made of a single piece of 100% solid Titanium. Make the Alpha wolf your totem animal with this handmade piece of art.

The alpha wolf leads the pack by being not just the strongest and most clever, but also the most nurturing and caring.  ​

Is the Alpha necklace for you?

The main characteristic of an alpha wolf is a quiet confidence and self-assurance. You know what you need to do; you know what’s best for your pack without needing others' opinions. 

Alphas don't lead with noisy brashness and bared-teeth aggression, but rather steady strength, mettle, and heart. The alpha provides help to those in need and creates a nurturing environment. Being the alpha is a great responsibility. 

An alpha wolf protects his family and treats them with kindness, generosity, and love. And when his family is threatened, the alpha male will fiercely defend it - sometimes even sacrificing his own life.

What's so special about Titanium?

CNC milled from a single piece of solid Grade 1 Titanium, our Alpha Necklace is a subtle reminder of the alpha status you hold in your own pack. Grade 1 is the purest commercial type of Titanium giving the highest corrosion resistance.

  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body
  • The most hypoallergenic material know to human beings
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it 
  •  Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • Has the highest strength-to-weight ratio out of any metals 
  •  Durable, a true heirloom piece to last generations

Making the Alpha

The wolf tooth is a symbol of magic, courage, strength, lifetime loyalty, leadership, and wild charm. So we sketched our Solid Titanium Alpha with a design of alpha wolf tooth.

Cut from a single piece of solid Titanium. Highly polished by hand. To capture the essence of the alpha wolf we utilized a hand-hammered design.  

Highly polishing added an icy finish to recall the image of the harsh tundra. The alpha must endure a harsh environment and bring his pack through safely.

The hand-made pure titanium totem represents the strength and permanence of your alpha position. Tough titanium gets hammered by the elements but still retains its strength, poise and brilliance. 

Titanium will never rust or tarnish. Its excellent resistance to corrosion is nearly equivalent to platinum. Wear it and lead your pack. 

Take your totem with you anywhere and let your alpha wolf spirit guide you. 

The wolf's tooth totem also has traditions in good luck and warding off evil. 

Let Alpha give you courage and strength. 

The alpha pair set is available if you are lucky enough to be in an alpha pair. By virtue of their status in the pack, the alpha male and female pair mate for life. The mate pair shares in the responsibility of leading their family and tending to their pups. 

Like alpha wolves, take your role of alpha to tackle life's adventures with your mate, and lead your family with courage and strength. 

Action Shots

Direct Sunlight

White shirt, indirect sun with included black cord.

Grey shirt, room lighting with included black cord

Indirect natural lighting.

Specs

The alpha male sits at the top of the male hierarchy in the family, and the alpha female sits atop the female hierarchy in the family. Take your alpha pair and lead your pack together!

Male Alpha: 1.9 * 0.4 inches

Female Alpha: 1.6*0.32 inches

Includes black cord necklace with stainless clasp (50cm). Color-safe, hypoallergenic and super strong!

Make the wolf your totem animal with our Solid Titanium Alpha Necklace! Pledge now and help us bring the Solid Titanium Alpha Necklace to life!

Pledge now and help us bring the Solid Titanium Alpha Necklace to life!

story:
ORDER NEW PRINTS NOW

 

      

We wanted to create a product that would empower women to be active, and support their active lifestyles. Woman regularly change clothes in the wildest of places - fighting sports bras, sticky leggings, and wet shirts - forcing millions of us to change in cars, nasty restrooms, and towel changing in public, just so we can enjoy the activities we love. This is a real problem MILLIONS of women share!

With its patented features, you can change into, or out of, The Undress anywhere, in as little as 30 seconds. No privacy needed! It works so well, it even works to remove sports bras, and is great for big busted women.

How it works is simple - You can quickly change INTO OR OUT OF ANY OUTFIT, USING THE UNDRESS. 

  • Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra.
  • Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. Done!
Change into another outfit, such as your running clothes, by reversing the process. 
  • Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms.
  • Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers. 
  • Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!
      

The Undress is VERY ADJUSTABLE and is designed to fit varied body sizes and shapes. The Super Soft fabric is comfy and stretchy, and conforms to the figure.  The Bungee and Pull Cord System is like magic!

SIZE TIPS & INFO: 80% of our customers purchase the size "B" dress. Size Guarantee - If it doesn't fit, we'll take it back! It's easy to give as a gift, it grows and shrinks with you (even pregnant women love it!)

 Yes you can wear The Undress in multiple ways!  So you can be ready for a Workout or a Night Out!

 The Undress Version 4 is packed with 12 new features, making The Undress Version 4 the most packable, travel-friendly, light, and affordable Undress ever.

It packs with a "snap!" and even fits in pockets! It's lighter weight, without losing any fabric thickness, or quality.

We added brand new built-in bra petals that can replace the need for a bra for some and works like magic, and add chest coverage without the bulk of a bra. 

The bra petals are sandwiched between the front panel and the dress lining, so they are not visible AND they do not touch the skin!

You can wear The Undress as a strapless Dress!

The bungee allows you to wear it as a skirt, which allows you to change just your bottoms when needed.

Our new “Bungee and Pull-Charm” system is AWESOME! Tightening the dress is easier than ever, and the bungee has stretch so you can dial in your fit and tension to fit any shape or size, or even large bust size.  Once you set the size, you can and slip in and out of the dress easily without having to adjust it over and over again. The two adjustment points make it easy to find your perfect size and fit - making it easy to share with others, or give as a gift.

With the new Bungee and Pull Charm, The Undress V4 is so adjustable, it only takes 3 sizes to fit youth to XXXL!
Pictured: Stephanie in Size C, Morgan in Size A, and Sophie in Size B

The new side access openings make for the fastest changing ever! There is a new built-in view blocker and a sleeker pocket.

The label doubles as a cord holder to keep the strap centered and hidden.
 

Fit is improved overall, especially in the bodice section as requested by our customers.

There are new Side Splits for style and function.

You can use The Undress as a car seat cover to keep your ride clean.

 For an extra custom fit, a brand new optional belt in different colors will be available so you can customize your look! As you can see, we really wanted to make a dress every woman would love even better.

 

                             

The Undress is so useful, you can use it before or after any workout or activity.

  • TRAVEL - Travel dress, especially in hostels - you can even change in trains and planes. Wear it multiple ways for any destination!
  • STUDIO - In a studio, when there are no changing rooms or bathroom lines are too long.
  • WATER - The Undress is perfect for beach and swim sports.
  • Do deck changes securely or change right on the beach without ever leaving your spot.
  • MUD RUNS & OBSTACLE RACES - After Mud runs, when you don’t want to change in your car.
  • OUTDOORS - Light enough to take hiking and camping. Especially helpful if you’re sharing a tent!
  • FOR SPORTS TEAMS - both on and off the field, especially if you're surrounded by spectators. Show up in The Undress and change on the spot if needed!
  • LOCKER ROOMS + YOUTH - It’s perfect for students who must change in school locker rooms.
  • PHOTOGRAPHERS AND VIDEOGRAPHERS - Models & Actresses can change anywhere during shoots, saving valuable time!
  • EVERYDAY WEAR - It’s beautiful and comfortable so you will want to wear it like your other favorite dress! 
      
  • The more pledges we receive, the more fabric options we will add!
  • Final Approved Fabric Options will be given after the campaign.
  • As always, final selection is dependent on availability from fabric suppliers and may change at any time (that is the nature of the industry). We will do everything we can to get a very similar fabric to what is shown, in case we can't get the exact fabric. 
  • We will do our best to get the biggest selection possible for everyone!
                     

 

This is our LAST campaign for The Undress so we want to make it extra special and share with you new products we’ve always wanted to create! We hope you will join us for this last campaign.

 

 

 

 

  • Available Color: Black
  • Available Sizes XS - 3XL
  • We will need at least 500 backers to meet our minimum order

 

  • Colors Available: Black, Royal Blue
  • We will need at least 200 backers per color to meet our minimum order

Stretch Goal Colors: White, Red, Custom Print, and Additional color!

 

As a token of appreciation for giving so much to us throughout the years, we have made The Undress more affordable than ever! Our Undress V3 retails for $99, and The Undress V4 is only available here on Indiegogo for an AMAZING price!

All we need is YOU! The Undress Version 4 is not yet in production, and YOU can help make it a reality.

Our team and factories are ready, and now all we need is you to make this real. Please choose a pledge level that works best for you, and join our community that believes EVERY woman deserves the comfort and security that The Undress brings.

Please pledge, please share. Just say YES to The Undress, and become an Agent of Change. Thank you!

  Hi, we’re April and Dennis and we’ve worked for 3 years to develop what we believe is the most amazing dress system in the world that every active woman would love! We have come back to Indiegogo because of this community, a community that cares and challenges us to grow and improve our products and ourselves. When you pledge for The Undress today, you help our little company accomplish new things like develop a wholesale program for the first time so we can sell The Undress in running, yoga, and other specialty stores; pursue worldwide distribution, and redevelop the brand as our next evolution of our transformation. We have a unique opportunity, and we can’t do this ourselves - we need your help. We invite you to join thousands of our backers worldwide who are courageous, daring, bold, and passionate women from all over the world that represent the Courage to Change. Please pledge, and please share, and we look forward to having you become the first in the world to own The Undress Version 4, and join our founders family.

We started in 2014, and have multiple successful Crowdfunding Campaigns and delivered EVERY SINGLE ORDER. We have taken care of customers to satisfaction, and have a guarantee. We have delivered over 25,000 dresses, and that number continues to grow everyday!

SPECIAL THANKS AND CREDITS

Founders - Dennis Caco & April Estrada,

Special Thank You to: Marat Z., Nestor P., Wayva, Clio K., Mr. Money Bags - Ben A., Charles, Jenna, Linda N. L., Michael L.,  Padres Numero Uno - Margerita and Jerry Estrada

Models & Test Fitters: Evelyn Sun, Natonya Pacchiarotti, Rebecca Wong Burdett, Patty Cortez, Stacy Cosman, Sophia Szentes, Suleima, Sidney Sarmiento, Nikki Motosian, Monique Ramos, Sarah Dejesus, Melissa Mednick, Chabeli Cazarez, Cambria B., Audrey Lecien, Stacy Cosman, Bianca Abel, Geordyn Coker, Kyla, Mackenzie, Shyla, Morgan, Stephany, Lily, Roxanne, Brandi, and we hope we didn't miss anyone! :)

THANK YOU SO MUCH to our amazing team and everyone who helped to support us in creating The Undress Version 4 and our Indiegogo Campaign. We are so grateful for your time, energy, talent, encouragement, guidance and for helping us create this dream into reality. We will forever be grateful and appreciative to all of you for being there for us! 

A HUGE THANK YOU to my parents, Margarita and Jerry, for being our #1 fans and for all your encouragement & support! And a thank you to my sister, Stephanie, for your help and input! Also, a BIG THANK YOU to my friends for your emotional support, wisdom and for cheering me on throughout this endeavor!  -April

Thank you to my wife Rachelle, and my son, Drake for bearing with me and supporting me as I work hard to fulfill all of our dreams! Thank you to my Mom, my family, my friends, and partners for you undying support of all of our crazy projects. - Dennis

story_txt:
ORDER NEW PRINTS NOW 
         We wanted to create a product that would empower women to be active, and support their active lifestyles. Woman regularly change clothes in the wildest of places - fighting sports bras, sticky leggings, and wet shirts - forcing millions of us to change in cars, nasty restrooms, and towel changing in public, just so we can enjoy the activities we love. This is a real problem MILLIONS of women share!With its patented features, you can change into, or out of, The Undress anywhere, in as little as 30 seconds. No privacy needed! It works so well, it even works to remove sports bras, and is great for big busted women.



How it works is simple - You can quickly change INTO OR OUT OF ANY OUTFIT, USING THE UNDRESS. 



Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra.

Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. Done!


Change into another outfit, such as your running clothes, by reversing the process. 

Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms.
Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers. 
Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!


 
      The Undress is VERY ADJUSTABLE and is designed to fit varied body sizes and shapes. The Super Soft fabric is comfy and stretchy, and conforms to the figure.  The Bungee and Pull Cord System is like magic!
SIZE TIPS & INFO: 80% of our customers purchase the size "B" dress. Size Guarantee - If it doesn't fit, we'll take it back! It's easy to give as a gift, it grows and shrinks with you (even pregnant women love it!)

 Yes you can wear The Undress in multiple ways!  So you can be ready for a Workout or a Night Out!


 The Undress Version 4 is packed with 12 new features, making The Undress Version 4 the most packable, travel-friendly, light, and affordable Undress ever.
 


It packs with a "snap!" and even fits in pockets! It's lighter weight, without losing any fabric thickness, or quality.


We added brand new built-in bra petals that can replace the need for a bra for some and works like magic, and add chest coverage without the bulk of a bra. 
The bra petals are sandwiched between the front panel and the dress lining, so they are not visible AND they do not touch the skin!


You can wear The Undress as a strapless Dress!


The bungee allows you to wear it as a skirt, which allows you to change just your bottoms when needed.


Our new “Bungee and Pull-Charm” system is AWESOME! The two adjustment points make it easy to find your perfect size and fit - making it easy to share with others, or give as a gift.


With the new Bungee and Pull Charm, The Undress V4 is so adjustable, it only takes 3 sizes to fit youth to XXXL!Pictured: Stephanie in Size C, Morgan in Size A, and Sophie in Size B


The new side access openings make for the fastest changing ever! There is a new built-in view blocker and a sleeker pocket.


The label doubles as a cord holder to keep the strap centered and hidden. 


Fit is improved overall, especially in the bodice section as requested by our customers.


There are new Side Splits for style and function.
 


You can use The Undress as a car seat cover to keep your ride clean.


 For an extra custom fit, a brand new optional belt in different colors will be available so you can customize your look! As you can see, we really wanted to make a dress every woman would love even better.

 


 
                             

The Undress is so useful, you can use it before or after any workout or activity.


TRAVEL - Travel dress, especially in hostels - you can even change in trains and planes. Wear it multiple ways for any destination!

STUDIO - In a studio, when there are no changing rooms or bathroom lines are too long.

WATER - The Undress is perfect for beach and swim sports.
Do deck changes securely or change right on the beach without ever leaving your spot.

MUD RUNS & OBSTACLE RACES - After Mud runs, when you don’t want to change in your car.

OUTDOORS - Light enough to take hiking and camping. Especially helpful if you’re sharing a tent!

FOR SPORTS TEAMS - both on and off the field, especially if you're surrounded by spectators. Show up in The Undress and change on the spot if needed!

LOCKER ROOMS + YOUTH - It’s perfect for students who must change in school locker rooms.

PHOTOGRAPHERS AND VIDEOGRAPHERS - Models & Actresses can change anywhere during shoots, saving valuable time!

EVERYDAY WEAR - It’s beautiful and comfortable so you will want to wear it like your other favorite dress! 


 
       
The more pledges we receive, the more fabric options we will add!
Final Approved Fabric Options will be given after the campaign.
As always, final selection is dependent on availability from fabric suppliers and may change at any time (that is the nature of the industry). We will do everything we can to get a very similar fabric to what is shown, in case we can't get the exact fabric. 
We will do our best to get the biggest selection possible for everyone!


                       
 
This is our LAST campaign for The Undress so we want to make it extra special and share with you new products we’ve always wanted to create! We hope you will join us for this last campaign.

You've requested it for years, and now we have an optional Light weight CONVERTIBLE Bra that is made specifically to fit The Undress. Perfect after workouts or to put on while wearing The Undress.

 

 

Available Color: Black
Available Sizes XS - 3XL
We will need at least 500 backers to meet our minimum order


We’re SO excited for this - you can receive an Agents of Change, custom designed Vegan Leather handbag in a style and color ONLY available in this campaign. Designed with The Undress as inspiration - it even has side access openings! This handbag is awesome!

 

Colors Available: Black, Royal Blue
We will need at least 200 backers per color to meet our minimum order

Stretch Goal Colors: White, Red, Custom Print, and Additional color!

Please pledge, please share. Just say YES to The Undress, and become an Agent of Change. Thank you!

story:
~About Me~

Hi! My name is Rosemary Vuono. I'm a wife, mom, hairstylist, volunteer, great baker and crafter. I have volunteered in the local school system for years teaching craft classes for children and adults. Then I moved on to sewing quilts and donating them to various organizations. Now I am sewing Little dresses and Boys shorts in various sizes, to donate to a well established organization that distributes to the United States and Third World Countries. I can just imagine the smiles on the children's faces receiving a gift of a pretty NEW dress or NEW boy's shorts with drawstring ties. I have mailed out 3 large boxes so far of completed dresses and boys shorts in various colors and prints. Each large box costs about $35 to mail.

What touched my heart deeply was a quote from Blessed Mother Theresa, “Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.” 
 
So here I am, sewing in my cellar ( where it is cool from the summer heat) cutting, piecing, serging and sewing hundreds of little dresses and boys shorts. I recently mailed out all the boys shorts I completed so you only see one rack of 20 dresses in the picture. I have another 40 dresses completed already for the next mailing, and another 100 dresses cut out and pinned ready for sewing.
It truely is a labor of Love.
 
Your donations will go to various printed and colored fabrics, elastic in various widths, double bias bindings, threads for sewing and serger machines plus mailing costs. My labor is FREE!
 
If funds exceed the goal amount then all additional donations will be used to keep funding this project. LET'S KEEP ME SEWING!
 
Ok, now for the Perks...
 
Donations $1-9 will receive a warm email thank you from me with picture attached of a box  filled with dresses/boys shorts ready for mailing!
 
Donations of $10-19 will receive a delicious and easy dessert recipe of mine thru email with a warm thank you as well.
 
Donations of $20-49 will receive a set of 2 notecards with quote from Blessed Mother Theresa in the mail plus dessert recipe thru email and a warm thank you!
 
Donations of $50 and up will receive a set of 4 notecards by mail with assorted designs and sizes drawn by children, plus everything in the COMBO pack.

story:
Our Story:

         Growing up in a family full of tailors, I found my love for fashion through the eyes of my mother. She was a creative individual who was passionate about being a tailor. I moved to the United States with my two brothers in other to join our father. I began taking modeling classes and realized there weren't many opportunities for everyone.  This led me to think outside the box and take matters into my own hands. I wanted my voice to be heard and I wanted to create a platform that gives young people an opportunity to grow, to embrace themselves, and to be confident that they can achieve all that they wanted to in the industry. Two years, right after graduating from high school, I started my brand Unique by Reelia in 2013. A wearable accessories brand, that I started making myself with $1. I have been involved in various fashion shows, including international shows.

The Mission:

The Afro Expo Fashion Week will combine two diverse cultures to create a bigger and superior culture of fashion to expand the norm of what we perceive to be already done and make a fresher and unique statement in the fashion industry. This is an opportunity for young designers to get involved in the fashion week aspect of the fashion industry at an affordable price.This project will be beneficial to low income designers who are looking for a way to expose their artistic works  but have been holding back because of the lack of money. This project will support them at launching their career at an affordable price. The more African designers we have in the industry, the better it will be to promote Africa and its culture in other to give back to Africa.

How Are We Giving It All Back?

Wondering why you should support this project ?

The Afro Expo Fashion Week is also a fundraising project to raise funds to support our dream girls handcrafted project in Togo. 
As a Togolese woman living in America, I believe in giving back to my county. I want to contribute to a prosperous Togo that provides opportunities for economic development. According to the United Nations Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination Against Women, ''Togolese women suffer from systematic and social marginalization.'' 
We believe that as a progressive organization, we can work towards eliminating such statistics by collaborating with New Touch organization. 
New Touch is a non profit organization based in Lomé, Togo, that provide opportunities for women , young people development and also for children education.
50% of the proceeds from the show in Italy will go towards empowering the young women in the New Touch organization. We encourage you to support this project because we will be providing these women with an educator who specializes in teaching artistry skills such as beading, leather crafting, wood making, and pottery. 
Each woman gets to choose what she is interested in learning. This initiative will also feature a business development component, that will be focused on coaching and mentoring these young women to launch their own entrepreneurial endeavors. 
The handcrafted items they create, will be featured on our website to be purchased and the proceeds will be given to them to support their businesses. 
****On Behalf of our team we would like to thank you for your generosity.****

2015-2016  Collections:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Uniquebyreelia Spring/Summer collection 15/16

 

 

AEFWI MOOD BOARD :

 

 

AEFWI Vision Break Down!!

- Day 1 Press Conference (June 30th )

 AEFWI kick off cocktail

- Day 2 ( July 1st ,)

Ferrara Street Parade ( In designers clothing)/ Photo shoot

Runway Show

(Surprise) Celebrities Artist Performances

After Party

Day 3 - Pop Up Shop (July 2nd)

The pop-up shop event will give both, Uniquebyreelia and all other AEFWI designers an opportunity to meet one on one with potential customers and foster potential world business relations with industry leaders . The event will also aid in promoting this year’s AEFWI designers scheduled for June 30th – July 2nd.

Why We Need Your Help

Throughout the past few months we've being working with a production specialist to set up a chain a budget and set plan, in other to produce  this Fashion Week  at a high quality, and after rounds of negotiation and production trials we're confident that we can produce the collection beautifully , successfully.

Here is the Breakdown to what your $8000 will be covering during our fashion Week.

  • The Press Conference venue- Runway Stage          
  • The Kick off cocktail venue (Foods, drinks, dj)             
  •  Lighting
  •  Artists                                                                                        
  •  Models
  • Makeup Artist                                                                           
  • Hair styles
  • The After party                                                                        
  • Dj
  • Pop up Shop Venue-Tables rental / Chairs and racks (pop Up Shop)

Therefore, in other to bring the vision to life, we'll have to raise a not-insubstantial sum: about $8,000 dollars.

Rewards 

                                        

The Afro Girl Movement Earrings

-or-

The Adinkra sign Earrings

$15

Queens Personalized Post Card

$25

+

 

 

Personalized Afro Expo Fashion Week buttons up Ankara Shirt

-Black - Greyish Or White-

-Small - Medium - Large

$45

 

Personalized Afro Expo Fashion Week buttons up

-Black - Greyish Or White-

-Small - Medium - Large

$30

Queens Necklace Collections

You get to pick one of these beautiful necklaces

- $45-

The designers package include : A runway / and Pop Up shop

- $250 -

This Perks give you one of our Unisex , Gold or Silver color of your choice unique crown out of our 2016 collections.

- $ 55 -

Feather lapel Pin (Men)

A set of 3 different color of a feathers lapel pins. With these lapel pin be different, be Unique, be classic.

- $ 30 -

Men Wooden Bow Tie

Men wooden Bow tie set of two! Spice up your fashion style with our wooden bow ties! Be Unique , Be different!!

- $ 50 -

The Man of style

Handmade butterfly Wood Bow tie, + Gravata brooch + Handkerchief set ! Be Unique , Be different!!

- $ 60 -

The gentlemen club

The Man of Gold package , is a complete classic package made available for our gentlemen This package include : 2 Wooden bow tie, 1 beaded floral lapel pin, 1 UniqueByReelia signature post card,

- $100 -

Be a sponsor

Become our sponsor and have your logo on our website, on our social media and on the red carpet during the fashion week in Italy!!
A chance to a be a part of us !!

- $ 150 -

 

Risks and challenges

This will be our first Fashion Week in Europe so the biggest vulnerability with our project is the potential for funding delays, and us traveling and getting familiar to Italy prior to the show.

Some of our new product might suffer a little delay for the backers, since the production is managed by us, and we might be in the mist of preparing our Fashion Week, and us traveling, back and forth. However, we will put in our best in other to make it on time. The team is also working in tandem with reputable sponsors with a well-defined process, and decades of experience in the production of our high-quality fashion Week Ahead of us.

Thank You!

             I want to honor this opportunity not only for me, but also to empower other young women like myself, I believe everybody has a dream and to fulfill it you must keep on believe in yourself because everything in this life is possible. Your generosity will be what makes this possible. THANK YOU!

Connect With US / just one click !!!

This initiative will also feature a business development component, that will be focused on coaching and mentoring these young women to launch their own entrepreneurial endeavors. The handcrafted items they create, will be featured on our website to be purchased and the proceeds will be given to them to support their businesses. ****On Behalf of our team we would like to thank you for your generosity.****2015-2016  Collections:                      Uniquebyreelia Spring/Summer collection 15/16  AEFWI MOOD BOARD :       AEFWI Vision Break Down!!- Day 1 Press Conference (June 30th ) AEFWI kick off cocktail- Day 2 ( July 1st ,)Ferrara Street Parade ( In designers clothing)/ Photo shootRunway Show(Surprise) Celebrities Artist PerformancesAfter PartyDay 3 - Pop Up Shop (July 2nd)The pop-up shop event will give both, Uniquebyreelia and all other AEFWI designers an opportunity to meet one on one with potential customers and foster potential world business relations with industry leaders . The event will also aid in promoting this year’s AEFWI designers scheduled for June 30th – July 2nd.Why We Need Your HelpThroughout the past few months we've being working with a production specialist to set up a chain a budget and set plan, in other to produce  this Fashion Week  at a high quality, and after rounds of negotiation and production trials we're confident that we can produce the collection beautifully , successfully.Here is the Breakdown to what your $8000 will be covering during our fashion Week.
The Press Conference venue- Runway Stage          
The Kick off cocktail venue (Foods, drinks, dj)             
 Lighting
 Artists                                                                                        
 Models
Makeup Artist                                                                           
Hair styles
The After party                                                                        
Dj
Pop up Shop Venue-Tables rental / Chairs and racks (pop Up Shop)
Therefore, in other to bring the vision to life, we'll have to raise a not-insubstantial sum: about $8,000 dollars.Rewards                                         The Afro Girl Movement Earrings-or-The Adinkra sign Earrings$15Queens Personalized Post Card$25+  Personalized Afro Expo Fashion Week buttons up Ankara Shirt-Black - Greyish Or White--Small - Medium - Large$45 Personalized Afro Expo Fashion Week buttons up-Black - Greyish Or White--Small - Medium - Large$30Queens Necklace CollectionsYou get to pick one of these beautiful necklaces- $45-The designers package include : A runway / and Pop Up shop- $250 -This Perks give you one of our Unisex , Gold or Silver color of your choice unique crown out of our 2016 collections.- $ 55 -Feather lapel Pin (Men)A set of 3 different color of a feathers lapel pins. With these lapel pin be different, be Unique, be classic.- $ 30 -Men Wooden Bow TieMen wooden Bow tie set of two! Spice up your fashion style with our wooden bow ties! Be Unique , Be different!!- $ 50 -The Man of styleHandmade butterfly Wood Bow tie, + Gravata brooch + Handkerchief set ! Be Unique , Be different!!- $ 60 -The gentlemen clubThe Man of Gold package , is a complete classic package made available for our gentlemen This package include : 2 Wooden bow tie, 1 beaded floral lapel pin, 1 UniqueByReelia signature post card,- $100 -Be a sponsorBecome our sponsor and have your logo on our website, on our social media and on the red carpet during the fashion week in Italy!!A chance to a be a part of us !!- $ 150 - Risks and challengesThis will be our first Fashion Week in Europe so the biggest vulnerability with our project is the potential for funding delays, and us traveling and getting familiar to Italy prior to the show.Some of our new product might suffer a little delay for the backers, since the production is managed by us, and we might be in the mist of preparing our Fashion Week, and us traveling, back and forth. However, we will put in our best in other to make it on time. The team is also working in tandem with reputable sponsors with a well-defined process, and decades of experience in the production of our high-quality fashion Week Ahead of us.Thank You!             I want to honor this opportunity not only for me, but also to empower other young women like myself, I believe everybody has a dream and to fulfill it you must keep on believe in yourself because everything in this life is possible. Your generosity will be what makes this possible. THANK YOU!Connect With US / just one click !!!

story:
While thumbing through the pages of Vanity Fair Magazine at my dentists office one rainy afternoon, I couldn't help but notice how all the pictures of all the beautiful women in the magazine blended together. Being a photographer for many years, I try and make sense of what I like about an image, what makes it pop, what makes it beautiful, so that I may improve as a photographer. But the only things that stand out to me in these images are the ultra skinny, over airbrushed, all too perfect model or celebrity that has posed for them. So I had an epiphany. What if I were to photograph the "every day beautiful woman" and publish my own book or magazine? Then the world can see the beauty of women, beyond Hollywood.

I grabbed my gear and a few makeup artists and hair dressers, bartered out studio space, scouted outdoor locations, and told everyone I knew. In nearly six months I photographed 35 women, capping my goal at 50. The biographies that I am writing on these women are incredible. Each woman is uniquely different; each one beautiful. They range from the house wife, the mother of four, the breast cancer survivor, the police officer, the 9 to 5 professional, the artist, the mortician, the student, the unemployed... and the list goes on!

But as with all projects, there are problems. Now I am faced with a dilemma. Do I publish it as a book, or an ongoing magazine? Do I self publish with sites like Blurb.com and pay nearly $35 per book, or do I hold out for offers. One way or another, it all comes down to that magic word: MONEY. Simply, there is none. I've photographed every single woman for free, so there's no secret bank account with funds socked away. Clearly, I need to raise money to market, promote and print this book.

If this book falls short of completion, it would be devastating. Not only to me as the artist behind it, essentially crushing a dream, but to all of the women who worked tirelessly to get this amazing project done. I couldn't possibly tell 50 women that they were no longer going to be in the book because there is no book. I just can't do it.

I think setting a budget of $5,000 for this project is about what is needed to get it all done: the website, the marketing and promotion, the ISBN, the design fees and the printing. Every single person that helps fund this project will get a special thank you in the book or magazine. Larger pledge amounts will get free prints, wallpapers for computers and phones, even a copy of the finished product when it is all finished.

I would like to thank you all in advance for taking the time to read about me and my vision, and also for making the pledge. Please take an extra moment to share this with people you know so that they can also help us reach our goal. Please feel free to view my FaceBook Fan Page to see some of the work being done for the book.

story:
Hello! I’m Wolfgang, co-creator of Skarabeos. I’m excited to introduce our products to you.

My two colleagues and I travel frequently. We always carry our mobile devices and other important personal items in our bags. And we frequently worry about their being stolen or lost.

Over the past two years, our team has created a solution that offers you a new kind of personal protection. Inspired by the ancient Egyptian scarab beetle, a symbol of shelter and protection, we’d like to introduce you to Skarabeos.

 

Skarabeos designs innovative anti-theft bags and accessories. Our bags offer you the highest level of protection to keep your personal belongings and tech safe. Unique security functions mean peace of mind for you. And iconic design integrates our products seamlessly into your daily life.

Feel safe, enjoy peace of mind with Skarabeos.

 

 

 

Skarabeos products feature an innovative electronic protection system. It consists of the Skarabeos Box, synched to the free Skarabeos app. You can simply activate this system via your phone or your smartwatch and you will be notified by an alarm on both devices.

 

An alarm sounds instantly if a thief attempts to open your bag.

 

And if a thief tries to grab the whole bag? You’ll be notified instantly as well. The alarm will be activated as soon as the bag is taken away from you.

 

If you forget your bag somewhere, you will be notified immediately so you can get it right back.

 

 

 

 

Skarabeos products feature a proprietary electronic protection system that is totally unique.

This system alerts you immediately when someone tries to open your bag. Our enhanced distance alerts ensure that you will never again forget your bag, and that it won’t be stolen.

These instant and preventive alarm functions enable you to react in real time. It’s the most effective way to discourage thieves and to protect your belongings against theft and loss.

The electronic protection system consists of the Skarabeos Box with smart sensors and energy-efficient Bluetooth interface, synched to the free Skarabeos app. This system works with any of our bags.

Each of our bags is also equipped with magnetic protection. A flap containing 10 magnets folds over the bag opening. Its strong bond prevents pickpockets from opening the bag unnoticed. Bags equipped with magnetic protection have no travel restrictions, so you can carry them right onto the plane.

This system guarantees that you and your valuables will be safer than ever before.

 

All this comes with an app for your phone and smartwatch.

The app links your bag to your phone and watch. You‘ll be able to receive alarms and notifications on both devices. You can also simply monitor your belongings via the app.

Our system is highly customizable. You can turn it on and off, or activate individual alarm functions. You can also pause the system if you need to remove something quickly from your bag. And you can protect multiple bags at the same time.

Our app is totally free, and we never collect any personal data.

Our app is also available for your smartwatch.

The watch app is super practical, allowing you to use the protection system without reaching for your phone. All it takes to check in is a glance at your wrist.

Skarabeos is also one of the first watch apps that enable a dialogue between a wearable and a smartwatch. We think this makes your smartwatch even more interesting to use!

Currently, our app is only available for iOS and WatchOS. We want to create an Android app, but to do so we need your support for this campaign.              

 

Our hardware is optimized for low energy consumption. Two readily available AA batteries provide a year’s worth of energy, so there’s no need for daily charging. A battery indicator in the app shows you the current capacity and promptly reminds you when you need to change batteries.    

Our compact alarm system is also very lightweight. No need to lug around heavy spare batteries!

 

At Skarabeos, design is in our DNA. It’s foundation for everything that we do. As a team we’ve been working together for 10 years on combining perfect design with the most innovative technology of our time.

Skarabeos is about straightforward design. It’s about products that are beautiful and work perfectly. They fit seamlessly into your everyday life and offer you discreet protection. With Skarabeos you are not just better protected, you also look better when you’re out and about.

We’re starting this campaign with our launch products, a backpack and a briefcase. We also offer a range of modular accessories that you can fit into all of our bags. In the future, we hope to produce collections of bags for men and women. 

We combine design and innovative technology with sustainability. The electronic protection system is energy-efficient and fits in each one of our bags. We also only work with partners, suppliers and manufacturers who value fair employment, human rights and social equity. One goal of our campaign is to be able to offer our bags in a sustainable material. We would appreciate your support in helping us make that happen.

And last but not least: high quality is a must. We’ve carefully selected the finest premium materials for our bags. A high quality and durable nylon from Italy. A traditional wool loden from Austria. Waterproof YKK zippers. Our collaboration with the world’s best textile producers guarantees a long life for your Skarabeos bag.

 

 

  • Dimensions: 7,5 x 4,5 x 1,8 cm
  • Weight: 38 g/ 1,34 oz
  • Fits into the Backpack Skarabeos 01 and Briefcase Skarabeos 02

 

 

  • Dimensions: 48 x 32 x 11cm/ 18,9 x 12,6 x 4,33 i
  • Capacity: 18L
  • Weight: 1 Kg/ 2,2 lb
  • Fits your mobile devices up to 15"
  • Stylish backpack for everyday use or for short trips

Details

  • Protective flap with magnetic protection
  • Self-locking slider
  • Internal security hooks
  • Clip to fasten the Skarabeos Box
  • Water-repellent premium nylon
  • Waterproof YKK zipper
  • Wide opening for easy access
  • Internal fabric pocket
  • Padded laptop compartment
  • Chest strap

 

  • Dimensions: 26 x 37 x 8 cm/ 10,24 x 14,57 x 3,15 i
  • Capacity: 7,5L
  • Weight: 0,4 Kg/ 0,88 lb
  • Fits your mobile devices up to 13"
  • Classic briefcase for the office and business travel

Details

  • Protective flap with magnetic protection
  • Self-locking zippers
  • Internal security hooks
  • Clip to fasten the Skarabeos Box
  • Water-repellent premium nylon
  • Waterproof YKK zipper
  • Wide opening for easy access
  • Internal fabric pocket
  • Padded laptop compartment
  • Shoulder belt

 

Skarabeos was founded in 2016 by a team based in Linz and Berlin: Wolfgang Langeder, Christian Dils and Manuel Seckel.

Wolfgang has a background in fashion and founded his first wearable tech company Utope in 2012. Christian and Manuel are tech experts working for Fraunhofer Institute, Germany. They founded their own company Stretchable Circuits in 2009.

The first time we met was in Austria in 2009 at Ars Electronica, a festival connecting the design and technology community. From then on, we have combined our passion and expertise to create well-designed and innovative products.

In 2013 we achieved international success and were awarded a Red Dot/Best of the Best for the realization of Sporty Supaheroe, one of the very first products to use stretchable electronics. Since then, the team has continued to work on breakthrough concepts to improve people’s lives with wearable technology.

We have been working on ideas and concepts for an electronic protection system since 2016. Now we are happy and proud to make our first products available here for you.

 

We have already finished the development and testing of our products and started working with experienced manufacturing partners. Thus, we are close to getting Skarabeos to market.

  • We collaborated with Berlin-based bag expert Bagjack to produce our bags.
  • The first batch of electronics has already been assembled in Germany and the supplier is ready for upscaling the production.
  • Award-winning app specialist Evenly programmed our iOS and WatchOS apps.
  • Graphic designer Manuel Radde created the packaging design for all of our products.
  • Since late 2017, friends and supporters have been travelling the world with our bags to test its features.

 

 

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. We have been working for more than two years developing Skarabeos and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start.

We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. We sucessfully develop cutting-edge and award-winning hardware products like Skarabeos together since 8 years now and we have a deep expertise, years of combined experience and established business partners. So we can confidently say that we are well prepared and we have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks that arise in this process.

We know that the most important part of our process is the commitment we made to you and to deliver Skarabeos to you on time! We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise.

 

 

 

Q & A

Shipping

All orders will be shipped from within the EU. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility in Linz, Austria with a major shipping company. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. EU shipments will take 3-7 business days.

Skarabeos ships to all EU/ european countries, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Korea and Japan. If your country is not included here, please contact mail@skarabeos.com and we will add your country and confirm.

Freight costs are specified at each perk level.

We will contact you via email to confirm your shipping contact information before we will ship your order. Within 24 hours of your order being shipped you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

VAT, Customs & Duties Information

Our prices include 20% Austrian VAT. EU customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries please see the following link if there is any import taxes for your country, keep in mind that the numbers on this website are only indicative. https://customsdutyfree.com/duty-calculator/  We cannot mark your order as gift.

Please contact us via mail@skarabeos.com for any further questions!

story:
Our Story... 

Our mission is bringing the hip world of fashion and the social world of charity closer together. We did this by creating a hybrid product that appeals to both and everyone in-between.

The goal is to create incentives for savvy and prominent people to engage more with exciting social projects around the world and so increasing the general knowledge and motivation about worldly ongoings.

People define themselves through the clothes they wear and make statements to their peers through this channel. So we started cooperating with Berlin based street artists with the goal to create T-Shirts that appeal to everyone but carry a meaningful message.

Through CAUSA, you feel hip wearing a unique street art design and also proud for publicly supporting a cause in need!

Living in a highly over-connected world, we decided to use this phenomenon to our advantage by printing QR-codes on the back of each T-Shirts and so creating more context to the experience. Every story can be told immediately, making each CAUSA wearer to an ambassador for their chosen cause.

Our T-Shirts...

Our Projects...

APOPOs Landmine Detection Hero Rats

 

BioCarbon Engineerings Reforestation Drones

 

Field Ready's Humanitarian Aid 3D Printers

 

Our Artists...

44 FLAVOURS

       

The two masterminds behind 44flavours is the renowned street-art duo Sebastian Bagge and Julio Rölle. Both have been working together since 2003 and have both specialized in Illustration & Graphic Design ever since. The duo has been developing unconventional analogue typography and finding creative ways to smuggle art inspired contraband into commercial branding and communications.

BILLY/ALLEX

       

Billy/Alex aka Alex Godwin is an English artist having fun through painting outside on the street and inside her studio. The distinctive shapes, characters and symbols in Billy’s work are intended to communicate a colourful, visual punch in a simple attempt to encourage other people to smile and be happy.

VIDAM THE WEIRD

      

Attila Szamosi, aka Vidam is a Berlin-based artist and illustrator. As part of the street art and graffiti crew The Weird, he loves traveling around the globe and painting walls with his friends. As part of the illustration collective Peachbeach, he loves painting canvases and creating funny and complex illustrations for international clients like Red Bull, Converse or Nike.

Our Pricing...

 

 

Where Does All Your Money Go?

 

 

 

Our Production...

It is very important to us that our t-shirts are produced fair and sustainable. Therefore we work together with the wholesaler Continental Clothing, which supplies us with t-shirts from their earth positive line. The shirts are manufactured solely by using renewable energy from wind and solar energy.

We want you to feel good about our product you’re purchasing. With every Causa T-shirt purchased, you are not only supporting one of three exciting projects; you are also showing your support of responsible manufacturing and of the environment.

                

            

Problems and Obstacles... 

This is our first Indiegogo Project and we have done our best to make realistic projections of how many t-shirts we need, how much time we need to get the t-shirts and finally how long the printing process will take. We might run into some unforeseen obstacles. There is always a possibility of a slight delay. In that case we will let you know about our problem right away and make sure your t-shirt will get to you as soon as possible.

 

             

 

 

Thank You!
story_txt:
Our Story... Our mission is bringing the hip world of fashion and the social world of charity closer together. We did this by creating a hybrid product that appeals to both and everyone in-between.The goal is to create incentives for savvy and prominent people to engage more with exciting social projects around the world and so increasing the general knowledge and motivation about worldly ongoings.People define themselves through the clothes they wear and make statements to their peers through this channel. So we started cooperating with Berlin based street artists with the goal to create T-Shirts that appeal to everyone but carry a meaningful message.Through CAUSA, you feel hip wearing a unique street art design and also proud for publicly supporting a cause in need!Living in a highly over-connected world, we decided to use this phenomenon to our advantage by printing QR-codes on the back of each T-Shirts and so creating more context to the experience. Every story can be told immediately, making each CAUSA wearer to an ambassador for their chosen cause.Our T-Shirts...Our Projects...APOPOs Landmine Detection Hero Rats
 
BioCarbon Engineerings Reforestation Drones

 
Field Ready's Humanitarian Aid 3D Printers Our Artists...44 FLAVOURS       The two masterminds behind 44flavours is the renowned street-art duo Sebastian Bagge and Julio Rölle. Both have been working together since 2003 and have both specialized in Illustration & Graphic Design ever since. The duo has been developing unconventional analogue typography and finding creative ways to smuggle art inspired contraband into commercial branding and communications.BILLY/ALLEX       Billy/Alex aka Alex Godwin is an English artist having fun through painting outside on the street and inside her studio. The distinctive shapes, characters and symbols in Billy’s work are intended to communicate a colourful, visual punch in a simple attempt to encourage other people to smile and be happy.VIDAM THE WEIRD      Attila Szamosi, aka Vidam is a Berlin-based artist and illustrator. As part of the street art and graffiti crew The Weird, he loves traveling around the globe and painting walls with his friends. As part of the illustration collective Peachbeach, he loves painting canvases and creating funny and complex illustrations for international clients like Red Bull, Converse or Nike.Our Pricing...  Where Does All Your Money Go?   Our Production...It is very important to us that our t-shirts are produced fair and sustainable. Therefore we work together with the wholesaler Continental Clothing, which supplies us with t-shirts from their earth positive line. The shirts are manufactured solely by using renewable energy from wind and solar energy.We want you to feel good about our product you’re purchasing. With every Causa T-shirt purchased, you are not only supporting one of three exciting projects; you are also showing your support of responsible manufacturing and of the environment.                            Problems and Obstacles... This is our first Indiegogo Project and we have done our best to make realistic projections of how many t-shirts we need, how much time we need to get the t-shirts and finally how long the printing process will take. We might run into some unforeseen obstacles. There is always a possibility of a slight delay. In that case we will let you know about our problem right away and make sure your t-shirt will get to you as soon as possible.                Thank You!

story:
What is Rebellia and Who is Behind it?

Ever wish when shopping online, you could just plunk in your measurements and get the dress/pants/shirt/skirt that fits YOU and YOUR unique body? 

Well now you can!

Hi everyone! My name is Chrystal Rose. I'm a fitness lover, writer and entrepreneur who started my first business 3.5 years ago with a marketing company. Later, I became a co-owner of a women's empowerment website and print magazine. This year, I decided to try something new: I combined my love of business with helping other women-- and created Rebellia. 

Last summer, after having been on my fitness journey for a little over a year, I left a department store dressing room in tears. I had finally found self-love, was both happy and confident in my skin, BUT my body had changed so much-- nothing fit! Shirts squeezed my biceps, pants strangled my butt and thighs but were big in the waist. I felt frustrated that I work so hard in the gym and was unable to find clothing that fit my body.

After talking with some friends who felt the same way, I decided to dive in and see if I could create a solution to the problem so many of us have.

My vision is to launch our website this fall and eventually have various style options for women, who can shop with the confidence of knowing that whatever they buy, is made specifically to their measurements.

I want women with athletic bodies to have options when it comes to dressing up. We may not do it all the time, but when we do-- we shouldn't have to embark on a quest to find clothing that fits.

What We Need & What You Get

The money from this campaign will go towards the cost of labor and materials for the clothing-- regardless of whether we hit our goal or not. Anything beyond our goal or in excess of costs, will go towards creating new samples for our fall/winter line. Anything beyond that will go towards software and equipment that will make the custom element both more efficient and cost effective. In fact, it will reduce the current labor costs by almost 40%!  Which of course will be passed on to our customers.

Every dime collected from the Rebel with a Cause perk will go towards the creation and promotion of the piece and ultimately the cause itself. That level will not go towards company costs.

Perk Partners!

We've teamed up with these awesome, female owned, fitness brands to give you some cute and functional perk options!

Viva La Rebellia Tank

This fun tank reminds you to kick ass in the gym and live your rebellious life-- because you and your body were not made in a cookie cutter.

Our Dresses

These dresses will ONLY be available during this campaign, so if you don't get one now-- you won't get the chance to again.


The Victorya Dress

A little sassy, a little sexy. The Victorya dress comes in multiple customizable options. Available in mini length (shown) or midi (not shown). Long sleeve (shown) or sleeveless (not shown). We can even make it in 2-piece to show off those abs! Color: Black


The Emmie Dress

The Emmie Dress comes with the option of an open bodice (See the Emmie Maxi below) or closed bodice. As well as varying color combos. Shown: Grey & Pink Seersucker. 

The Emmie Maxi


The Emmie Maxi comes with the option of an open bodice or closed bodice (See the Emmie Dress above) as well as varying color combos. Shown: Coral & Print.

The Impact

I decided to launch this campaign for several reasons:

  • This is a test. Is this something wanted and needed? Will the women who are telling me yes it is, stand up and contribute? Am I crazy? (Don't answer that!) Also, what pieces work and which don't? Which do better?
  • Wholesale fabric. Since we're just getting started, buying a ton of fabric upfront doesn't make sense. Buying at retail, is simply insane. So if we can get one big order in after this campaign, it will save money and reduce the risk of buying too much or too little of what we need.
  • Custom clothing is expensive! At the moment, my manufacturing options are pretty pricey. Having the money upfront will allow us to work with our current situation or possibly negotiate with someone new. 
  • Gather our first group of loyal customers. Every woman who gives to the campaign will be a part of our Think Tank. When we move forward and build our site, create new designs and add new pieces for fall, this initial group will be an integral part of that.
I find that many of us in the fitness world get discouraged when shopping and feel uncomfortable in "regular" clothes. I want to change that. 
As one of the former owners of a magazine for women, and the current president of multiple FemCity chapters, empowering women and helping them to empower themselves is so important to me. Through this company I plan to continue to do that in as many ways as possible. Including finding ways to give back to causes, foundations, non-profits and charities.

Risks & Challenges

Because these samples were created with retail fabric, the same colors/patterns may not be available when we fulfill orders-- but we are going to do the best we can to come close or substitute with something you love just as much.

We expect some user error when our contributors submit their measurements, but plan to provide visual instructions on how to be as accurate as possible.

There really isn't a template for what we're doing so we're sort of navigating the waters with the help and guidance of some really smart and experienced people. One of the biggest challenges will be to keep garment costs affordable for our customers. Finding a manufacturer that's willing to produce 'on demand' garments in varying sizes is sort of like embarking on a quest for a unicorn. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can contribute (and we get that) so if you can't please support us by SHARING this campaign. SHARE the video. If you know someone who would love what we're doing. If you have a connection with an influencer, a media contact or even an awesome blogger-- Please share with them!

Copy and paste the link, use the share tools-- help us get this project seen and our goals exceeded.

Thank you ALL for your help and for checking us out!

story:
Hey there! Let me introduce myself. My name is Martha. I am a 42 year old mom of one.

From the time I was a kid I have been drawing. It seems as though it is a gift that many on my father's side have. I have been told by family and friends for YEARS that I should do something with it. But life just never went that way.

Last year I got a chance to sit back, relax and sketch. And sketch I did! Then I began taking photographs. And sketched from those as well. I now have to force myself to leave my camera at home.:)

My mother began to get on me again.  Ya know the "Use what God gave you" speech.  At my age that no longer means "shake your money maker" So I put some of my sketches on t shirts. And the feedback has been remarkable! My husband gets stopped in the grocery store when he wears the Penney Tee we made him!! My daughter's own Penney Tee(which she wears every weekend now) gets laughs, and people have asked where they can get one. And my mom gets asked where she got the Tee she wears. Which she proudly tells people I designed.

Yup. I will say it. Mom was right.

 *** Any tracing that has been done has been of my own work and photos. I have used this method to get the art work onto the T's the way I want them. As sketches. Not photos! All work is MINE! You can see my photos in my Etsy store at www.Etsy.com/FestiveChicken 

 

 Here is where you come in!

Making t-shirts, it takes money.  I just dont have the capital I need to order the amount of T's needed to make this a reality.  This is my time to shine and use a gift that I have been blessed with. And to share my gift with others.
 
Your donations will be spent to:
*pay for the shirts
*pay for setting up a website
*pay for marketing POSTCARDS/BUSINESS CARDS
*pay for space at local art and community events.
 home shows and other events state and region wide.
 
So I ask you to PLEASE donate as much as your heart desires. You will get my eternal gratitude, and my mother's as well! And you will also get some great t shirts!
 
I don't really ask much from my supporters, but I hope you can support this project. Every dollar counts! If you cannot donate for whatever reason, please share this project and link with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Tumblr. I would greatly appreciate it!
 
**Please note that I am ALWAYS sketching. And my family is ALWAYS tossing new Penney Tee idea's around. So check back often. I will be adding new shirts through out the campaign! **
