story:
About the project

Strokes Maker is a unique software product intended for creation of vector engravings and artistic vectorization of raster images.  

The software uses original algorithms for calculation of vector strokes based on initial raster images. It renders halftones and image relief. Thousands of strokes interrupt and intersect under different angles, turn from continuous to dotted line, disappear and emerge again, changing their path and forming a unique of a kind high quality vector image. One incorrectly calculated stroke, like one false note in a symphony, can spoil the harmony of lines making up a single image. But the Strokes Maker is tool of exclusively fine tuning, and if it is necessary to disrupt the mathematical precision of lines the intuitive friendly parameters will help to give a handworked reality.


 To obtain such line-art images (engravings) before now – days, weeks, sometimes even months of meticulous handmade work performed by engraving craftsmen were required. It is sufficient to download now a demo version of the software (old) from  Vectools.com  and you can try it. However, as any sophisticated tool the Strokes Maker allows a significant creative freedom. It is possible to hatch a photograph with a simple hatching from the standard set, and it is also possible to spend the whole day creating a portray, which consists of dozens, and sometimes even hundreds of various forms, masks and hatchings.


The first version of the software was developed literally as a kitchen-table effort just for own needs at off-work time. After a publication of the results on one of forums revolving around vector graphics it became clear that the application has certain potential and appears very interesting to many designers. The software developed, polishing its functionality and adding new interesting effects during subsequent several years. Both private designers and major companies use Strokes Maker 1.25  despite of all its shortcomings and gaps for work all over the world.


See below a few examples performed by me in Strokes Maker:






Taking into consideration users’ wishes the software was completely remade during last two years, and its computation speed has grown in tens of times. The new version of Strokes Maker 2 will be accessible for Mac OS X and Windows operating systems in the nearest future.


Current state of the project

At present Strokes Maker 2 is 95% completed, pending one tenth part of the whole amount of works. But this little part is the most important for me now. This little part should be implemented at the highest level. And precisely a qualitative implementation of this one tenth has been missing in the first version of the software. This is the part of work that I cannot fulfill by myself. I need to complete the development of the software “face”, that very user interface (UI), which forms an opinion of the software already immediately after its first start and can charm user or scare away  in spite of its filling. Yes, it’s just so – working with software a person should feel comfortable and cozy since the very moment of start and till the moment of down-lying. Interface should please the eye and not annoy with piling-up of standard cloying controls or bizarre color palette.  Software icon must be an adornment of the desktop and should not to cause a wish to hide it far away “until called for”. 


Purpose of fund raising

Very little remains for me to complete the project and issue the new product, that is to complete the interface and make a site. Good quality interface and site are a very big work to be performed by teams of experienced professional designers. The minimal sum necessary to pay for works associated with the
Strokes Maker 2 project amounts $10,000. Probably it is no trouble at all for a big software company, but it supposes significant funds for me.


Recompense

As recompense I offer you my gratitude expressed in publication of your contact in the cloud of sponsors    on the new site of my project. The cloud of sponsors is a very beautiful modern element of website design, which will contain your name or nick with reference to your resource, homepage or corporate site.

I also grant you licenses with different periods for the current Strokes Maker 1.25  version of software (with possibility of privilege upgrade to new versions) for Windows, which you can use right now in your creative work, as well as for the future Strokes Maker 2 for Mac Os X & Windows. The license allows using the final result, that is export it to popular graphic formats: ai, eps, pdf, svg, jpg, bmp, png.

And of course, already now, I am offering to you licenses to the new
Strokes Maker 2 version of the software, which at the moment is on the last (“cosmetic”) stage of its development.

Licenses are sent by email.


Thank you

story:
Restyle from Slim Trinity to a Classic Trinity

Restyle from Classic trinity to Travel Trinity

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help : Share our Project.

  • Facebook : share with your friends and like our page : http://bit.ly/facebookclassiccourtois
  • Instagram : Share with your friends and follow us : http://bit.ly/Instagramclassiccourtois
  • Twitter : Tweet about our project and follow us : http://bit.ly/twitterclassiccourtois

Risks & Challenges

Classic & Courtois is built on the foundation of three core values, what we call our Heart principles: 

  • Deliver WOW through customer experience 

The trilogy risks in managing a project are Delay – Cost – Quality. As certified project managers, we have taken several counter-measures to respect our delivery timeline. We have already lined up our manufacturing partners to begin ramping up production as soon the project is fully funded. Should any significant issue arise with our main partner, we have a second partner with who we can have a fast turnaround order for a higher manufacturing cost but our customer experience doesn’t stop at just delivering on time. Ensuring you are happy with our product throughout its existence is very crucial for us. In that vein, we will provide with a free luxury box. We are negotiated with some partner to provide you with the best leather product care to ensure your wallet ages well. 
Throughout and after the campaign, we made it a priority to answer any question from our backers in a max 12 hours as response time. 
How do we ensure a quality standard? First, we decide against partnering with any China manufacturer for that reason. Instead, we have two of the most trusted tanneries in the business as those two are the manufacturers as well for two of the most reputable luxury brands. 

  • Embrace and Deliver Change through Innovation 

From the beginning, we do not want to just make small leather goods. We want to make piece of leathers that transcend time. We have several other products in pipeline going through several innovation phases.

  • Passion 

We are passionate about small leather goods. We want to show pride in our brands and heritage, delight and serve our customers through the high quality of our products and services.

story:
THANK YOU FOR A LOVELY LAUNCH!

 

#BeTheFirstToWear this label!

 

Doing Fashion Differently

Inspired by real life. During years of research about ‘what women think is important in fashion’ we found many insights. Insights that we believe are relevant today and will be relevant tomorrow.

They became the fundament of everything we do.

That's why we make wardrobe essentials that have a high level of design, quality, versatility, and value for honest prices. Aesthetics is created to make it affordable and make sure every women has access to a luxurious and ethical wardrobe. 

Our goal is to celebrate the stunning women around us, helping them radiate beauty and confidence from the inside out whilst unlocking their full potential through each gorgeous getup. 

By backing our collection, you are pre-ordering beautiful, high quality basics that you can wear and keep forever. Pre-order now, and we'll follow up with you once the campaign closes for your order details (including size, style, and color selections). 

We want to feel special, feel authentic.

» So we decided to make only small amounts of everything we make.
» We decided to give all the designs small twists and surprises to become even
more authentic.

 

We believe quality is more important than quantity.

» That’s why we create more with less.
» We create timeless and versatile designs.
» We use high quality fabrics.

 

 

We think it is important to feel stylish... and comfortable. Anytime.

» That's why we only create fashion that feels and looks luxurious and stylish,
but feels comfortable.
» We only use luxurious fabrics that feel comfortable touching your skin.
» Good quality basics are a must for every woman

 

A Guilt-Free Way to Live a Life of Luxury

We depend on the Earth so we better start taking care of it, which is why we manufacture items with no waste, in less time, entirely made in Europe.

Designs that Last

Our mantra emphasizes minimalism and lasting, classic pieces to wear and keep forever. 

Travel with Ease

No dry cleaner needed, just toss it into the washing machine. Hang it up, the wrinkles will fall out. Perfect for the woman on the go.

 

Sizing Guide

Color Palette

 

Choose from a palette of lovely shades that will travel all seasons.
Please note: The styles are not available in ' Check'. The dress in 'check' is of course available.
The chambray blouse is only in chambray (powder blue).

HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE & COLOR: At end of campaign we will send a survey to find out style, size and color for each item.

Rewards

* FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

 

They learned us it is important to not be under- or overdressed on any occasion, especially the nice spontaneous ones.

» We design fashion for women to be perfectly dressed and fit in.. anytime!
» Perfect for business meetings or working days, but also for a date or on holidays

 

Join the movement!

Send us your old clothes. Make a difference today.

With every purchase from Aesthetics on Indiegogo we will send you a self-addressed envelope to fill up with items that aren't helping you live your best life. You mail it back to us and through our non-profit partner, Sympany, your donated clothing will be used to fund the good work of Khaloom. 

Khaloom creates high-end fabrics from production waste, together with artisans from India.

Khaloom turns the extreme amount of post-production textile waste into high-end fabrics. This gives them relatively low material costs, allowing  to provide excellent wages to employees. Two to three times the average salary in India. Worldwide approximately 15% of all fabrics end up as cutting waste, eventually thrown into landfills. India is the world’s second largest textile manufacturer, facing an increasing amount of textile waste. The Indian textile industry also has a long history of poor pay and working conditions. There are 4.3 million handloom workers, competing with mechanization. 57% of weavers are below the poverty line, and almost 80% are in debt. The majority are women.
 

 

 


For every donation you make for Khaloom, you will receive a €20 credit towards your next Aesthetics purchase. It's all about doing more with less and focus on things that matter.

 

Sustainability and consciousness is very important for women these days.

» So we create limited quantity without the waste
» All clothes are made in Europe in good working conditions.
» We support corporate social responsibility. Every product you purchase, you will receive a self- addressed enveloppe to send back old fabrics and clothes. In return you will get 20 euro reduction on your next purchase.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Production + Timing 

Production will require at the end of the campaign hence september 2017 ship date.


Fulfillment + Delivery 

We are working with the most reputable manufacturers to ensure that all orders are met and shipped on time. Production and shipping dates will also be dependent on how quickly backers return ordering information. If a high volume of orders or other unforeseen circumstances arise that may cause delays, we will communicate directly with all our backers and work to fix the problem. Our customers' happiness and enjoyment of this experience is most important to us.
The biggest challenges are brand awareness and the cost of the product. And while selling directly to the consumer (rather than retailers) keeps the price down, it could limit our reach. We need people like you who are willing to stay connected with a brand they believe in. Let's make it happen together and spread the word about Aesthetics beautiful and high quality products.

Exchange Policy 

If you're not happy with your clothing purchase you will be able to exchange it for a different size. If we don't have the same item available in your size, we will work with you to get you a comparable item that you love or accept returns!

Say Hi!

My name is Anámica and I'm the founder and designer behind Aesthetics The Label. After  some years of experience working in the industry, I decided to create a collection we can all relate to. Inspired by Real Life. By You. Aesthetics is about creating something new for today's modern woman -- Affordable quality essentials that makes us look and feel great. 

I believe fashion is not only about what we wear but what we can do and accomplish together. Like doing more with less materials.

I worked together with new designers from all over the world to test ideas, products and setting up an online shop. This whole experience in fashion gave me inspiration and insight. I learned so much from the everyday woman. We want to feel comfortable yet stylish. We want quality clothes we can easily transform from day to night. And we want to learn more about the products.

I believe this brand is all about putting their needs first and our job to do something amazing with it.

The idea was conceived and.. Aesthetics was born.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even when you can't contribute we would highly appreciate for you to spread the word about our campaign. We believe we are all in this together! Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools.

Questions, feedback? We would LOVE to hear from you! Email us at info@aestheticsthelabel.com
story_txt:
THANK YOU FOR A LOVELY LAUNCH!


 

#BeTheFirstToWear this label!
 


Doing Fashion Differently
Inspired by real life. During years of research about ‘what women think is important in fashion’ we found many insights. Insights that we believe are relevant today and will be relevant tomorrow.
They became the fundament of everything we do.
That's why we make wardrobe essentials that have a high level of design, quality, versatility, and value for honest prices. Aesthetics is created to make it affordable and make sure every women has access to a luxurious and ethical wardrobe. 
Our goal is to celebrate the stunning women around us, helping them radiate beauty and confidence from the inside out whilst unlocking their full potential through each gorgeous getup. 
By backing our collection, you are pre-ordering beautiful, high quality basics that you can wear and keep forever. Pre-order now, and we'll follow up with you once the campaign closes for your order details (including size, style, and color selections). 
We want to feel special, feel authentic.» So we decided to make only small amounts of everything we make.» We decided to give all the designs small twists and surprises to become evenmore authentic.

 
We believe quality is more important than quantity.» That’s why we create more with less.» We create timeless and versatile designs.» We use high quality fabrics.
 

 
We think it is important to feel stylish... and comfortable. Anytime.» That's why we only create fashion that feels and looks luxurious and stylish,but feels comfortable.» We only use luxurious fabrics that feel comfortable touching your skin.» Good quality basics are a must for every woman

 
A Guilt-Free Way to Live a Life of Luxury
We depend on the Earth so we better start taking care of it, which is why we manufacture items with no waste, in less time, entirely made in Europe.
Designs that Last
Our mantra emphasizes minimalism and lasting, classic pieces to wear and keep forever. 
Travel with Ease
No dry cleaner needed, just toss it into the washing machine. Hang it up, the wrinkles will fall out. Perfect for the woman on the go.
 
Sizing Guide

Color Palette

 
Choose from a palette of lovely shades that will travel all seasons.Please note: The styles are not available in ' Check'. The dress in 'check' is of course available.The chambray blouse is only in chambray (powder blue).
HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE & COLOR: At end of campaign we will send a survey to find out style, size and color for each item.
Rewards

* FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

 
They learned us it is important to not be under- or overdressed on any occasion, especially the nice spontaneous ones.» We design fashion for women to be perfectly dressed and fit in.. anytime!» Perfect for business meetings or working days, but also for a date or on holidays
 
Join the movement!

Send us your old clothes. Make a difference today.
With every purchase from Aesthetics on Indiegogo we will send you a self-addressed envelope to fill up with items that aren't helping you live your best life. You mail it back to us and through our non-profit partner, Sympany, your donated clothing will be used to fund the good work of Khaloom. Khaloom creates high-end fabrics from production waste, together with artisans from India.
Khaloom turns the extreme amount of post-production textile waste into high-end fabrics. This gives them relatively low material costs, allowing  to provide excellent wages to employees. Two to three times the average salary in India. Worldwide approximately 15% of all fabrics end up as cutting waste, eventually thrown into landfills. India is the world’s second largest textile manufacturer, facing an increasing amount of textile waste. The Indian textile industry also has a long history of poor pay and working conditions. There are 4.3 million handloom workers, competing with mechanization. 57% of weavers are below the poverty line, and almost 80% are in debt. The majority are women. 

 

 

For every donation you make for Khaloom, you will receive a €20 credit towards your next Aesthetics purchase. It's all about doing more with less and focus on things that matter.

 
Sustainability and consciousness is very important for women these days.
» So we create limited quantity without the waste» All clothes are made in Europe in good working conditions.» We support corporate social responsibility. Every product you purchase, you will receive a self- addressed enveloppe to send back old fabrics and clothes. In return you will get 20 euro reduction on your next purchase.
 

 
Risks & Challenges

Production + Timing 
Production will require at the end of the campaign hence september 2017 ship date.
Fulfillment + Delivery 
We are working with the most reputable manufacturers to ensure that all orders are met and shipped on time. Production and shipping dates will also be dependent on how quickly backers return ordering information. If a high volume of orders or other unforeseen circumstances arise that may cause delays, we will communicate directly with all our backers and work to fix the problem. Our customers' happiness and enjoyment of this experience is most important to us.The biggest challenges are brand awareness and the cost of the product. And while selling directly to the consumer (rather than retailers) keeps the price down, it could limit our reach. We need people like you who are willing to stay connected with a brand they believe in. Let's make it happen together and spread the word about Aesthetics beautiful and high quality products.
Exchange Policy 
If you're not happy with your clothing purchase you will be able to exchange it for a different size. If we don't have the same item available in your size, we will work with you to get you a comparable item that you love or accept returns!

My name is Anámica and I'm the founder and designer behind Aesthetics The Label. After  some years of experience working in the industry, I decided to create a collection we can all relate to. Inspired by Real Life. By You. Aesthetics is about creating something new for today's modern woman -- Affordable quality essentials that makes us look and feel great. I believe fashion is not only about what we wear but what we can do and accomplish together. Like doing more with less materials.I worked together with new designers from all over the world to test ideas, products and setting up an online shop. This whole experience in fashion gave me inspiration and insight. I learned so much from the everyday woman. We want to feel comfortable yet stylish. We want quality clothes we can easily transform from day to night. And we want to learn more about the products.I believe this brand is all about putting their needs first and our job to do something amazing with it.The idea was conceived and.. Aesthetics was born.Other Ways You Can HelpEven when you can't contribute we would highly appreciate for you to spread the word about our campaign. We believe we are all in this together! story:
OUR COMPANY- CONCENTRI

We are a Hong Kong based company who focuses on creating accessories and gifts, using our best gift from nature- natural resources. CONCENTRI is constantly curious about the fabrics and mass that surrounds us, to explore and gain understanding towards these natural materials and reveal to the world its finest and most desirable qualities. Designed in Hong Kong, we look into the world we live in and create everyday products from it.

 

OUR FIRST COLLECTION- MARMO

Our first collection MARMO resonates with marble in Italian language. The three main colors of MARMO, Black, White & Green, were carefully chosen to highlight the significance of our usage of luxury marble carefully sourced in Italy.

Nero Marquina- Black/   Verde Alpi- Green/   BiancoCarrara- White

Marble is Nature’s very own work of art, a metaphysical form of time.  Yet within the luminous delicacy and elegance, each piece of marble we use is still uniformly sturdy and durable

 

We believe that the combination of our meticulously selected marble and timeless design would be the ideal art piece to present the gift of nature.

 

Our MARMO watches come in two sizes: 41mm & 33mm.

 

OUR STRAPS

To suit the ever changing and busy city lifestyles, you can change different straps whenever you want! Our stainless steel straps and Italian genuine leather straps are chic and elegant, we also have a range of bright colours for your selection if you wish to spice things up!

 

Our genuine leather straps come in 3 styles:

Natural / Croc / Melezet

NOTE: You can select the strap material during purchase. Upon order confirmation, we will contact you directly with colour selections for you to pick. 

 

Our straps are high quality and easy to mix-and-match with whichever colour MARMO you have! The Buckle will match with the case colour no matter what colour leather strap you have chosen.

 

Our stainless steel mesh band comes in a default colour:

White: Rose Gold/    Green: Gold/    Black:Black

 

OUR DESIGN

Within a society of racing pace, fast fashion and hasty taste, our simple and timeless designs will provide a consistency within your daily life. Easy and convenient to match any styles, our designs are concise, considered and classic – essential for every modern person.

 

 

Designed in Hong Kong, our designs strive to combine fashionable attributes with classic natural materials, also to merge Chinese and Western influences that defines the Hong Kong culture. Through mixing classic materials with vibrant heuds, we hope to bring a splash of colour and joy to brighten your daily lives.

 

 

OUR PACKAGING

For our Indiegogo customers, we have designed an exclusive deluxe box for your MARMO watch to express our appreciation for your support!

We care deeply about the environment around us and the natural material we promote, hence the packaging we use, from the box to our printed leaflets, are all eco-friendly and FSC approved. 

 

OUR TIMELINE

Our watches are currently in production and should be ready for dispatch in early/mid December!

*We would love to deliver MARMO to you asap! However life is full of uncertainties and while our vendors are perfectly reliable, there might be hiccups in life and this estimated delivery time may change. But one thing is for certain- we will keep you up to date!

 

OUR STORY

CONCENTRI believes in a world where we share the same passion, same love, same vision and explore the world’s boundless opportunities. All circles, spheres or arcs that share a common centre are considered to be ‘concentric’ in geometric terms.

In the same notion, CONCENTRI believes that all walks of life, all streams of beliefs share the same common origin of love and light.

CONCENTRI yearns to share our vision, our concepts, our aesthetics with you; to walk together and explore our parallel goals; to inspire and be inspired; to find perfection within the imperfect; to complete the incomplete; to be concentric with CONCENTRI.

 

CONCENTRI holds a constant admiration for nature and appreciation for culture. Through simple, timeless designs and meticulous attention to detail, CONCENTRI shall awake your imagination and together create a sophisticated and colourful future.

 

OUR CAMPAIGN

 

OUR WARRANTY

Warranty Term: One year from the date of dispatch. This warranty covers manufacturing defects on the watch itself (movement, case, glass). Other parts than the above are not covered by this warranty. To have replacement covered under this warranty performed, please email us at CS@theconcentri.com and ensure to specify your name, address, order number and a detailed description of the issue. Finally, write ‘reclaim of purchase’ as subject of the email or letter.

Got a question? Let us know! Email us at CS@theconcentri.com  and we guarantee to get back to you within 24 hours!

story:
We're here to build a media community for those and things we all feel Nostalgic about. Memories is what our goal is via our media site and other outlets we utilize. We'll daily bring different memories from times past that we hope brings Nostalgia back to you. You who love great memories can help facilitate our model.

Our plan as we grow the plan is to acquire a better production and licensing to produce and recreate things we've known and loved from different media of the past. Your contribution will help grow our community and build the brand.

We also plan to have giveaways of some collectables we acquire and sell other rare and unique Nostalgic items. Watch us via our website and social networks for more, and hope you'll become part of our Feelin' Nostalgic community. Any contribution to our goal would be graciously accepted and used to grow this venture. For an actual account of how wel'll spend what is raised keep up with our website and our news page.

Thanks for checking us out and we hope to keep you Feelin' Nostalgic.

story:
About the concept store

Porto Brazil is famous for its colourful bikinis, swimsuits, summer dresses, jumpsuits and cover-ups for women. All the products are designed by an in-house team and manufactured locally in Brazil. The main office is in Madrid, Spain. Porto Brazil has for several years been working on a projec to make 1 concept store in the prime fashion street in Madrid. Finally the company has found the perfect location and building.

The idea is to make 4 floors of the building with products from Porto Brazil. Each floor will have an own product category: Beachwear, lingerie, fitness and dresses.

Restaurant & Lounge

Porto Brazil will make a restaurant and lounge concept on the two top floors of the building. The restaurant and lounge will serve a mix of Brazilian and Spanish cuisine. We will provide the best of both worlds and create a unique environment and customer experience. The restaurant will also serve famous Brazilian fruit drinks and delicious grilled fish and meat. The restaurant and lounge lounge will be open every day between 10:00 am - 00:00. Every day between 21:00 pm - 00:00  there will be different DJs and artists who will create the right mood.

The founder and the brand

Kjetil Torper is an Norwegian entrepreneur with 15 years of international experience in building  companies. He is the CEO and founder of the clothing brand Porto Brazil. Porto Brazil is the product of a trip that Torper made to Brazil in 2009. He fell in love with the country, people and culture. Since starting out with only a small office in North of Brazil in 2009, Porto Brazil is now a (still a small brand), but a global brand with employees from several countries such as Brazil, Venezuela, Spain,  Germany, USA, Sweden, Norway and more. Today Porto Brazil manufactures more than 100 different styles of products.

Torper is educated from the Faculty of Law in Oslo, Norway. He  lives in Madrid Spain, but travels every second months to Brazil. He is 100% committed to  Porto Brazil and he is the heart and mind behind the operation.  He speaks 5 languages (Norwegian, Portuguese, English, Spanish and German). Torper today leads a team of 40 employees in Porto Brazil from their main office in Madrid. The company is about more then designing clothes, its about a  creating culture. A culture of no to racism, yes to equality and equal opportunities for all, no to slave labor and yes to the environment and community-friendly textile production. Porto Brazil is working for a better community with something as simple as selling beautiful clothes. 

How to fund the concept store

The total cost of the concept store is 625 000 euros. The founder and his partners can cover 325 000 euros of this ammount, and the product costs. The project then miss 300 000 euros to start the project. Porto Brazil has 30 000 amazing products in stock in their warehouse in Madrid. There is no better way of finance this projec then handing out amazing swimsuits, summer dresses, fitness clothes as perks to finance the project. The perks in discounted up to -70% of normal sales price!

In addition to this, we invite up to 200 people to visit us in Madrid after the concept store has opened. This must be done by a booking-calendar, but can start immediately after the opening of the concept store. Included in the visit there are 6 nights for free as the company has access to a 2000 ft. penthouse with 4 bedrooms and bathrooms. Porto Brazil provides an exclusive VIP tour of the entire project, personal guide in Madrid, as well as dinner in new restaurant. Simply an unforgettable experience!

If the funding is not completed the company will work hard to try meet the final investment-goal. Anyway the funding will be spent in developing more great products and PR in order to increase the sales and get to the final goal. 

Experience

From the season 2017 the company opened 4 self-owned shops in Madrid to test the market in Europe for Porto Brazil. The average size of the shops are approx. 1.000 sq. ft. The shops were opened to test Porto Brazil products in Europe, and also gain as much data as possible about clients such as: approx. age, income, purchase pr. Client, average price pr. ticket etc.etc. The company gained much important info and knowledge during this operation and has also been building up an important group of employees. The plan it so close the 4 shops and move them into the new concept store. 

Celebs and influencers 

Porto Brazil has been using the last few years to create PR campaigns with various international celebrities in order to build up sales platforms and expectations for the future. The brand cooperates with international celebrities and influencers such as Rihanna, Kylie Jenner, Paris Hilton and more. 

Risks and challenges

Porto Brazil has for the last 10 years developed unique products such as bikinis, summer dresses, lingerie, fitness products and more. The company has allready more then 30 000 products in stock to start up both the funding and concept store. Porto Brazil need's your help to get the property and get the concept store started. Porto Brazil promise you that you will receive a solid product that goes through the same quality assurance steps that we have went through with all our products the last 10 years. 

Objectives  

To create a demand for the clothing brand Porto Brazil primary in Spain – then globally - To become the nr. 1 beachwear brand (bikinis and summer wear) in Europe within 8 years. And also been one of the most important lingerie and fitness brands in Europe.  

To open a flagship store in Madrid, Spain during May 2018. When the first flagship store has been operating for approx. 1 year and showing sufficient numbers – open more equal flagship stores in Europe and the US. 

To have a customer base of 40,000 potential clients for the self-owned web shop only in Spain, by the end of 2018. The company has already a client list of 25 000 potential clients (people registered by email from sales, competitions etc.).   

To be an active and vocal member for sustainable textile production in Brazil, and using Brazilian-textile production as a piece of PR-campaigns for the company.  

Develop the clothing brand Porto Brazil globally; targeting medium/ high – income, urban females aged 18 – 35. Using international celebrities and influencers as guest designers and product placement to ensure the demand for Porto Brazil. Being number one clothing brand in social medias such as Instagram, Facebook etc.  

Keys to Success  

To succeed in the clothing industry and the concept store within summer clothes, gym wear, dresses and lingerie, Porto Brazil must:  - Carry an assortment of sizes and design to fit potential customers worldwide.  - Provide customers with top internet web shop   - Advertise and promote the concept store also online. Continuously review products, internet stores and social medias in connection with the concept store.

story:
Dear Friends & Family,

Continuing to find my magic!  Here's an entry I wrote, reflecting, two years  after I was diagnosed with my brain tumor:

I remember the relief my life was changing - there was something bigger -- I was meant for something more...I remember dear sweet faces and love oozing from everyone and everything around me.  I remember joy and tears.  I remember questions and constant conversations.  I remember life so brilliant it hurt.

I remember saying to myself, "this is amazing, don't let go of this magic."

Since my diagnosis and treatment a little over 5 years ago I've worked hard to focus on maintaining that magic.  As with everything in life that magic feeling has ebbed and flowed but I  managed to create an epic foundation for my next adventure; purchasing Cynthia's and making it my own. 

In early January 2018 I was at a crossroads in my role as a Patient Navigator at WVCI.  I continued to serve on the board for Positive Community Kitchen  http://www.positivecommunitykitchen.org/.  Application deadlines were due for two MSW programs I was planning to apply for to acquire my masters in social work  and continue to work at WVCI    I was simultaneously grappling with a life long dream of opening my own business; specifically an eclectic boutique providing cancer survivorship products, gifts, clothes and cards in an inviting space to host support groups, guest speakers and small events.   I had been perusing available retail spaces on Main Street in downtown Springfield and day dreaming about my own business.  In my role as a patient navigator we referred our breast patients to Cynthia's.  I referred patients to Cynthia's but I had never been to her shop or met her.  I decided one day in February, I would go meet Cynthia Crawford and introduce myself and explain my role at WVCI.  I shared this plan with a coworker and she disclosed Cynthia was looking to retire.  The stars were aligning in a big way!  I did go meet Cynthia, introduced myself, explained my role...and then I told her I would love to buy her business!  We sat together in her fitting room and we talked for over an hour.  It seemed to be perfect - and a loud and clear answer to what avenue to pursue.  Magic.

So here I am, 6 months later, SBA loan approved, aligning my mastectomy fitter certification and facility accreditation.  I have secured my retail space and I'm asking for some help with my final business details.

story:
Campaign Update February 2016:

We have shipped all crowdfunding orders! Thousands of people in 67 countries have received their Soundbrenner Pulse! We continue to take orders on www.soundbrenner.com and offer worldwide shipping via expedited courier (with tracking and insurance). 

Any questions? Send to youareawesome@soundbrenner.com

PS: Download our free standalone app “The Metronome by Soundbrenner” for iOS at https://goo.gl/BivAYK, for Android at https://goo.gl/Ejruwi


An accurate inner sense of rhythm is one of the most important characteristics of a skilled musician! Everyone from our music teachers to world class players tell us to use a metronome if we want to become a great musician.

But regular metronomes are annoying to use, take the passion out of making music and haven't improved in 200 years! That’s why we created the metronome of the 21st century: The Soundbrenner Pulse. It's packed with so many awesome features that you'll look for excuses to use it more often!


"Think of how many times you've missed a call because you didn't feel your phone's wimpy vibrations. The vibrating mechanism in the Soundbrenner Pulse is six times stronger than your smartphone's."

Andrew Liszewski, Gizmodo


"Unlike the vibration of a smart phone, the Pulse’s vibration is strong and well defined, with precise beginning and end points."

Christopher Scapelliti, Guitar Player Magazine


      

       

       

           



Finally a metronome that you will actually love using!

Many musicians think the audible click of a metronome takes the passion out of music - we agree! The click might even make you sound robotic. The vibration of the Soundbrenner Pulse guides you more naturally, as if someone would tap you on your shoulder.

It makes sense, if you think about it: Making music, we often tap our foot or move our body a bit. The feeling of the vibration integrates in that body feeling. That’s why you don’t need to focus so much as you would have to with an audible click. Focus on your music instead.


Apple Watch vs. Soundbrenner Pulse


Master the most difficult part of your songs!

Practicing with a metronome is extremely useful for learning to accurately play rapid passages, to make sure you are neither rushing or dragging the tempo and to simply keep you honest to yourself until you've got the tempo 100% right. 

Our iOS and Android app was designed to be the powerful tool that can help you to master all of this!

Develop a rock-solid inner sense of rhythm!

You don't practice with a metronome to sound like a mechanical robot. You practice with it because you want to develop an inner pulse that stays with you forever. Once you have mastered playing on a stable rhythm you can then later choose to add certain nuances and more feel to your music as well!

Tempo maps & MIDI Sync

For those who don't always play to the same BPM or time signature throughout a song, we added the possibility to create tempo maps. Set up the different time signatures and rhythm patterns for each sections of your songs in the mobile app and save them into set lists for easy access!

And if you already use a click track in a music production software, we thought about you too...

Create the click track straight in your favorite DAW and synchronize it via MIDI with the vibrations of the Soundbrenner Pulse. (Compatible with Ableton Live, Avid Pro Tools, Logic Pro X, and more! Macs only)

... and many more!

Now you can use the Soundbrenner Pulse for audio recordings, live performances, professional music production, to help you compose your own songs and much more!


Synchronize your band!

With "Multi-Link" simply connect all Soundbrenner Pulse in the room to the same Android or iOS phone. This smartphone serves as the hub for control and can set the tempo and the rhythm pattern for up to 10 connected Soundbrenner Pulse! Every device will vibrate in perfect synchronization.


Change the Tempo right on your device!

With BPM Tap and the BPM Wheel you can change the tempo in seconds without taking the smartphone out of your pocket.


How to change the tempo

You will be able to wear the device literally ANYWHERE!

And today the Soundbrenner Pulse already comes with these bands:

Worn Everywhere

Each Soundbrenner Pulse comes with two bands. The short band is designed for the wrist and can also be worn by children, the long band is designed for the upper arm and the leg. Depending on your instrument and preference you can try out at home which location you prefer and comfortably switch out the bands.


RGB LED

Visualize the beat and customize the colors or switch the LED off in "Discreet Mode”

Click on the perk to have extra information. 

What other musicians think:


 

Haptic Feedback vs. Vibrational Alerts

Technology commonly used today in smartphones and smartwatches can only deliver weak, vibrational alerts. Unlike that, Soundbrenner uses patented technology to create the most advanced vibrations possible today.

Using a haptic driver to control the ERM vibration motor located inside the device, the Soundbrenner Pulse has the ability to deliver amazingly accurate haptic feedback in the form of strong, distinct vibrations that are easily felt against a musician’s skin. This allows the Soundbrenner Pulse to transfer information through vibrations, enabling the musician to be naturally aware of the pulse.

Vibration Strength

Internal Design


We're a team of entrepreneurial musicians and technologists from Berlin. We started this project with the dream of building smart technology that will help us all become better musicians. Being musicians ourselves, we know that making music involves a lot of hard work and practice. However, we also believe that leveraging the latest technology can help make that journey as exciting and efficient as possible! We've been working on this project for the past year and it has taken us all over the world. More than 100 musicians were part of the development process to help us get the details right. After this long journey we're unbelievably happy to launch the product and to have you onboard as an early supporter!

After graduating from the Hardware.co Accelerator in Berlin we set out with an unusually ambitious goal for crowdfunding: deliver an actually well-made product on time. To keep our promise we spent the past months in the lions den of hardware: Asia. Here we developed our product together with the help of Brinc's integrated platform and unparalleled access to manufacturing and distribution partners. As a result today we hold a fully functional product in our hands that was created with manufacturing already in mind. Unlike others before us, we'll have prepared and vetted every step of the production process even before our campaign has ended to ensure that we eliminate a majority of the wasted time most startups run into post-crowdfunding. We couldn’t be more confident to be able to keep our promise: you will receive an actually well-made product on time. However, please do remember that the product is not in mass production yet. That means delivery of rewards/perks are subject to our best efforts and can't be guaranteed. 

  • Diameter of the face: 1.75" or 4.5 cm
  • Black casing; water-resistant silicon straps in two lengths
  • Motor: Advanced high-quality Ecentric Rotating Mass (ERM) vibration motor; rated 6G
  • Battery Life: approx. 4~5 hours standard metronome functionality
  • Charging station: Universal Micro USB socket to recharge the lithium polymer battery; (each charge lasts 5 hours; 1 hour to charge)
  • RGB LED lights: Illuminate the logo and wheel in user-definable colors and flash to the beat
  • User Input: Capacitive touch sensor for tapping interaction; Discrete-step wheel to finely adjust the BPM
  • Connectivity: Bluetooth Smart™, compatible with iPhone 4S and newer, most Android phones (link: http://www.bluetooth.com/Pages/Bluetooth-Smart-...)
  • Mobile Apps: iOS 7 and newer; Android 4.0 and newer

Why don't you just make an app for a smartwatch?

Better than words, here's the reason why: https://youtu.be/HPw8oE61a1w

Does it actually work to follow the rhythm with vibrations?

Vibrations dont equal vibrations. While it is very difficult to pick up the rhythm through the vibrations of a smartwatch or smartphone we have developed a vibration that offers the necessary amplitude and accuracy to be a great tool to pick up the beat.

Has this been tested with musicians?

Yes. We have been talking to a lot of musicians from day one. Many of the features you've seen are a result from the deep understanding of the musicians needs we got during product testing.

How long will the battery last?

The battery will approximately last 4-5 hours. If you practice with the device 30 minutes per day this will give you at least 1 week worth of battery life.

Do I need a smartphone to use the Soundbrenner Pulse?

No. The device can be turned on/off directly on the device. The rhythm can be adjusted with the BPM Wheel and the BPM Tap. However, for more in depth functionality a smartphone is necessary.

Does the device work with both iOS and Android phones?

Yes. We will offer a iOS and Android App from day one.

Is it waterproof?

The device was designed to be sweat proof but it shouldn't be submerged in water.

I live outside of the United States, can I pre-order a Soundbrenner Pulse?

Yes. Soundbrenner Pulse will ship worldwide in November. For US residents shipping is free. For people living outside of the US please add $20 for shipping.

Does the Soundbrenner Pulse come in my size?

Yes. The device comes with two different sized bands in which it can be inserted. We designed the bands to be suitable for everyone: Children, men and women.

How do I contact someone of the Soundbrenner team?

Please visit our Contact Page on our website www.soundbrenner.com

Are you really the world’s first wearable device for musicians?

Technically even a guitar is a "wearable device" for musicians. However, what is commonly known as a wearable device today is a connected piece of electronics with communication and data input technologies. For more information see: http://www.wearabledevices.com/what-is-a-wearable-device/

How does MIDI Sync work?

The MIDI sync works via a Soundbrenner desktop application for Mac and Windows, which would show up in any DAW as a MIDI device. If you choose to send a MIDI Clock signal to the app, it will be used to trigger vibrations on the device.
Latency will be compensated within the software, so that the synchronization is seamless. Your computer has to be Bluetooth Smart compatible (most modern notebooks and computers offer this functionality. Alternatively buy an inexpensive USB dongle to receive Bluetooth Smart compatibility)

story:
Follow Jake’s Journey

 

Become one of Sandies Dandies!

Dandy (definition) – “A person unduly devoted to style, neatness and fashion in dress and appearance”

 

What the heck is Sandies Dandies?

Sandies Dandies is a fan club that will be made up of people that are willing to help Jake Sanders financially as he seeks to begin his career as a professional golfer and evaluate his true potential for playing golf at the highest level. 

 

Who is Jake Sanders?

Jake Sanders, age 24, is seeking to begin the journey that all aspiring young golfers dream of.  That dream is to play golf for a living and achieve golfing success at the highest level, the PGA Tour.  The first order of business to make that dream a reality is to START. 

 

Jake is a humble small town kid from Crookston, Minnesota – a town of approximately 8,000 people located in the Northwest corner of the state.  I have been impressed with Jake from the first time I had the chance to compete against him.  I’ve had the opportunity to watch him grow not just as a golfer, but as a true player.  He has all the tools.  His mechanics are sound, he hits it a mile, all facets of his game are strong, and he has a terrific demeanor on the course.  I believe the sky is the limit for Jake”. 

-Scott Lindgren, former golf professional and Charter Member of Sandies Dandies

 

Jake’s Golf Background

Jake is a 4-time Minnesota Class A State Tournament participant, with All State honors from 2005-2007.  He was either MVP or Co-MVP of his high school team as a Sophomore, Junior and Senior.  As a Senior at the University of Minnesota, Crookston, Jake was a member of the NSIC All Conference Team as well as the Ping All Region Team.  His career low score is 61 (-11) and he holds several records from his time at UMC.  His game has continued to improve since the end of his collegiate golf career with wins in both stroke play and match play formats at local competitions.  It’s time to help Jake test the waters at a higher level.

 

In 2013

We are looking for new members of Sandies Dandies!  The goal in 2013 is to raise $20,000, enough financial support to allow Jake to participate on the Dakotas Tour.  The Dakotas Tour schedule is made up of 16 events conducted in the months of June, July and August.  The money raised would provide for entry fees, hotel, food and fuel.  It will also allow Jake to work with a Swing Coach on a regular basis.  Winnings from 2013 Dakotas Tour events will go towards entry fee and travel costs for future events and hopefully one day, a trip to Q School.  There is no guarantee of success and Jake is well aware of that, but he is a young man worthy of being given a chance and he could use our help.  Join us as a Dandy today!

 

The Role of A Dandy

The role of A Dandy is to provide whatever financial support they can to give Jake a chance to pursue his dream.  A Dandy will dress as a Dandy while on the golf course (Dandies clothing will be available on the Sandies Dandies website beginning June 2013) whenever possible.  A Dandy will promote Sandies Dandies to his/her golfing buddies and recruit others to become members.  A Dandy will follow Jake’s progress on the Sandies Dandies website and Facebook.  A Dandy doesn’t look for anything in return for their contribution.  You get the satisfaction of helping a deserving young man pursue his dream!

 

The Benefits of Becoming a Dandy

We liken it to Fantasy Football, but for golf!  It may cost you $25, $100 or even $500 or more.  That’s up to you.  However, just like Fantasy Football, it is entertainment and it gives you something to look forward to every week as you follow along.  The rewards are not financial, but we are asking that you join us in giving Jake a chance.  To do so, click on the donate button right here on Indiegogo and choose a level of support.  All levels of support will give you membership to Sandies Dandies and each level has its own perks.  Here is a list of some of them:

  • Getting to caddy for Jake in a tournament
  • Receive a Nike ½ Zip Pullover with the Dandies Logo
  • Receive a Nike Golf Polo with the Dandies Logo
  • Receive a “D” Golf Towel
  • Receive an autographed photo of Jake
  • Receive a Sandies Dandies “D” sticker for your rear car window – it’s a conversation starter
  • Receive a framed Sandies Dandies member certificate

 

So, what if he doesn’t ever make it?

 

WHAT IF HE DOES????  GIVE HIM A CHANCE AND JOIN US TODAY!

We are looking for new members of Sandies Dandies!  The goal in 2013 is to raise $20,000, enough financial support to allow Jake to participate on the Dakotas Tour.  The Dakotas Tour schedule is made up of 16 events conducted in the months of June, July and August.  The money raised would provide for entry fees, hotel, food and fuel.  It will also allow Jake to work with a Swing Coach on a regular basis.  Winnings from 2013 Dakotas Tour events will go towards entry fee and travel costs for future events and hopefully one day, a trip to Q School.  There is no guarantee of success and Jake is well aware of that, but he is a young man worthy of being given a chance and he could use our help.  Join us as a Dandy today!
 
The Role of A Dandy
The role of A Dandy is to provide whatever financial support they can to give Jake a chance to pursue his dream.  A Dandy will dress as a Dandy while on the golf course (Dandies clothing will be available on the Sandies Dandies website beginning June 2013) whenever possible.  A Dandy will promote Sandies Dandies to his/her golfing buddies and recruit others to become members.  A Dandy will follow Jake’s progress on the Sandies Dandies website and Facebook.  A Dandy doesn’t look for anything in return for their contribution.  You get the satisfaction of helping a deserving young man pursue his dream!
 
The Benefits of Becoming a Dandy
We liken it to Fantasy Football, but for golf!  It may cost you $25, $100 or even $500 or more.  That’s up to you.  However, just like Fantasy Football, it is entertainment and it gives you something to look forward to every week as you follow along.  The rewards are not financial, but we are asking that you join us in giving Jake a chance.  To do so, click on the donate button right here on Indiegogo and choose a level of support.  All levels of support will give you membership to Sandies Dandies and each level has its own perks.  Here is a list of some of them:

Getting to caddy for Jake in a tournament
Receive a Nike ½ Zip Pullover with the Dandies Logo
Receive a Nike Golf Polo with the Dandies Logo
Receive a “D” Golf Towel
Receive an autographed photo of Jake
Receive a Sandies Dandies “D” sticker for your rear car window – it’s a conversation starter
Receive a framed Sandies Dandies member certificate
 
So, what if he doesn’t ever make it?
 
WHAT IF HE DOES????  GIVE HIM A CHANCE AND JOIN US TODAY!

story:
A unique wood collectible you can edit to access anything online. It's Art & Technology, but what you do with it will make it your own.

Our 15 Day Campaign Explained

Our campaign will only be for 15 days, as this will let you have QR-Cubes in time for Christmas.

2D to 3D... and Beyond!

Our QR-Cubes have unique encrypted QR codes etched into the cube sides. These special codes access the 'Cube Matrix', where they are decrypted, identified, and the browser that scanned it redirects to wherever you, the QR-Cube's owner, have decided to send your visitor. This takes you beyond the 3D cube and into a whole new dimension of possibilities.



Get Creative

The QR-Cube can be programmed with your favorite links and sit on your desk as a sort of Vanity Cube, but since each side of the QR-Cube can be programmed as often as you like, why stop there?

As a Gift Cube, program it to whatever websites your partner loves.

As an Event Cube, It can start out as an announcement, then an invitation, then through the steps until the event is done, then it can become a ink to a photo gallery as a memento to the event.

As a Business Cube it can be programmed to deliver incentives, special offers or deals.

One of my favorites is using a QR-Cube as a wedding cube... It's an announcement, then an invitation, then a link to gift registries, maps of the ceremony, menu at the reception, follow up with personal Thanks Yous, Gallery Links and... well, you get the idea. It's a memento that can change with the times. Then, when it's all done it can remain with your guests as a gallery and keepsake.

Or how about programming a QR-Cube as a 'clue sheet' for corporate scavenger-hunt or team-building exercises?

Here are few more ideas, but your imagination is your only limit!

Some QR-Cube Uses...

  • Gifts: Personal, Business
  • Trip Planning: Destinations, Intineraries
  • Rewards, Contests
  • Marketing: Radio, TV Stations,
  • Promotions: Incentives, Restaurants, Hotels
  • Wedding: Announcement, Invitations, Galleries
  • Gaming: Program your own game! Link others
  • Dating Website
  • Mementos: Link to what you want remembered
  • Annual Family Cube: Links to Blogs, Galleries, etc.
  • Charities: Unique Communication Tool
  • Artists: Tour Dates, Calendars, Exhibitions, Personal Updates

And A Few Things You Can Link To...

  • Favorite Sites (like Indiegogo!)
  • Current Sales or Promotions
  • Gift Registries, Gift Lists
  • Announcement Pages
  • Holiday Destinations
  • News Sites or Feeds
  • Schedules
  • Galleries, Collections
  • YouTube Videos
  • Desired Christmas Gift List
  • And of course, Facebook and Twitter


So is it Art or Technology?... Well, Yes!

The QR-Cube is art: Each one blends old and new with its classic cube form inscribed with the most current of modern hieroglyphics: QR codes. Every one is an individual piece - there are no two the same - with every code on every side of every cube being unique. Clearly, a work of art.

The QR-Cube is technology: Each side features a unique encoded link to the Cube Matrix, an online portal which assigns where in the world each QR-Cube points. Owners log in to the Cube Matrix and set the links up as they like, when they like. Programmable wood. Clearly,Technology.


Get Started

We’ve gone to extraordinary lengths to design a complete user experience:

QR-Cubes are made of a durable hardwood and deeply laser engraved codes minimize the possibility of physical corruption.
The Cube Matrix interface is intuitive and simple to use so you can spend less time coding links and more time deciding where they go.
Our blog is and will continue to be a source of ideas and inspirations for cool QR-Cube uses.
Read on for more details on what you’ll help bring into the world (and maybe onto your desktop) if you support this effort.

We are ready for full production with your support.

So where are we in this whole process? We’ve:

  • Formed an awesome team in Calgary and Texas
  • Tested and refined QR code and layout generation
  • Built and tested two generations of prototypes
  • Tested a wide range of materials and processes
  • Written and optimized thousands of lines of code
  • Built a fully operational small scale version of the Cube Matrix

We’re here on Indiegogo first because we're ready to set up dedicated production to get your QR-Cube delivered as soon as possible. We need a dedicated Laser Engraver to do that.

Secondly, we need to move the Cube Matrix to a more robust and expandable Cloud-based platform. This will ensure quick responses on your QR-Cube scans.

We take these last crucial steps seriously, and we’ll need a lot of support to do the job right. That’s why we’ve turned to Indiegogo to get QR-Cubes up and running!

Indiegogo Perks


Gamma Cubes: Natural Wood and White 2 1/2" QR-Cubes

Delta Cubes: Natural Wood and White 2" QR-Cubes

Alpha Cubes: Natural Wood and White 1.5" QR-Cubes

If you decide to pitch in, you’ll be one of the first to have our product. But more importantly, you’ll play a huge part in starting the QR-Cube revolution by providing your feedback and creating amazing things with your own QR-Cube. We can’t wait to see what you come up with!

Holiday QR-Cubes

We've been able to arrange to deliver a select number of QR-Cubes almost immediately after our Indiegogo campaign ends. So we have doubled up the perks to allocate a small quantity for special pre-holiday shipping. So pick the right shipping; this will ensure your QR-Cube gift can get to where it needs to be in time for the holidays.


Santa Cubes!


On the other hand, If you can wait a bit longer to get your cube, it will be just a bit cheaper for you.

Shipping Information

DON'T FORGET TO PLEDGE FOR SHIPPING OR WE CANNOT DELIVER YOUR REWARD!

ADD SHIPPING TO ALL PURCHASES:

USA: Small Packet Air Postal Service. Not trackable. Takes about ten days. Please add $8 (Not for the Holidays)!

USA: UPS Ground Service, Trackable. Takes about 6 days. Please add $12.

USA: UPS Express Service, Trackable. Overnight Please add $26.

CANADA: Expedited Parcel Post, Trackable. Takes about 3-5 days. Please add $12.

CANADA: Express Post Parcel, Trackable. Takes about 2-3 days. Please add $16.

INTERNATIONAL: Small Packet Air Postal Service. Not trackable. Takes about ten days plus. Please add $12. (Not for the Holidays)!

 

Special Thanks To:

Neil Speers, Alberta Portrait Photography

Katherine Prawl

Steve Hardy

Julia Harrison

My Wife, without whom this could not have come together!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Similar to many Indiegogo projects, we face several key risks and challenges in sparking the QR-Cube revolution. The primary risks for us include:

ENGINEERING

To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience that we have, we have to design and engineer a very complex distributed system. We have taken two key steps to ensure our engineering success. 1) We have formed an amazing team of engineers and designers, and 2) we test our systems with a passion for perfection. In the last year, we have built 3 generations of code generators, 2 generations of production layup tools and created a working version of the Cube Matrix. We have a beta run of the Cube Matrix with significant user testing, and we keep enormous amounts of data to guide our future work.

SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICS

Many Indiegogo campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues finding suppliers and engineering machines for high production volumes. Smooth execution is absolutely essential to overcoming such risks. We take this lesson seriously and have been working for months negotiating with suppliers, testing machine quality, and building a team that can execute on our promises. Our plans are fully in place, and we now mainly require the resources to execute them.

TEAM

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Success in our venture requires a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs. We have already formed a truly awesome (and fun!) team, but we will have to bring in more Cubelings to realize this dream. In fact, we are actively looking for new members to join us and hit the ground running! Check out our website for more information.

story:
This video is just one of many stories showing how Seattle Area Support Groups & Community Center (SASG) is helping people find healing and support.  If you are touched by Nancy's story, please help us to kick off our new summer fundraising event, Bat 'n' Rouge!

 

This is ‘high heels and makeup Vs. flannel and tube socks’ softball!

Help us set the stage for you to lay down your blanket, load up at the concession stand and watch the butch women duke it out against the girlie boys in the most outrageous softball game Seattle has ever seen!  We will be serving up hot dogs, chips, beverages and other goodies for you to enjoy as you watch a truly entertaining game of softball.

What are we fundraising for?

We are raising money to fund THE summer event of 2013 – Bat 'n' Rouge, a charity softball game to benefit SASG.  Come watch the fun and cheer for your favorite team in support of a fabulous community cause!

Who will your support help?

Your generous donations will help cover the cost of putting on this event.

Why should you support us?

We know you believe in helping others, we know you care about your brothers and sisters in the LGBTQ community, and we know you want to watch some of Seattle’s most outrageous dykes and drag queens play softball against each other. 

Every dollar you give here will help us to put on the best game ever!  

When and where:

Saturday, August 17, 2013, 12-4pm

Bobby Morris Playfield, Cal Anderson Park

1635 11th Ave, Seattle, Wa

story:
We are a philanthropic apparel and lifestyle brand aimed at helping our local  communities - utilizing distinct fashion as a vehicle of change. We produce very limited unit and authentic clothing that is proudly made in the USA. Everyone has the opportunity to serve a purpose greater than themselves and leave a lasting positive impact.

Most clothing brands are giving either 0% or 10% of their profits to charity. Well, in our opinion, this simply was not enough to have a true lasting impact on those in need. As such, we promise that 20% of the selling price of each of our Grace and Glory crewnecks sold will go to a cause of of your choice from our "supported causes" listing below. We will personally notify you via email as to which organization received your donation.

Below is a list of causes that we are currently supporting. You will pick a cause from this list that you feel most passionate about supporting. 20% of your Glory or Grace purchase's selling price will be donated to a charitable organization that is dedicated to your chosen cause. We will personally notify you via email as to which organization received your donation!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are launching with 2 inaugural products named, "Grace" and "Glory." They both are Certified Organic (by the Organic Trade Association), 100% ring-spun cotton, Reversible navy, and Made in the USA raglan crewnecks. Weighing in at just 7.7oz, they are both light-weight and breathable.

What differentiates Grace and Glory are their reversible interiors. The interiors are symbolic of your vibrant inner truth and discovery of purpose:

 

 

 

Production of both designs will be capped at 250 units each. We wanted to create a line that was personal to the buyer as opposed to huge commercial factory production runs.
Only a select few will be to have these shirts - which gives it added value and exclusiveness. Additionally, capping production at 250 for each design gives us the ability to ensure that each item is produced to the highest standards of quality. Taking our time to hand-stitch each shirt equates to a more authentic and pristine final product.

For added personalization - each shirt will be hand-numbered by us to indicate which edition, out of the 250 produced, the shirt you own represents.

 

 

We have many future design in my mind which will follow Grace and Glory. We will use feedback from all of you to help spark some unique ideas!

 

We cannot possibly launch our brand without your help. When you make a pledge - you choose a reward. Tell all of your friends to pledge, and they too can get a reward. Smiles and Tears of Pure Joy will be abundant once we reach our goal and MAKERMASON becomes a reality! You will help make a difference - and that is worth rejoicing over.

Check out the reward breakdown below - after you see a reward package that you like - select it from the right of this page under "Select A Perk":

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

How I do I choose my shirt size and cause?

At the end of our campaign, we will send a link to you which will allow you to submit size details and the cause of your choice from our "supported causes" listing.

 

How else may I help out?
We truly appreciate this question - only together can we succeed. Other than contributing money to our campaign you can help us spread the word through the following Social Media outlets:
Twitter: @makermason
Instagram: @makermason
Facebook: facebook.com/makermason

Tell your friends, family, and neighbors! Help us create a movement.


What are the specific size measurements?
Please refer to the chart below for specific measurements:

 

 

How do you choose the organizations that the 20% will go to?
Once you specify the cause that you would like your proceeds to go to - we will donate the funds to a charitable organization that is dedicated to that specific cause. We independently verify that the organization is eligible to receive tax-deductible contributions during the current annual period as per the United States Internal Revenue Service's "Exempt Organizations Select Check" database. Please refer to: US IRS - Exempt Org Database Search for more detail.

What does the $22,000 cover?
Most clothing brands outsource production of their products to foreign countries such  as China. Labor and Manufacturing costs in these countries are much lower than what is found in the United States. However, though the price may be cheaper in those countries - we knew that nothing could compare to the workmanship and quality that is found in the United States. This fact along with it being Certified Organic and of Limited Unit runs - makes the crewnecks significantly more expensive than your typical shirt to produce. As such, $22,000 was calculated to be the most realistic goal to get us off the ground.

What if I want to make a return?
We do not see this happening - actually we see you wanting more and more - but if it does, know that we stand by our product 100%. If you would like to return your product, please contact us at info@makermason and we will arrange your return as soon as possible.

When can I expect my rewards?
Rewards such as the sticker, swatch, and poster pack, will come within the first month after our campaign has ended. Packages that contain a shirt or crewneck can be expected 2 months after our campaign has ended due to manufacturing time.

Do you ship internationally?
Yep we do = just add $10 - $15 for shipping depending on the package.

Will you be coming out with more designs?
Yes! Once we are successful with this campaign - we will begin to reveal some of our new design ideas and seek out suggestions from all you - our friends! It all begins with this campaign - please help us reach our goal!

THANK YOU ALL!

Once we are successful with this campaign - we will begin to reveal some of our new design ideas and seek out suggestions from all you - our friends! It all begins with this campaign - please help us reach our goal!THANK YOU ALL!

story:
Remember the last time you put on sunscreen but still got a painful sunburn? Have you ever gotten sunburned on a cloudy day? How do you keep track of your sunscreen effectiveness and when it’s time to apply more?

The innovative LUXES bracelet features patent-pending technology that simulates your skin’s reaction to UV radiation in your surroundings, reminding you to apply or reapply proper sun protection.




LUXES bracelet is an innovative, durable ultraviolet radiation monitor that displays the amount of your UV radiation exposure. LUXES bracelet provides an easy to understand indicator to show you that UV radiation exists in your surroundings, so you can apply proper sun protection to prevent sunburn, wrinkles, and skin cancer. LUXES bracelet works in all weather conditions and even under water.


LUXES consists of a bracelet and a UV activated insert. LUXES uses a proprietary smart material to create the UV activated insert. The silicone rubber-based smart material will darken in color when exposed to UV radiation to simulate human skin reaction to UV radiation. The color changing action is reversible when the smart material is removed from the UV source.


Users can apply a small amount of sunscreen onto the LUXES’s UV activated insert to track the effectiveness of the sunscreen. The sunscreen will block the UV radiation and keep the UV activated insert from changing color. When the sunscreen naturally breaks down, the color will slowly begin to darken to alert users to reapply sunscreen.




We’re two software engineers from the Silicon Valley cubical farm who are passionate about sun safety. We have friends and family members who have been diagnosed with skin cancer. It is important to us to develop a simple and cost effective solution to detecting UV radiation exposure and keeping track of our sunscreen’s effectiveness.

After months of researching different cell phone apps and electronic sensors for UV detection, we realized our own skin has the best UV detection mechanism. It made sense to us to create an artificial skin to simulate the sunburn reaction 100 times faster to remind the user to apply / reapply sun protection. We knew it would not be an easy task, but we accepted the challenge.

We spent months researching and studying different methods, and with lots of research and the help of the Internet, we developed this new material that will darken under UV radiation just like our skin. The LUXES bracelet was born.


When all this started, we only had one goal: develop an easy to use UV monitoring device to help a 5-year old understand the importance of sun safety. After months of researching, developing, and prototyping, we created a new Smart Material that will darken when exposed to UV radiation to simulate human skin reaction to UV radiation.

We have overcome many challenges to get the LUXES bracelet working the way we want. And now, we need your help to take our project to the next level.We want to reach out to more people and spread the word about sun safety.

We are asking for your help so that we can reach the minimum quantity order to be produced by our high-end manufacturer.

A successful campaign will help fund our initial production run of the LUXES bracelet!

The money you pledge here on Indiegogo will go directly towards paying for the production of the LUXES bracelet.We have been working hard over the past year to develop the UV activated smart material, to research manufacturing processes, to improve packaging design and to refine our product. We won’t have to spend more time or money on researching and developing our product.  LUXES bracelet is currently production ready and waiting for your support! As soon as the funding closes, we will start the production process.

We’ve been working with our partners to develop a scalable manufacturing process and streamlining the production and packaging. As soon as funding closes, we will start creating the mold for injection molding and implementing the production process.

LUXES bracelet is being manufactured and shipped from American Companies.  This means that our raw materials, hardware, tooling etc are being sourced from right here in the United States.  We are passionate about creating LUXES bracelet and it is important to us to work with US-based partners to deliver high quality LUXES bracelet to you, our supporters.

LUXES bracelet is being manufactured and shipped from American Companies.  This means that our raw materials, hardware, tooling etc are being sourced from right here in the United States.  We are passionate about creating LUXES bracelet and it is important to us to work with US-based partners to deliver high quality LUXES bracelet to you, our supporters.

Manufacturing Schedule

  • Funding from Indiegogo = End of December
  • Create mold for bracelet and Inserts (4 to 6 weeks) = End of February
  • Production of LUXES bracelet (4 - 6 weeks) = End of March
  • Packaging and Delivery (4 weeks) = End of April 

Manufacturing

A unique challenge for LUXES UV activated insert using our proprietary Smart Material. We have spent months working with a manufacturer in California to develop and implement a manufacturing process for the UV active Smart Material. The manufacturer we are working with has produced for the world’s top brands and they have the capacity to further develop a scalable manufacturing solution for LUXES bracelet. We live near the production facility so we can personally oversee the manufacturing process.

Order fulfilment

Everyone knows that Indiegogo projects have had challenges fulfilling orders on time. We've kept the reward tiers as simplified as possible to help us stay on top of the product fulfillment. We will do our best to match or exceed our scheduled delivery date.

Product Improvement

As we continue to test the bracelet, we may need to make some small enhancements to the product. These changes will always be for your benefit, we will keep you updated every time we improve something.

There will no doubt be other challenges ahead of us, but we plan to respond to any unforeseen challenges by being honest and open with you, our supporters.

Please support our LUXES bracelet project, any amount is much appreciated.


LUXES bracelet with UV activated Insert

*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
Please help us spread the word by sharing on Facebook and Twitter! Thank you for your support

*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~

The LUXES website: http://bit.ly/1c10cqx

Facebook page: http://on.fb.me/18L9aVF

Twitter page: http://bit.ly/17QVJU6

Pinterest page: http://bit.ly/1e5vBpW

Google+ page: http://bit.ly/17oLIjI

YouTube Channel: http://bit.ly/17UtJMb

story:
We are final year Fashion Design and Fashion Design & Fashion Management students from the University of East London. After four grueling years of endless hard work we are close to realizing our final collections and will have the opportunity to represent our university and showcase out work at Graduate Fashion Week this June.

This is a huge industry event where universities across the UK come together to showcase Graduate work to industry professionals. It is a huge opportunity for us, our moment to shine. Having a presence at Graduate Fashion Week means you can present your work on a national level and can lead to winning prestigious awards and funding.

However this wonderful chance comes with many costs, which is why we are currently working very hard to raise money. So far we have held bake sales, fabric sales, help swap shops to raise money however we are still short of reaching our goal. We are hoping to raise £500 from this campaign, which will go a long way to help us reach Graduate Fashion Week with a bang...

There are lots of costs involved with showcasing our work in a professional manner at Graduate Fashion Week. We need to raise funding to help cover the following costs.

  • We need to hire fit models to ensure our garments fit perfectly.
  • We need to oraganise a photoshoot for brochure images; this entails hiring a photographer, studio, models, make up artists.
  • We need to produce a brochure/lookbook where a look from each student’s collection will be presented; this involves retouching of images, designing a layout and printing costs.
  • Alongside the show we also have a presence on a stand at GFW. To attract the maximum amount of attention to our stand we have to make sure it looks slick, professional and eye-catching. The more money we raise, the more fantastic our stand will look and our work will receive all the more attention from all the right people.

 

Making a strong presence at Graduate Fashion Week will be a fantastic way to honour four years of extremely hard work and a great jumpstart to our careers. Any help you can give us will make a tremendous difference and we would be so grateful for any donations. 

Your contributions will be completely anonymous and you can donate as much, or as little as you wish.

Your kindness will be hugely appreciated and will help towards promoting and launching our work into the fashion industry.

Thank you so much!!!
