story:
What is SAVEREFRIGERATOR?

SAVEREFRIGERATOR is a system of transparent hinged doors which, by placing them in each compartment of the refrigerator, we prevent cold air from escaping every time we open the refrigerator.

                 Transparent door   

                 Easy to install

                  User friendly

With this system we save money by reducing energy consumption. Our food is better preserved, and we ensure a longer life cycle of our refrigerator while helping to preserve and protect the environment.

We also reduce unpleasant odours inside the fridge.

If European laws were to require SAVEREFRIGERATOR to be installed in every refrigerator:

  • We would save 24.500 million KW/h per year
  • The equivalent of 6.400.000 per household
  • We would save up to 5.200 million EUROS per year.
  • We would produce 16.000.000 tons less Carbon Dioxide.
  • To eliminate the same amount of CO2 we would need 1.700 million additional trees.
  • We woulddouble, almost, the objectives of Europe (2020) in saving, all appliances in our homes.

This figures are just for Europe- imagine the rest of the world…

Thank you for your interest in this project.

                                               

                        What is SAVEREFRIGERATOR?

SAVEREFRIGERATOR is a simple and low-cost effective idea that will bring you significant energy and economic savings in your home.

The system is based on a very simple idea: install a transparent door on each refrigerator shelf so when we open the door of the refrigerator to put in or take out something we retain most of the cold air and temperature and consequently when we reclose the door the refrigerator does not need to consume a great deal of energy to reattain the previous programmed internal temperature.

Study Results

  • Consumption without SAVEREFRIGERATOR system   1´1724 KW/h  per day.
  • Consumption with SAVEREFRIGERATOR system    0´8535 KW/h per day

Study made with a refrigerator rated A+

                                            

                                                     Save money

                                          

                                            …and Nature thanks you!

According to our study, with this system over a nine month period the energy consumption of the refrigerator decreased by 27.2%.

With this system we save money and energy,

  • We also avoid unpleasant odours.
  • Our food is better preserved,
  • We ensure a longer life cycle of the refrigerator and
  • We help to preserve and protect the environment.

Don´t wait to save money and energy. The energy saving is something very important for each one of us, and benefits all of us. 

                                     

                                             

My name is Ruben Istúriz. I live in Mutilva, a Spanish Village in Navarra. I´m 42 years old, married and the father of five children. I’ve been an entrepreneur since I was a teenager. Today I would like to present my newest idea, the SAVEREFRIGERATOR in order to expand it globally.

The idea came from watching a programme where two technicians explained how important the correct use of the refrigerator was, due to its high energy consumption.

They were explaining that before opening the refrigerator we should think what we want to take out. Think about its concrete location inside, in order to take it out and close the door as quickly as possible in order to decrease the time with the door opened and thereby minimizing the energy lost.

Which is the cheapest electricity?

What is the best electricity for you?

What is the best electricity for the Environment?

it is the electricity THAT YOU DO NOT CONSUME. Non-generated electricity is the best electricity for you and the planet.



After checking the benefits for myself with an initial test I decided to start this Project. We save some money and we reduce CO2, NO2 and SO2 emissions into the atmosphere.

The system is fully recyclable and reusable as it can be removed from one refrigerator and installed in another one.

                                                                           

At this stage we have used all our own financial resources and we cannot expend any more due to our large family, five children and two adults. 

The next step will be to conduct tests in an independent laboratory with a view to homologation, but for this and other expenses we need an additional investment of  143.039 USD


              

       

Budget

 1/ Certification

The first priority is to certify the exact savings of this system. The technological center CEMITEC, ENAC will conduct the tests and certify the results.

The tests will be done under different conditions:

  • Refrigerator A++: four tests: 20 and 50 door openings per day and 8% and 30% fully stocked.
  • Refrigerator A+: four tests: 20 and 50 door openings per day and 8% and 20% fully stocked.
  • Refrigerator A: four tests: 20 and 50 door openings per day and 8% and 20% fully stocked.
  • Refrigerator B++: four tests: 20 and 50 door openings per day and 8% and 20% fully stocked.

You should know that at present there does not exist any standard test for this.

The most similar test is the Energy Efficiency Testing & Certification developed by the EU but this test does not consider any door opening/closing. It’s always with the door closed, which is sort of like measuring a car’s fuel consumption without considering the speed, distance, or slope gains and losses.

As a result of our measurements we believe that the EU`s Energy Efficiency Testing & Certification is incomplete and that the consumer should be able to have real figures based also on door openings and closings before purchasing a new refrigerator.

Think about a person living alone, using a 380L refrigerator when 180L would be enough for him… and now think of the required energy consumption for the extra 200L that he has.

This extra energy and cost could be saved with the right purchasing information at the time of purchase.

The refrigerator is the household appliance with the highest electricity demand: an average of 20% of the electricity consumption in the home. Therefore having the right information during the purchasing process is extremely important.

I hope that nobody will take this as a criticism of the refrigerators´ manufacturers but rather as a proposal that should help everyone concerned..

The budget required for CEMITEC's test is 19,805.59 USD, which includes 

for the study and the purchase of four frigorific, overall

Total for chapter 1: 19,805.59 USD

2/  Investment for other external services.

Company founding and Start-Up

  •  Office rental
  • Trade contract.
  • Tradename/trademark registration. 
  •  Investment and business plan development.
  •   Start up

Global market development consulting.

  • Analysis and commercial diagnosis and Marketing Plan
  • Design of International Plan
  • Commercial Prospecting
  • Distribution Study, Importation
  • Implementation
  • Search for Suppliers.

Total for chapter 2:  8,073.63 USD 

3 / Manufacturing facilities.

Knowledge of the target market

  • Feasibility study
  • Creation of corporate structure in the corresponding country
  • Legal and Administrative aspects of the country
  • Search for suitable location
  • Contracts with suppliers

Total for chapter 3: 10.224.16 USD

4/ Red tape
  • Certificates of Origin
  • ATA and CPD Notebooks
  • Visas, Certificates and legal documentation

Total for chapter 4:  976.94 USD

5/ Legal advice for internationals conflicts

  • Drafting of international contracts
  • Buying and Selling Supplies
  • Distribution Agencies etc

Total for chapter 5: 13,717.94 USD

6/ Production costs

  • Manufacturing 4 variable plastic injection molds: 32,278.15 USD
  • Returns to investors: 10,766.20 USD

Total for chapter 6: 43,044.35 USD

7/  Labour costs

In order to continue to develop this project I plan to leave my current job, to devote all my time to this project, but I need to ensure myself of an income for at least 2 years which is the time I have given myself to have the company operational.

I hope you understand that with 5 small children (9, 7, 5, 4 and 2 years old) I require an income from day one to properly maintain them.

  • Salary for one year of work:  29,714.22 USD
  • Community management: 3,875.22 USD

Total for chapter 7:  33,589.44 USD

8/  Rental of items for Office Start-up

Includes: rental of office equipment, computer, internet, blog, stationery, furniture, printer, security deposit rental, etc...

Total for chapter 8: 13,607.76 USD

TOTAL BUDGET: 143.039 USD


YOU HELP ME, I HELP THE POOR

                                          

With this project we will create some direct and indirect jobs.

Part of the profit of your purchase will go to help poverty stricken families, and another will be used to fund development projects in poor countries.

You buy the SAFEREFRIGERATOR system and you choose the project.
Selection of NPO's or specific projects

Whether you are supporting this Project or not, we appreciate your time and proactivity. This already makes you a great person and this will eventually lead to a better world.

                  Let´s make it happen

Proactivity: An attitude in which the subject assumes control of their conduct in active mode, which involves the taking of initiative in the development of the creative actions to generate improvements, by asserting the freedom of choice about the circumstances of the context.

Proactivity means not only taking the initiative, but in assuming that things happen; deciding in each moment what we want to do and how we are going to do it. You have come to realize the strength and beauty of this definition. Impressive. 

  



Thanks a lot for your attention,

Best regards,

Rubén Istúriz Caro.

Certification
developed by the EU but this test does not consider any door opening/closing.
It’s always with the door closed, which is sort of like measuring a car’s fuel consumption
without considering the speed, distance, or slope gains and losses.As a result of our measurements we believe that the EU`s
Energy Efficiency Testing &
Certification is incomplete
and that the consumer should be able to have real figures based also on door openings and
closings before purchasing a new refrigerator.Think about a person living alone, using a 380L refrigerator
when 180L would be enough for
him… and now think of the required energy consumption for the extra 200L
that he has.
This extra energy and cost could be
saved with the right purchasing information at the time of purchase. 
The refrigerator is the household appliance with the highest
electricity demand: an
average of 20% of the electricity consumption in the home. Therefore
having the right information during the purchasing process is extremely
important.
I hope that nobody will take this as a criticism of
the refrigerators´ manufacturers but rather as a proposal that should help
everyone concerned..
The budget required for CEMITEC's test is 19,805.59 USD, which includes 
for the study and the purchase of four
frigorific, overall 
Total for chapter 1: 19,805.59 USD

development consulting.

facilities.

study

structure in the corresponding country

costs
In order to continue to develop this project I plan to
leave my current job, to devote all my time to this project, but I need to ensure
myself of an income for at least 2 years which is the time I have given myself
to have the company operational. I hope
you understand that with 5 small children (9, 7, 5, 4 and 2 years old) I require
an income from day one to properly maintain them.

internet, blog, stationery, furniture, printer, security deposit rental, etc...

YOU HELP ME, I HELP THE
POOR
                                            With this project we will create some
direct and indirect jobs. Part of the profit of your purchase will go to help poverty stricken families,
and another will be used to fund development projects in poor countries.You buy the SAFEREFRIGERATOR system and you choose the project.
Selection of NPO's or specific projects
Whether you are supporting this Project or not, we
appreciate your time and proactivity. This already makes you a great person and
this will eventually lead to a better world.
            
     Let´s make it happen



Proactivity: An
attitude in which the subject assumes control of their conduct in active mode,
which involves the taking of initiative in the development of the creative
actions to generate improvements, by asserting the freedom of choice about the
circumstances of the context. Proactivity means not only taking the initiative,
but in assuming that things happen; deciding in each moment what we want to do
and how we are going to do it. You have come to
realize the strength and beauty of this definition. Impressive.    
Thanks a lot for your attention,Best regards,
Rubén Istúriz Caro.

story:
How many times has your cell phone run out of battery while you were outside? Or even worse... how many times has it happened in the middle of an important conversation?

Well, now, that is no longer an issue. Here is the solution: the SUNO WALLET.

SUNO means SUN in Esperanto, the international language. 

SUNO WALLET was born for making your life easy when you are outside. When we're leaving home we used to take our keys (easier to come back home), our wallet (to survive outside) and our smartphone (to keep connected).

Until this moment, you just were carrying a wallet.

Now, with SUNO WALLET (International Patent Pending) you will also carry the following solutions:

  • USB SOLAR CHARGER
  • RFID BLOCKER
  • USB BATTERY PACK*
  • USB LED LIGHT*
  • MULTI-TOOL CARD
  • BLUETOOTH TRACKER**

*SUNO wallet day & night version

** "Pimp My SUNO wallet" option

FEATURED ON

SUNO WALLET provides you with the freedom to use an Earth-friendly method to power your USB devices.

SUNO Wallet is perfect for charging devices with low-power needs such as cell phones, tablets, mp3 players, e-watches, headlamps, and more.

SUNO WALLET: HOT, COLD & HUMID CONDITIONS.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

SUNO WALLET "DAY" : Charge your USB devices during the day. The SUNO DAY included the followings parts:

  • Flexible Thin-film solar panel
  • Wallet
  • 5Vdc Step-down module
  • Multi-tool card

120 x 97 x 16 mm - 4.7" x 3.8" x 0.63" inches (Electronics included). The weight is 118g - 4.2Oz.

SUNO WALLET "DAY & NIGHT" : Charge your USB devices during the day and the night. The SUNO DAY & NIGHT included the followings parts:

  • Flexible Thin-film solar panel
  • Wallet
  • 5Vdc Step-down module
  • Lithium Battery polymer with protection board
  • 5Vdc lithium battery charger module
  • Multi-tool card
  • Ultrathin USB Led 3 Leds white

120 x 97 x 22 mm - 4.7" x 3.8" x 0.87" inches (Electronics included). The weight is 158g - 5.6Oz.

  • SOLAR PANEL : 6Vdc 1.95Wp 325mAh flexible Thin-film solar panel designed by SOLAR KIT Ltd (0.75 mm thin - 0.03" inch thin)
  • WALLET : PU artificial leather, 120 x 97 x 14 mm - 4.7" x 3.8" x 0.55" inches (Without Electronics). The weight is 88g - 3Oz.

  • ELECTRONICS : Regular USB socket - Step-down module 5Vdc stabilized.
  • BATTERY (SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT ONLY) : 5.5Vdc Lithium Battery 1500mAh with protection board - 68 x 50 x 5 mm - 2.67" x 2" x 0.2" inches. 5Vdc Setup-down module with micro-usb battery charger built-in.
  • LED (SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT ONLY) : Ultrathin USB 25 lumens 3 LEDs White
  • MULTI-TOOL CARD: Stainless Steel

The following parts are waterproof (IP67): Thin-film solar panel, wallet and the stainless multi-tool

The following parts are water resistant (IP64): Electronics and Li-polymer battery, Ultrathin LED

Capacity: Two Extra-wide pockets for bills, nine card-sized pockets and one ID pocket.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

SUNO WALLET DAY :

  • The high efficiency flexible thin-film solar panel turns sunlight into direct current electricity (DC). Then the step-down module turns it to 5Vdc stabilized current.  
  • The SUNO WALLET connected to a regular USB device injects the produced electricity into it: You're charging your device!
  • Because the electricity always takes the shortest route, you’re instantly consuming the greenenergy.

As long your SUNO WALLET DAY is in the sun light your USB devices can be charged.

SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT :

  • The high efficiency flexible thin-film solar panel turns sunlight into direct current electricity. Then the step-down module turns it to 5Vdc stabilized courant to charge the lithium battery and your connected USB device.
  • The SUNO WALLET connected to a regular USB device injects the produced electricity into it: You're charging your device!
  • Because the Electricity takes always the shortest route, you’re instantly consuming the greenenergy from the thin-film solar panel and from the lithium battery. The lithium battery can be charged with a regular micro-usb cable (5Vdc - 1A max.) and still with the sun light.

The built-in lithium-polymer battery allows you to power your USB devices for up to 2 hours (up to 3.5 hours with the 2700mAh extra-battery - Pimp section).

MAXIMUM CHARGE TIMES 0% ~ 100%

MAXIMUM CHARGE TIMES 0% ~ 100% FOR YOUR USB DEVICES

Power your USB devices on sunny day, cloudy day, rainy day, and everywhere & at anytime with the built-in li-polymer battery (SUNO DAY & NIGHT's version).

WHY THIN-FILM SOLAR CELL (TFSC) TECHNOLOGY?

There are 4 main solar panel technologies on the market: monocrystalline cells, polycristalline cells, amorphous cells and thin-film solar cells.

The monocrystalline, polycristalline and amorphous cells are very fragile and breakable. These cells are not flexible and not thin at all because they have to be protected by a tempered glass.

The monocrystalline and polycristalline cells hate been covered with shade or dirt, the entire circuit can break down. The output power dropped by 90%.

The thin-film solar panel is flexible (roll-able) and can also be folded (so that your cards are able to fit into the SUNO WALLET). You can sit on it, walk on it, jump on it, drop it from an airplane and it will still do its job (but your money and cards inside the wallet might be destroyed or lost).

High temperatures and shade have few impact on thin-film solar panel performance (5% loss max). That's why the thin-film solar panel can generates electricity through a window: at home, at the office, in your car, in your RV, practically everywhere.

Our thin-film solar panel is totally cadmium telluride (CdTe) free!

The high-efficiency thin-film solar panel allows you to generate electricity with regular incandescent lighting:


SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT : ULTRATHIN USB LED

RFID BLOCKER WALLET

Prevent anyone reading your RFID-enabled cards to steal your cash or identity. SUNO WALLET offers RFID-skimming protection by blocking out the signals. The thin-film solar panel creates a Faraday cage and allows you to get around without worrying about someone casually reading your card while walking by.

MULTI-TOOL CARD

It's a practical life-saving card. It's smaller than a credit card. It's powerful: it will help you with several functions. You'll carry a simple kit in your SUNO WALLET.

1. Can opener 2. Live wrench: a hollow groove strip, you can squeeze any flat type Bohou different items with a turnbuckle. 3. Sawtooth: double staggered sawtooth for cutting wood branches. 4. Keyhole, this card can be hung on the key ring. 5. Positioning wrenches: two different types of Hexagon wrench, features seven models than smaller. 6. Directional: can use 16 decile accurate determination of the scale in different directions. 7. Positioning wrench: four different types of Hexagon Wrench, suitable for daily use of the size of bolts and nuts. 8. Ruler: metric scale in mm. 9. Bottle screwdriver: for beer, beverage bottle cap opening. 10. Screwdrivers: in a corner of the card. 11. Side Knife: can cut fruits, a rope.


USE OF FUNDS

Funds raised through Kickstarter will help us bring SUNO WALLET to life. We will need to cover upfront costs and minimum order quantity thresholds of suppliers. SUNO WALLET's bill of materials will need to be tweaked for manufacturing and production engineers will need to be brought on to review the product. 

Once built, each unit will need to be tested and certified to assure that what we have built is safe and reliable. At the end of it all, we will be able to deliver a great product that you helped build.

THANK YOU

Thank you for helping us bring SUNO WALLET to the world. We wouldn’t be able to do this without your support. THANK YOU!

REWARDS :

1) MAGNETIC USB CABLE (iPHONE 5-6 & SAMSUNG/HTC/LG/ANDROID PHONE) €5 - $5 - £3.5 or plus 

SUNO WALLET DAY

2) EARLY BIRD 27€ - 29$ -19£ or plus 

3) PRE-ORDER PRICE 36€ - 39$ - 25£ or plus

SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT

4) EARLY BIRD 54€ - 59$ - 39£ or plus 

5) PRE-ORDER PRICE 63€ - 69$ - 44£ or plus

SUNO WALLET "DAY" DISTRIBUTOR PACK x50

6) SUNO WALLET DISTRIBUTOR PACK x50 "DAY" 1270€ - 1400$ - 930£ or plus - Retail price 45€-49$-33£/unit

SUNO WALLET "DAY & NIGHT" DISTRIBUTOR PACK x50

7) SUNO WALLET DISTRIBUTOR PACK x50 "DAY & NIGHT" 2500€ - 2750$ - 1820£ or plus - Retail price 69€-76$-50£/unit

TIMELINE


PIMP MY SUNO WALLET!

Please add the following amounts to your pledge to pimp your SUNO WALLET. Any idea? Please share it with us.

The regular USB socket will be replaced by an USB Type-c one

Get a 14.8Wh battery capacity instead of 8.25Wh (SUNO WALLET DAY & NIGHT VERSION ONLY)

SLIM SUNO "DAY": An Extra-wide pocket for bills, five card-sized pockets and one ID pocket

A wide coin pocket + black zipper will be added on the folded out middle part to carry some $, £ and € - Not available with the "SLIM" version

Bluetooth 4.0 tracker anti-lost for iOS & Android - Range of 50 M - 164 Ft

BEHIND THE CURTAIN

Risks and challenges

CHALLENGE: 
The challenges of the SUNO WALLET on Indiegogo will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. There are so many amazing projects out there, it is going to be hard to get the attention we need to make this wallet successful. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help us spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, our challenge will be producing a very large quantity of wallets, and making sure all the partners I'm working with maintain our quality standards. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with the companies we are working with for years and establishing a solid communication base that has given us a lot of confidence in them.

story:
| Facebook   | Twitter                                                                    | Contact

 

 

Third Editions is a French publisher dedicated to video games that was founded in February 2015 by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, two fans of quality books and video games. After just one year of activity, the company is already a financial success. The editorial policy of Third Editions focuses on the great series of video game, narrating their genesis, dealing with their background in depth, and figuring out their gameplay mechanics as well as the developers’ intentions.

Together, Mehdi and Nicolas have published more than 40 books, all in French. “But it’s a big world out there”, their friend Thomas Bouissaguet (Cartapouille) once told them, “why don’t you translate your books into English? I bet there are readers interested in the US”. He then convinced them by uploading some pictures on Reddit, leading to many enthusiastic reactions. Persuaded by this they decided to get this kickstarter going and have him direct it (and write about himself in the third person).

 

For the sake of having a neat collection that looks great on a shelf, all the books have the same overall dimensions. But some are thicker than others, like Dark Souls whose French version has 328 pages. Of course, it’s impossible to know the final page count after the translation, but it should be enough to make the book look as serious as it is.  
 
The hardcovers scream seriousness, to match the content. All the text is in black and white, they look incredible on a shelf and are packed with as much information about the saga as possible. They are up for grabs during the campaign, and subsequently on our website and in various locations. Comes with each book's ebook.

 

Zelda. Archive of a legendary saga  
To celebrate the 30th anniversary of The Legend of Zelda, Third Editions wanted to pay respect to this legendary saga, one of the most prestigious in the gaming world. This work chronicles every game of the series, from the first episode to the latest Hyrule Warriors on 3DS, deciphering the whole universe using deep analysis and reflection. Dive into this unique publication, presented as an ancient tome, which will allow adventure fans to finally (re)discover the amazing Legend of Zelda. 

This book was written by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, former authors and now publishers. The first print was release in 2010 and the book has been updated since. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews. 

Download the French PDF excerpt

Dark Souls. Beyond Death
If the Dark Souls series managed to seduce players and journalists, it was mainly by word of mouth. It was such a great success that Dark Souls 2 was named “Game of the Year” 2014 by the vast majority of gaming magazines and websites. To date, this saga is one of the most important in the gaming industry. The odd thing is that these games are well known for their difficulty and their cryptic universe. This publication narrates the epic success story, but also describes its gameplay mechanics and its specific lore across more than 300 pages. Characters, plots and the scenario of the three Souls (Demon's Souls, Dark Souls and Dark Souls II) are deciphered by Damien Mecheri and Sylvain Romieu, who spent a long year studying these dense and enigmatic games down to the smallest detail.

These two authors are videogames journalists with a lot of experience. Damien has already written three books and Sylvain own a very famous blog dedicated to the Souls saga. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews.

Download the French PDF excerpt

The Legend of Final Fantasy VII 
What gamer hasn’t tried Final Fantasy VII? The game, released in 1997, is now the standard-bearer of a whole generation, and it’s also the one which catapulted Sony’s PlayStation onto center stage. To celebrate this mythic video game’s 15th anniversary, Third Editions wanted to throw itself back into this unbelievable universe. This carefully crafted publication takes a look back at all the titles that helped forge Final Fantasy VII’s mythology (including the Compilation of FF VII), and deciphers their content through examination and original analysis. 

This book was written by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, former authors and now publishers. The first print was release in 2011. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews.

Download the French PDF excerpt

 

The Metal Gear Saga is one of the most iconic in the video game history. It’s been 25 years now that Hideo Kojima’s masterpiece is keeping us in suspens, thanks to its complex and deep scenario. As one of the pioneer of the stealth games, Metal Gear is its author shadow and present a varied content, a rich universe, some of the most memorable characters in video games, as well as a thorough attention to details. In this book you’ll find a complete panorama of the cult saga from Hideo Kojima, exploring all its facets: genesis of every iteration and trivia from the development, study of the scenario and analysis of the gameplay mechanics and themes. 

The book deal with the MGS saga from the start to MGS V Phantom Pain and its very end. We also talk about the entiere scenario, the gameplay, the music, the themas and the spin-off of the serie, You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews. 

Download the French PDF excerpt 


Our books are beautiful, but they are not just a fancy cover. If you prefer just our text and knowledge, you can go for the ebook format. As long as you have a device that can read PDF, epub or MOBI, you can pay just a fraction of the price and still receive the total of information. A great deal with no loss, as our books are mainly black and white text. Pay 10 euros for each book you want, and at the end of the campaign just tell us in the survey which one you want. Oh, and it’s DRM free, of course.
 

Translating a book is nearly as expensive as writing one, and we are working with professional translating companies who are experienced in French to English translations. Each book has around 300 pages, so you can imagine the amount of work this entails. The biggest expense is the printing. The demand for books is bigger in English than in French, so we had to triple the copies printed for each book. And as our books are high-quality, well-protected and have detailed covers, not every printer could meet our expectations. So, of course, expenses went up too. But we wanted to have a printer in the US, so we can show that our commitment goes further than this campaign and really set foot in this market – and we found one! Also, even if we already have a logistics center for our French distribution, we can’t just send book overseas, it’s way too pricey for the reader and takes too long. That’s why we had to find someone to work with who was already located in the US. It’s better when it’s closer! 

 
In a little less than two years, Third Editions published at least one book per month in France. Some of them weren’t mainstream enough to be translated, but the vast majority could interest international readers. For now, the campaign is only focused on our 5 best-sellers: Dark Souls, Final Fantasy VII, Metal Gear Solid, Zelda and BioShock.

 

As soon as we reach the funding goal, we will submit the French texts to the translation company. It should take around two months to translate, as a lot of people will handle the manuscript simultaneously. Then, we will send it all to the printer, who will give it a final check, and then print. 5 weeks later, the books will be ready to ship! As we are shipping from the US, you can expect to receive them in under a week.

So, with an optimistic schedule, all that should take less than 4 months. But we prefer to stay cautious, and have a margin of error so as not to make false promises. That's why we prefer to announce 5 months to have the final result to each and every one of our backers.


Si vous êtes français et ne connaissez pas Third Editions, vous pouvez vous rendre sur notre site Internet.
story_txt:
After a successful Kickstarter campaign, we're now opening pre-orders for our books. Once we have a shiny and running website of our own, you will be able to find our work there. In the meantime, enjoy our exclusive discount on multiple orders here.
  
       | Facebook   | Twitter                                                                    | Contact  Third Editions is a French publisher dedicated to video games that was founded in February 2015 by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, two fans of quality books and video games. After just one year of activity, the company is already a financial success. The editorial policy of Third Editions focuses on the great series of video game, narrating their genesis, dealing with their background in depth, and figuring out their gameplay mechanics as well as the developers’ intentions.Together, Mehdi and Nicolas have published more than 40 books, all in French. “But it’s a big world out there”, their friend Thomas Bouissaguet (Cartapouille) once told them, “why don’t you translate your books into English? I bet there are readers interested in the US”. He then convinced them by uploading some pictures on Reddit, leading to many enthusiastic reactions. Persuaded by this they decided to get this kickstarter going and have him direct it (and write about himself in the third person). 


 For the sake of having a neat collection that looks great on a shelf, all the books have the same overall dimensions. But some are thicker than others, like Dark Souls whose French version has 328 pages. Of course, it’s impossible to know the final page count after the translation, but it should be enough to make the book look as serious as it is.  
 
The hardcovers scream seriousness, to match the content. All the text is in black and white, they look incredible on a shelf and are packed with as much information about the saga as possible. They are up for grabs during the campaign, and subsequently on our website and in various locations. Comes with each book's ebook. 
Zelda. Archive of a legendary saga  To celebrate the 30th anniversary of The Legend of Zelda, Third Editions wanted to pay respect to this legendary saga, one of the most prestigious in the gaming world. This work chronicles every game of the series, from the first episode to the latest Hyrule Warriors on 3DS, deciphering the whole universe using deep analysis and reflection. Dive into this unique publication, presented as an ancient tome, which will allow adventure fans to finally (re)discover the amazing Legend of Zelda. This book was written by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, former authors and now publishers. The first print was release in 2010 and the book has been updated since. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews. 
Download the French PDF excerpt

Dark Souls. Beyond Death If the Dark Souls series managed to seduce players and journalists, it was mainly by word of mouth. It was such a great success that Dark Souls 2 was named “Game of the Year” 2014 by the vast majority of gaming magazines and websites. To date, this saga is one of the most important in the gaming industry. The odd thing is that these games are well known for their difficulty and their cryptic universe. This publication narrates the epic success story, but also describes its gameplay mechanics and its specific lore across more than 300 pages. Characters, plots and the scenario of the three Souls (Demon's Souls, Dark Souls and Dark Souls II) are deciphered by Damien Mecheri and Sylvain Romieu, who spent a long year studying these dense and enigmatic games down to the smallest detail.These two authors are videogames journalists with a lot of experience. Damien has already written three books and Sylvain own a very famous blog dedicated to the Souls saga. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews.Download the French PDF excerpt

The Legend of Final Fantasy VII What gamer hasn’t tried Final Fantasy VII? The game, released in 1997, is now the standard-bearer of a whole generation, and it’s also the one which catapulted Sony’s PlayStation onto center stage. To celebrate this mythic video game’s 15th anniversary, Third Editions wanted to throw itself back into this unbelievable universe. This carefully crafted publication takes a look back at all the titles that helped forge Final Fantasy VII’s mythology (including the Compilation of FF VII), and deciphers their content through examination and original analysis. 
This book was written by Nicolas Courcier and Mehdi El Kanafi, former authors and now publishers. The first print was release in 2011. You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews.Download the French PDF excerpt


 The book: BioShock: From Rapture to Columbia In just three episodes, the BioShock serie managed to score some big points amongst players’ hearts. Spiritual successor of System Shock 2, the first BioShock was an Irrational Games’s game, lead by Ken Levine. Set in the 50’s ambiance, with Art Déco levels, progression in BioShock is possible through open and smart game mechanics, inciting the player to be creative and to use it’s environment. The saga is also filled with many profound and philosophical themes, while involving the player in every of its aspects. Many things granting the triptych of iconic saga.Metal Gear Solid: Hideo Kojima’s cult work 
The Metal Gear Saga is one of the most iconic in the video game history. It’s been 25 years now that Hideo Kojima’s masterpiece is keeping us in suspens, thanks to its complex and deep scenario. As one of the pioneer of the stealth games, Metal Gear is its author shadow and present a varied content, a rich universe, some of the most memorable characters in video games, as well as a thorough attention to details. In this book you’ll find a complete panorama of the cult saga from Hideo Kojima, exploring all its facets: genesis of every iteration and trivia from the development, study of the scenario and analysis of the gameplay mechanics and themes. The book deal with the MGS saga from the start to MGS V Phantom Pain and its very end. We also talk about the entiere scenario, the gameplay, the music, the themas and the spin-off of the serie, You can check the french page of the book or the french Amazon reviews. 
Download the French PDF excerpt

As long as you have a device that can read PDF, epub or MOBI, you can pay just a fraction of the price and still receive the total of information. A great deal with no loss, as our books are mainly black and white text. Pay 10 euros for each book you want, and at the end of the campaign just tell us in the survey which one you want. Each book has around 300 pages, so you can imagine the amount of work this entails. The biggest expense is the printing. The demand for books is bigger in English than in French, so we had to triple the copies printed for each book. And as our books are high-quality, well-protected and have detailed covers, not every printer could meet our expectations. So, of course, expenses went up too. story:
Our story, in short:

We are a consciously sourced from raw and responsible materials all the way through to production, handling of our workers and supporting of local communities kinda company. What we make and put out into the world feels good and it should, why not?

We are enthusiasts about bringing the earths resources and more clearly transparent ways of production into light providing a customer with something they too can not only live and thrive in but something they are proud to have spent their hard earned money on. We do not create for status, nor to leave anyone out. We are here to bring it all back together, respectfully so and to be the ripple of cause and effect. We ARE THE CHANGE.


If you want a smarter product, one that truly aims to work for you on a multitude of levels and one that will keep surprising you pleasantly enough, give us a go. Ride, walk, run, and live in love with us!

Welcome to The Equites. We aim to please.

Ms Raena Leung, World Championship Competitor and Member of the Hong Kong Team. Shot in her Equites Leather Riders


Our current position:

After months of product development and locating factories, we have come to a bit of a standstill. Simply enough, things cost money and though we wish we were rolling in it even just enough to get this off the floor, we are in a place now where we need your help.

The next few phases to launch the label are>>>

Phase 1). Paying for the collections completion. Materials have been sourced and bought, patterns cut and payed for, teams hired and payed up until this point but we still have a few pieces to go. Soon it will be time for the finished collection to be delivered into our hands.

What we need to raise : $7000. Once we do and get the collection out of its final stage of production we will move  onto>>>>

Phase 2). Shooting the Lookbook & Campaign!!!

What we need to raise: An addtitional $5500

Models, photographers, horses, stables.. All of these things cost, and though they are pretty, they also cost a pretty penny. Ouch.



Phase 3). The Official Launch of our online store and Catalog! Going paper free is our bag but it still costs to build it and have a humble amt of stock to supply our carriers.

AND SO...

We wanted to give our friends, family and growing network of soon to be clientele a chance to shop with us and enjoy your first Equites Experience while helping us grow and come into our full existence :)

Please watch the film we've shot for your viewing pleasure, check out the awesome things we've put together for you and if you wanna help be a part of our first steps...dive in and #getinvolved! And if you know someone who would dig us, PLEASE SHARE our link/video/world!!!! THANKS!!!

*Please note, all items on the rewards are at a discounted rate of what they will cost once this campaign has ended. We wanted to drop our prices and allow for the nature of this round of contributions to be obtainable for everyone to enjoy a little bit of Equites before we go full throttle as we launch in the UK and everything will then be sold in British Sterling(pounds) and at its higher retail value. Thank you SO MUCH for your support!!!


Check out our perks!!

Womens Get Low Deep V in creme. The anti-sleeve nothin basic T!

Metal Toe Riding Boots. Shown in Camel and Brass combo

Choose your metal and Leather Color

Front row tickets to Equites Fashion Show at London Fashion Week

Timeline for our proposed stretch goals

Keep up with us here & watch us grow!!! Your help will allow us to hit these milestones and reach our ULTIMATE goal of providing you with a better world of products to live in!

Extra storage Optional Clip Sides, choose your bag size and make all movements tailored to your needs

story:
Short Summary

I run themysteryofgravityfalls.com including related social media accounts on Twitter, tumblr, YouTube, and more. I am a huge fan of Gravity Falls and am always looking for ways to support the show. I cover news, upload new clips, bring exclusive content whenever I can to fans worldwide. While some items do exist, there is a severe lack of official merchandise for the show and I want to do all I can to make sure other fans can show their love and support. 

I will be funding a reproduction run of the "Gravity Falls Grunkle Stan Fez Hat" that was previously sold at places like Hot Topic. This item is officially licensed by Disney and manufactured from the original company. These will be made to give all those who are fans of the show a chance to own some official merchandise.

All fezzes leftover from the production run after rewards are sent out will be available for sale on Amazon.com.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking to raise $3000 to help off-set the costs of the production run. This is only a fraction of the total cost needed but will help substantially. A minimum of 576 fezzes will be ordered. This is your opportunity to get one before anyone else. Here's the breakdown of approximately where your money will go to.

~70% For the production costs of the fez
~10% Novelty items (Items like postcards included with each fez)
~10% Shipping Supplies (Boxes, tape, labels)
~10% Fees (Indiegogo & 3rd Party fees)

The Impact

Gravity Falls is one of Disney's highest rated cartoon shows currently on air. It picked up major steam with the season two premiere. This fez and some other licensed merchandise were originally sold early on in season one then discontinued. Many fans at the time weren't even aware of their existence. New fans never even had an opportunity to buy them. This campaign is to give all those that love the show a chance to own some official Gravity Falls merchandise.

Risks & Challenges

I've been in contact with the original company who produced these fezzes and already have pricing options and production times and approval to proceed with the run. Once payment is submitted to the company, approximately 120 days later, the completed batch of fezzes will arrive. Ideally, these will arrive in time for the holiday season.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just get the word out! Gravity Falls fans are a force to be reckoned with when they work together. Whether it's solving the clues hidden in the show or looking for any scrap of new intel of upcoming episodes. If you won't do it for yourself, at least do it for the author of the journals, my brother.
