story:
Our Project in a 'Nutshell'

- We are raising funds to buy a 3D Laser Scanner

- This is necessary for us to create CUSTOM MOLDED costume accessories and silicone masks for Halloween, LARP and CosPlay enthusiasts.

- Currently Custom Molded items are either UNAVAILABLE or are insanely expensive ($1,000 and UP)

- Not only will we make these desperately needed items EASILY AVAILABLE, we will make them at roughly 1/10th the price, and eventually even lower.

- For our PERKS we have 36 'flavors' of our very popular and easy to wear, 'no-mess' Devil Horns.

- With HALLOWEEN quickly approaching, they are a perfect way to make any outfit a "HORNY" costume! They also make a great present for the person who has [almost] everything!

   

  

 

Project Details

We have been making the highest quality, most versatile and innovative 'Devil' Horns, and many other types of horns, since 1999.  As we like to say, based on our clear-stretchy-headband innovation, "Pan's Devil Horns can make anyone 'horny' in 15 seconds or less with no mess!"

But, enough about the horns, we are about so much more . . .

Our project's goal is to make ANY costuming fantasy a reality by creating  affordable custom, and one-of-a-kind prosthetics and costume accessories. These include silicone masks and silicone prosthetics with an amazingly life-like look and feel, resin prosthetics, resin props and many other accessories that have, till now, been unavailable anywhere. Not only will we make them in  custom colors, shapes and materials, but custom fit to the exact shape of the clients body. 

Your support will help us get the equipment we need in order to create these items, the most expensive of which is a 3D Laser Scanner.  This equipment, along with 3D Printers and other rapid prototyping tools now available, will allow us to create the desired items that have previously been impossible to make with our current techniques. 

Your help also comes with some Perks. Not only will you be helping us to help others, you will recieve some special 'rewards':

  • You will receive a 15% ongoing discount code good for a full year on our website: PansDevilHorns.com
  • At higher levels you will get your choice of some of our extremely versatile horns
  • If you are feeling particularly generous, you can have us make an item of your choice PRINTED in 3D!
  • Most Perks will ship out within a week (or sooner) of you contributing and notifying us of your Perk Choice.  The October 15 estimated delivery date is for last minute contributors.


Perk List (for your contributions):

For the full list of all the color options and more details, please scroll down to the last section.

All horns come in a variety of colors and come with the clear stretchy headband which hides in your hair. The adhesives listed are only needed if you have no hair. 

Group A: $20 and up

(Priority Mail shipping included)

  Cupid Horns

  Houndstooth Horns

  Triad Twist Horns

 Skull Burst Cuffs

  Prosthetic Adhesive

(Prosthetic Adhesive is only necessary if you have no hair (or very little hair) in which to hide the clear headband)

 

_________________________________

Group B: $30 and up

(Priority Mail shipping included)

 Aries Horns

 Puck Horns

 Wizard Horns

 Unicorn Horn

 

_____________________________________

Group C: $40 and up

(Priority Mail shipping included)

 Gypsy Star Glitter Horns

 Satyr Horns

 Unicorn Pair Horns

 Wicked Horns

 Medical Adhesive & Remover

(Medical Adhesive is only necessary if you have no hair (or very little hair) in which to hide the clear headband)

 __________________

For all the color options and more details please scroll down to the bottom of the page

_____________________________________________________________________

 

 

Why are we doing this and who will it help?

Over the past decade there has been a steady increase in the number of people involved in some type of LARP (Live Action Role Playing) or CosPlay and they now make up the majority of our customers. These people are very dedicated to their character and thus their costume, but are having trouble making the pieces of their costume that are pivotal to making their character 'come to life.' They often try to make it themselves, but many of these pieces require the expertise and experience of a professional. This is where we come in.  

They come to us to make the items they can't find or make themselves.  The problem is that using the standard methods for creating the custom items they require costs hundreds to thousands of dollars! As hard as we have tried to reduce these costs, we have hit the limits of cost reduction with the standard methods and materials.

With 3D Scanning and Printing, we can now drastically reduce these costs by 4 to 10 times and finally offer these pivotal items at a price they can afford.  With your help, we will make Hollywood-like custom costume accessories that are affordable AND as unique as the people who wear them! 

 

    

 

Why we are so passionate about this project!

We absolutely love it when we can help make people's fantasy come true by adding that unique piece to their costume that will help them become the perfect embodiment of their fantasy character. With today's challenging times and uncertain future, it is fantasy and hope that helps us make it through to better times. In addition, it is fantasy and imagination that fuels and sparks the ideas and inventions that will bring about those better times.

 

 

FAQs

Please click on the "Gallery" tab at the top of this page to see more images and to view our FAQ located at the bottom of the Gallery page as a PDF file.

 

_____________________________________

Perk Group Details

Please Note:

- All the horns listed below come with a clear stretchy headband for those with hair in which to hide the headband. Click on the Model Head image to see more detail

- If you have no hair you can use the Prosthetic Adhesive (Group A) or Medical Adhesive + Remover (Group C) to glue the horns directly on your skin

- We will ship out all perks as soon as we can after you have made your contribution and told us which perk you want.  The listed date of October 15th is the "No Later Than" date for us.

=================================

 

Group A: $20 and up

(Priority Mail shipping included)


______

 


Cupid Baby Devil Horns - Group A

0.75in (1.9cm) base dia. 
0.75in (1.9cm) tall
0.25oz (7gm) / pair

story_txt:
Our Project in a 'Nutshell'
- We are raising funds to buy a 3D Laser Scanner
- This is necessary for us to create CUSTOM MOLDED costume accessories and silicone masks for Halloween, LARP and CosPlay enthusiasts.
- Currently Custom Molded items are either UNAVAILABLE or are insanely expensive ($1,000 and UP)
- Not only will we make these desperately needed items EASILY AVAILABLE, we will make them at roughly 1/10th the price, and eventually even lower.
- For our PERKS we have 36 'flavors' of our very popular and easy to wear, 'no-mess' Devil Horns.
- With HALLOWEEN quickly approaching, they are a perfect way to make any outfit a "HORNY" costume! They also make a great present for the person who has [almost] everything!
   

  

 
Project Details
We have been making the highest quality, most versatile and innovative 'Devil' Horns, and many other types of horns, since 1999.  As we like to say, based on our clear-stretchy-headband innovation, "Pan's Devil Horns can make anyone 'horny' in 15 seconds or less with no mess!"
But, enough about the horns, we are about so much more . . .
Our project's goal is to make ANY costuming fantasy a reality by creating  affordable custom, and one-of-a-kind prosthetics and costume accessories. These include silicone masks and silicone prosthetics with an amazingly life-like look and feel, resin prosthetics, resin props and many other accessories that have, till now, been unavailable anywhere. Not only will we make them in  custom colors, shapes and materials, but custom fit to the exact shape of the clients body. 
Your support will help us get the equipment we need in order to create these items, the most expensive of which is a 3D Laser Scanner.  This equipment, along with 3D Printers and other rapid prototyping tools now available, will allow us to create the desired items that have previously been impossible to make with our current techniques. 
Your help also comes with some Perks. Not only will you be helping us to help others, you will recieve some special 'rewards':

You will receive a 15% ongoing discount code good for a full year on our website: PansDevilHorns.com

At higher levels you will get your choice of some of our extremely versatile horns

If you are feeling particularly generous, you can have us make an item of your choice PRINTED in 3D!

Most Perks will ship out within a week (or sooner) of you contributing and notifying us of your Perk Choice.  The October 15 estimated delivery date is for last minute contributors.

Perk List (for your contributions):
For the full list of all the color options and more details, please scroll down to the last section.
All horns come in a variety of colors and come with the clear stretchy headband which hides in your hair. The adhesives listed are only needed if you have no hair. 
Group A: $20 and up
(Priority Mail shipping included)

  Cupid Horns


  Houndstooth Horns

  Triad Twist Horns


 Skull Burst Cuffs

  Prosthetic Adhesive

(Prosthetic Adhesive is only necessary if you have no hair (or very little hair) in which to hide the clear headband)
 
_________________________________
Group B: $30 and up
(Priority Mail shipping included)

 Aries Horns


 Puck Horns

 Wizard Horns

 Unicorn Horn

 
_____________________________________
Group C: $40 and up
(Priority Mail shipping included)

 Gypsy Star Glitter Horns


 Satyr Horns

 Unicorn Pair Horns


 Wicked Horns

 Medical Adhesive & Remover
(Medical Adhesive is only necessary if you have no hair (or very little hair) in which to hide the clear headband)
 __________________
For all the color options and more details please scroll down to the bottom of the page
_____________________________________________________________________
 
 
Why are we doing this and who will it help?
Over the past decade there has been a steady increase in the number of people involved in some type of LARP (Live Action Role Playing) or CosPlay and they now make up the majority of our customers. These people are very dedicated to their character and thus their costume, but are having trouble making the pieces of their costume that are pivotal to making their character 'come to life.' They often try to make it themselves, but many of these pieces require the expertise and experience of a professional. This is where we come in.  
They come to us to make the items they can't find or make themselves.  The problem is that using the standard methods for creating the custom items they require costs hundreds to thousands of dollars! As hard as we have tried to reduce these costs, we have hit the limits of cost reduction with the standard methods and materials.
With 3D Scanning and Printing, we can now drastically reduce these costs by 4 to 10 times and finally offer these pivotal items at a price they can afford.  With your help, we will make Hollywood-like custom costume accessories that are affordable AND as unique as the people who wear them! 
 
    
 
Why we are so passionate about this project!
We absolutely love it when we can help make people's fantasy come true by adding that unique piece to their costume that will help them become the perfect embodiment of their fantasy character. With today's challenging times and uncertain future, it is fantasy and hope that helps us make it through to better times. In addition, it is fantasy and imagination that fuels and sparks the ideas and inventions that will bring about those better times.
 

 
FAQs
Please click on the "Gallery" tab at the top of this page to see more images and to view our FAQ located at the bottom of the Gallery page as a PDF file.
 
_____________________________________
Perk Group Details
Please Note:
- All the horns listed below come with a clear stretchy headband for those with hair in which to hide the headband. Click on the Model Head image to see more detail
- If you have no hair you can use the Prosthetic Adhesive (Group A) or Medical Adhesive + Remover (Group C) to glue the horns directly on your skin
- We will ship out all perks as soon as we can after you have made your contribution and told us which perk you want.  The listed date of October 15th is the "No Later Than" date for us.
=================================

story:
Welcome!

Hello and thank you for taking the time to visit our campaign here on IndieGoGo. 

I am a native Haitian fashion designer who has been living and working in New York City for nearly 20 years. I am an expert in recycling, and on my most recent trips to Haiti, I was struck by the continued suffering after the earthquake which struck in 2010.

People are still living in the U.S.A.I.D. tarp tents, and as the governement try to re-house people, they are leaving behind tons of items that are not biodegradable, creating a new ecologic disaster.

There is also a lack of jobs because of the damaged infrastructure in the country. Many women in Haiti have superb sewing skills, but no machine to use, or no materials, or no access to wealthy markets like the United States in which to sell their goods.

My campaign would enable them to take all the tents that are being left behind and transform them into durable items, upcycling them into a variety of sturdy bags and other accessories which are water-proof. The most popular version of the tote, for example, can save countless supermarket shopping bags and yet can roll up or fold up easily.

The funds for this project will create jobs as the women clean, cut and upcycle the tents into:

  • Handbags
  • Eyeglass cases
  • Messenger bags
  • Shopping bags
  • and much more.

These items will also support a school that I have been helping which is already doing so much good for the most deprived children around Croix-des-Bouquets in Haiti. As you can see, the metal schoolhouse-church in Kafou Chada has no windows, no bathroom and only two small doors, but for these children it is a palace of learning.

This campaign will have global impact, not just in the United States and Haiti where the products will be sold and manufactured. My track record as an upcycler and recycler (see all my press clippings) for the past decade speaks for itself.

I lecture all over the world on how other countries can go more green as well.  (If you would like me to speak at an upcoming event or give demonstrations, I would be pleased to help if you give me at least three months’ notice.)

These bags have already proven that they have a global appeal. Every time I travel to Europe, for example, I sell every bag I make, with people eager for more.

I am completely tri-lingual as well, English, French and Spanish, and as a native Haitian, I am able to understand the best ways to work with grass roots movements to help restore Haitian enterprises and create jobs.

As a native, I will not have the stigma of the outsider who is very well-meaning but doesn’t know the culture or the people.

I have been making all the bags myself by hand up until this point, so this project will enable me to open a workshop to train the women on the best ways to work with the really sturdy tent fabric and provide them with the heavy-duty industrial machines required for the task.

My experiences as a successful fashion designer in New York City will help me market the bags effectively and the profits will continue to support the school that I have helped found. 

Below are the pictures of the bags made from the recycled tarp tents I made.

Even if you can't contribute financially, I am sure you will agree that this is an incredibly worthwhile endeavor, not just for Haiti but the entire planet. So please do tell your friends all about the continuing crisis in Haiti and how the women in particular would like to be able to support their families and send their children to school. Just use the Indiegogo sharing tools to spread the word on FaceBooks, Twitter and more.

Thank you so much for your time, attention and good wishes. We sincerely appreciate it. Merci beaucoup!

story:
Luxottica owns 80% of the market and artificially raises the price without giving any additional benefits. By cutting out the middleman Fello is able to:

  • Deliver the same premium quality at a lower price
  • Donate to charity



We are dedicated to delivering premium eyewear that rivals more expensive and well known brands.



We are a team of enthusiasts who have spent these last few years carefully studying the eyewear industry, paying close attention to fashion trends and timeless classics.

Great for any formal or casual occasion.



+++~~~~~~~ PERKS ~~~~~~~+++


We understand that ordering sunglasses on Indiegogo doesn't allow you to try them on first. In the unlikely event your Fellos don't fit we'll refund you via PayPal.

Black Fantom - 1 Pair + Case
$68 - A $20 Savings!
Click Here to get a Pair of Black Fantoms

Tortoise Shell Fantom - 1 Pair + Case
$68 - A $20 Savings!
Click Here to get a Pair of Tortoise Fantoms


Black Konvoy - 1 Pair + Case
$71 - A $20 Savings!
Click Here to get a Pair of Black Konvoys
 

Tortoise Shell Konvoy - 1 Pair + Case

Click Here to get a Pair of Tortoise Konvoys


Dark Green Heron - 1 Pair + Case
$68 - A $20 Savings!
Click Here to get a Pair of Dark Green Herons


Ice Blue Heron - 1 Pair + Case
$68 - A $20 Savings!
Click Here to get a Pair of Ice Blue Herons


Any 2 Pairs + 2 Cases
$135 - A $41 Savings!
Click Here to get Any 2 Pairs
We will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.


Any 3 Pairs + 3 Cases
$200 - A $67 Savings!
Click Here to get Any 3 Pairs
We will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.



Ultimate Savings Pack
Receive 1 of each Fello. That's six sunglasses and six cases! - Only 350 Available!
Click Here to get All 6 Pairs
$395 - A Savings of $139!

Personalized Engraved Pair - Only 350 Available!
After the campaign ends we will send you a survey asking which pair you would like and what letters you want engraved.  We will hand engrave up to 5 initials into the sunglasses.
Click Here to get the Featured Personalized Engraved Fello
We will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.


Each pair comes with a cylindrical faux leather case that is sleek, stylish and eco-friendly.


EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Limited to one contributor per perk.

Name Your Own Line                                                                                      
Become an honorary Fello and work with the team and name your very own line of sunglasses!                                                                                            

Design Your Own Line
Become a honorary Fello and work with the team throughout the design process to create your very own line of sunglasses, and you watch your creativity come to life.

Founders

We set out to establish a company that sincerely values customers while also giving back to those in need. As long time sunglasses enthusiasts we understand the importance of showing appreciation to our supporters and fans.

We most recently traveled to Chiapas, Mexico to help restore vision in people’s lives. It’s always heartbreaking when you realize how much someone's life can be prohibited from optometric issues. Simple tasks quickly turn into prolonged frustrating events. We are humbled by the opportunity to help these remarkable people. It was inspiring to be part of a team that treated each patient with respect and sincere personal interest. Our company Fellosophy is to extend that level of devotion onto our customers. We are blessed that we found a way to couple both of our passions into one fulfilling venture. Please join us as we strive to become the new standard in the eyewear industry.


We are humbled by the opportunity to work with VOSH International, a purposeful organization committed to providing eye care around the world. 

Why Indiegogo & Goal Explained
Indiegogo allows us to reach and educate people about our project on a large scale we just couldn’t do on our own. We are eager to finally turn this project into a reality, so we are only asking for just enough money to place a minimum order from our manufacturer. Fellos are made of premium materials, each component (lenses, frames, hinges, etc…) is carefully selected to create the best possible product. We work hard to deliver the highest quality product at a reasonable price, but we need your help to get there! In an effort to preserve our modest goal, we are saving money by personally conducting quality assurance for each pair. We are grateful for your support.

Next Steps
March: Designs are finalized and our manufacturer is ready, it's time to make a bunch of Indiegogo friends!
April 1st: Indiegogo funded!
April: Place production order.
June 30th: Production finishes.
July: Ship all of our supporters their Fello sunglasses!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Experience & Capable Manufacturers
We have worked with several manufacturers in our past, producing items from sweatshirts to laundry bags, including 4 different sunglasses manufacturers.

What you are seeing are prototypes, so expect the final product to be polished and of even higher quality. We went through 30+ iterations until we landed on our perfected design -- it's a detailed process requiring 3D modeling, rendering and more.

Luckily we have a long standing relationship with our manufacturer and project managers. Each and every prior order we have made was delivered on time. There has not been a logistical complication to date!

Unplanned Events
As with any large production there is a risk of missing the production target date of completion. Logistics can get fairly complex and occasionally mishaps do happen that can’t be planned for. However, we assure you that we have taken proactive steps in order to mitigate these risks and are prepared to handle any adversity.

We already have confirmation from both our manufacturer and our fulfillment center that they can handle 5,000 orders.

Transparency
We believe in transparency and authentic communication. Our contributors will be the first people we notify concerning any unplanned obstacles. Every contributor should feel free to ask us a question (contact@felloeyewear.com) and no one should feel as if they are left in the dark.

International Shipping
We wish we could offer free shipping anywhere in the world, but we just don’t have the economies of scale for that yet. Only US contributor will receive free shipping. All perks will ship via FEDEX for domestic contributors and DHL for international contributors. We will contact all international contributors with shipping and handling details when necessary to assure safe arrival of your sunglasses.
story_txt:
Luxottica owns 80% of the market and artificially raises the price without giving any additional benefits. By cutting out the middleman Fello is able to:

Deliver the same premium quality at a lower price
Donate to charity
We are dedicated to delivering premium eyewear that rivals more expensive and well known brands.

We are a team of enthusiasts who have spent these last few years carefully studying the eyewear industry, paying close attention to fashion trends and timeless classics.


Great for any formal or casual occasion.





+++~~~~~~~ PERKS ~~~~~~~+++

We understand that ordering sunglasses on Indiegogo doesn't allow you to try them on first. In the unlikely event your Fellos don't fit we'll refund you via PayPal.
Black Fantom - 1 Pair + Case$68 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Black Fantoms
Tortoise Shell Fantom - 1 Pair + Case$68 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Tortoise FantomsBlack Konvoy - 1 Pair + Case$71 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Black Konvoys 
Tortoise Shell Konvoy - 1 Pair + Case$71 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Tortoise Konvoys
Dark Green Heron - 1 Pair + Case$68 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Dark Green HeronsIce Blue Heron - 1 Pair + Case$68 - A $20 Savings!Click Here to get a Pair of Ice Blue HeronsAny 2 Pairs + 2 Cases$135 - A $41 Savings!Click Here to get Any 2 PairsWe will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.
Any 3 Pairs + 3 Cases$200 - A $67 Savings!Click Here to get Any 3 PairsWe will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.
Ultimate Savings PackReceive 1 of each Fello. That's six sunglasses and six cases! - Only 350 Available!Click Here to get All 6 Pairs$395 - A Savings of $139!
Personalized Engraved Pair - Only 350 Available!After the campaign ends we will send you a survey asking which pair you would like and what letters you want engraved.  We will hand engrave up to 5 initials into the sunglasses.Click Here to get the Featured Personalized Engraved FelloWe will email you a survey asking which pairs you want.
Each pair comes with a cylindrical faux leather case that is sleek, stylish and eco-friendly.
EXCLUSIVE PERKSLimited to one contributor per perk.Name Your Own Line                                                                                      Become an honorary Fello and work with the team and name your very own line of sunglasses!                                                                                             Design Your Own LineBecome a honorary Fello and work with the team throughout the design process to create your very own line of sunglasses, and you watch your creativity come to life.
Founders

We set out to establish a company that sincerely values customers while also giving back to those in need. As long time sunglasses enthusiasts we understand the importance of showing appreciation to our supporters and fans.We most recently traveled to Chiapas, Mexico to help restore vision in people’s lives. It’s always heartbreaking when you realize how much someone's life can be prohibited from optometric issues. Simple tasks quickly turn into prolonged frustrating events. We are humbled by the opportunity to help these remarkable people. It was inspiring to be part of a team that treated each patient with respect and sincere personal interest. Our company Fellosophy is to extend that level of devotion onto our customers. We are blessed that we found a way to couple both of our passions into one fulfilling venture. Please join us as we strive to become the new standard in the eyewear industry.



We are humbled by the opportunity to work with VOSH International, a purposeful organization committed to providing eye care around the world. 


Why Indiegogo & Goal Explained

Indiegogo allows us to reach and educate people about our project on a large scale we just couldn’t do on our own. We are eager to finally turn this project into a reality, so we are only asking for just enough money to place a minimum order from our manufacturer. Fellos are made of premium materials, each component (lenses, frames, hinges, etc…) is carefully selected to create the best possible product. We work hard to deliver the highest quality product at a reasonable price, but we need your help to get there! In an effort to preserve our modest goal, we are saving money by personally conducting quality assurance for each pair. We are grateful for your support.Next Steps
March: Designs are finalized and our manufacturer is ready, it's time to make a bunch of Indiegogo friends!April 1st: Indiegogo funded!April: Place production order.June 30th: Production finishes.July: Ship all of our supporters their Fello sunglasses!

Luckily we have a long standing relationship with our manufacturer and project managers. Each and every prior order we have made was delivered on time. There has not been a logistical complication to date!

Logistics can get fairly complex and occasionally mishaps do happen that can’t be planned for. However, we assure you that we have taken proactive steps in order to mitigate these risks and are prepared to handle any adversity.
We already have confirmation from both our manufacturer and our fulfillment center that they can handle 5,000 orders.

International ShippingWe wish we could offer free shipping anywhere in the world, but we just don’t have the economies of scale for that yet. Only US contributor will receive free shipping. All perks will ship via FEDEX for domestic contributors and DHL for international contributors. We will contact all international contributors with shipping and handling details when necessary to assure safe arrival of your sunglasses.

story:
What is the Wine Key Card?


The Wine Key Card is an extremely thin credit card sized wine cork remover. It uses small blades instead of a cork screw, making it the thinnest cork remover on the market. At 1.4 mm thick (about 2 credit cards) it is able to fit snugly in your wallet. The Wine Key Card also has a serrated blade for removing the wine bottle wrapper and a bottle cap opener for beer bottles. The prototype you see here I have been using for almost a year and have opened over 60 bottles of wine with it !

All the pictures you see are of a prototype and it works well! Finalized commercial version will be in polished chrome!

How many times have you been in a hotel room or at a get together searching for a wine bottle opener? Will I have one to many times. So I invented the Wine Key Card. It is similar to bottle openers on the market however, it is smaller, thinner and more compact. Able to fit in your wallet!


The Cork Blade

A regular spiral type cork screw is to bulky to fit in the pocket of a wallet,but the Patent Pending Cork Blade allows the Wine Key Card to be very thin. It utilizes small blades extending laterally from a shaft to bore into and remove the cork .It took over 10 prototypes to get the best combination of: angle of attack, lateral extension, blades shape and type of durable metal to get to where we are today. The Cork Blade can remove any type of cork, synthetic or natural.


The cork blade does not leave any debris in the bottle. That is because the cork blade never pierces the bottom of the cork. The blade has a red indicator line and when the indicator line touches the wine cork it means the blade has reached the correct depth. As you can see in the picture, the cork blade does leave a bigger hole in the cork than a conventional cork screw, but that will not affect your wine drinking experience one bit! The only major operating difference between a cork screw and wine blade is that you need to apply pressure the cork blade while rotating the device.

Laser Etching

We can custom Laser Etch your name, business or anything else you would like on your wine key card.


Parts of the Wine Key Card


The finalized product will be in polished chrome!

Specs

The Wine key Card blade and lever is made from High grade stainless steel and all other components are made of anodized aluminum.

Length, Width, Height (respectively) :  85mm, 1.4mm, 53mm (About 2 credit cards thick)

Color: We really want this to be successes. In order to do so we are keeping things simple, so The Wine Key Card will only be available in polished chrome, which is very nice looking

 Why we need your support?

We have lined up two manufactures for the Wine Key Card. One will manufacture the cork blade and another local manufacture will stamp out the other components. Both are ready for manufacturing once we meet our goal of $1000.

We need your support to manufacture and put the Wine Key Card in your hands! We are very excited about this project and hope you are too. We appreciate your support and please share The Wine Key Card with your friends.


Perks

In order to make a timely delivery we are keeping things simple and offering 3 different perks.

1.  One Wine Key Card in polished chrome with or without laser engraving, an emailed thank you and updates. $5 Shipping included in the continental USA! ADD $2.00 for any order outside the continental USA!

2.  Two Wine Key Cards in polished chrome with or without laser engraving, an emailed thank you and updates. $9 Shipping included in the continental USA!ADD $2.00 for any order outside the continental USA!

3.  Ten Wine Key Cards in polished chrome with or without laser engraving, an emailed thank you and updates. $45 Shipping included in the continental USA!ADD $3.50 for any order outside the continental USA!

We will email you after purchase for the exact wording as you want it to appear for your engraving! allow a day for email.

story:
www.lemonadeattack.com

Introduction

After working on the international launch of a technical sport socks brand, we realized that many of their concepts could be applied to the daily sock. Since then, we put lot of dedication and effort to launch this project. These are our values:

- Environment. Made in natural cotton and bamboo fibre.

- Comfort. Perfect fit & flat seam.

- Product quality. The use of natural fibres provides great benefits: bamboo is highly breathable and fresh, keeps feet dry, odour-free and antibacterial.

- Made in Spain. Production in Spain guarantees of quality and that the labour force is not working in slavery conditions.

- Responsibility. 1% of sales dedicated to collaborate with non-governmental associations.

Our products are tested and available. You can find them in our shop and fashion blogs.


What you get

We want to get 3000 EUR. All money collected will be dedicated exclusively to collection and new stocks.

There are 4 possible perks:
  • 5 EUR: You will get a discount code of 10% in our online shop.
  • 25 EUR: You will receive 5 pairs of cotton socks for free.
  • 50 EUR: You will receive 12 pairs of cotton socks for free.
  • 100 EUR: You will receive 25 pairs of cotton socks for free.


FIRST SEASON ADVANCE!!

We have some designs ready to start production. You can see a few here, but we are making many more!!


Other ways to cooperate

Do you like our project but are not investing now? Please, help us:

  • Share our campaign in social networks.
  • Tell a friend about this campaign if you think he/she could be interested.
  • Visit our shop! www.lemonadeattack.com

story:
All Klee's products are hypoallergenic,fragrance free and non-comedogenic.


Please note: All orders received for makeup, custom bags and v-necks will be shipped in August.  Please refer to your email for a personalized delivery time. 

What People Are Saying About Us!

"The Klee cosmetic line is my new favorite with perfectly matched moisturizing bases, beautiful eye colors and an amazing concealer that does not cake even after a late night at the Grammy's!" Lisa Sumja
"I love Klee Cosmetics because it not only looks great, but it feels great to wear.  Her foundation covered up exactly what I was looking to cover, all while being gentle and kind to my skin. " Gail Katz

Our founder Mary Galan, a veteran of the hair and beauty industry, noticed there was something major missing in the cosmetics market—makeup that matches the diverse array of mixed skin tones that we see in our growing ethnic populations.

Her inspiration? After the birth of her daughter Kaylee, a beautiful baby girl with brown eyes and caramel complexion, she knew finding makeup that matched her unique skin tone would be a huge problem.  Wanting to make that problem a non-issue Mary developed Klee Cosmetics. 

                            

                     Custom shades for flawless coverage and luminous skin

Our goal is to create custom shades of foundation, lipstick and shadow to help every woman enhance their unique beauty. 

                             

Klee Cosmetics is a scintillating line of cosmetic products that caters to all ethnicities. 

Our Mission

We have started customizing, blending, and offering our custom cosmetic line to a few clients but our mission is to bring our custom cosmetic line to major retail stores so that every woman gets the chance to enhance her own unique beauty no matter what color, shade, or tone. 

Every woman deserves to step out with flawless makeup, a luminous face and radiant confidence. 


                                      

Custom Color Matching

During the initial consultation, Ms. Galan, identifies the clients skin type: dry, oily or combination. She also inquires about the type of makeup the client prefers and the amount of coverage. Ms. Galan spends time demonstrating and emphasizing proper cleansing and prepping of the face to create a flawless appearance. Her trained eye allows her to combine the unique hues and create custom shades of foundation that are all hypoallergenic, fragrance free and non-comedogenic.  Ms. Galan allows clients to wear the product all day and sends a sample home. Clients are encouraged to experiment and work with the product.  Upon client satisfaction, the custom shade is ordered and delivered to the client.

Once we reach our goal of bringing Klee Cosmetics to retail stores this process would be carried out by trained Klee Makeup Professionals at the retail locations.

                             

How You Can Help

  • Due to the initial cost and quantity for a minimum order we need your help to get a product in supply. 
  • Your support will help us attend a major retail show so we can make connections to get Klee Cosmetics into major retail shops. 
  • Setup our website
  • Once we accomplish this we hope to make custom shades available worldwide.
  • We appreciate all contributions and would love for you to SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!

 Like us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter @KleeCosmetics. Help us build our fan base and spread our mission to bring a makeup line custom made for every skin color, shade and tone in the world.  The cosmetic giants have been slow to develop products, and often their products look chalky, do not blend well with natural skin tones and crease in the fine lines and pores of these unique skin types.


What You Get When You Contribute

There are multiple perks available ranging from $5 on up to whatever you're willing to contribute.  Each contribution level comes with an associated perk, so get  "eye wink xxx" , "muahh gratitude" and "on board with Klee" and help us attend the Los Angeles Ultimate Woman's Expo so we can connect and demonstrate custom Klee Cosmetics to retailers.

Pre-order today!

With your help,we can raise funds for the International Doers; this charity provides daily food and hope for families whose children are fighting cancer.  This cause is dear to Ms. Galan as she provides numerous hours of volunteer services for this charity each year.  With this campaign, she would like to donate 10% of the funds raised to the International Doers.  Thank you for your contribution.

story:
Hello :-)

I'm Alex, Chief Pairing Officer and founder of Pairz ®.  Thank you for your interest in my campaign, I am so excited to finally share my socks with you. The past 18 months have been a whirlwind adventure, the idea for Pairz ® was first born when I was sat frantically searching through a laundry bag full of miss-match socks...I had a brainwave, and after discussing the idea to create socks that stay together with my Mum I haven't looked back. Mum's have to approve everything right?! 

It's been a long journey to get my socks just perfect, and I now feel that I am in a place where my product is fit for market.  Pairz ® are available in a variety of signature patterns and colours, Polka Pear, Plain and Stripe.  Over time I hope to extend this range to include even more eye-catching designs, as well as introducing Petites Pairz ® for little feet. Through my partnership with SOCK Charity (Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge), Pairz ® will be helping to raise awareness of the signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer.  

On behalf of myself and all of the volunteers at SOCK I am thrilled to have you join us on this journey, whilst helping to abolish the sock monster for ever more.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions or comments. 


OK So...What Exactly Are Pairz?

Pairz ® socks stay forever together throughout the wash, dry and store process, right until you're ready to wear them again. The unique looped label keeps your Pairz ® firmly together at all times, it even comes in handy when hanging them on the line to dry. They're a fun and innovative answer to many hours wasted searching for a matching pair of socks.  As each pair comes with a little message, such as 'forever together', 'sole to soul', 'a pairfect match' and 'let's stick together' Pairz ® socks make the ideal gift to give to someone you care about.  Eventually, when ordering on-line there will be an option to add a personalised note, which will be included with the socks and delivered straight to the door of your loved one. 

A percentage of each sale will be donated to aptly named charity SOCK (Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge), a charity which is particularly close to my heart. Sock charity is totally reliant on volunteers and 100% of all donations goes towards vital research programmes and campaigns to educate people about the signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer. The signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer are frequently absent in it's early stages making diagnosis difficult. By contributing to this crowd funding campaign you will help me bring my product to you, the consumer. Together we can not only raise funds for SOCK charity but we can help to raise their profile, and spread word about the importance of being aware of the signs of ovarian cancer to people all over the World. 

                                                      


The 'Technical' Bit

       1. Wear Pairz        2. Pair Pairz         3. Wash Pairz      4. Dry Pairz      5. Store Pairz. 

           Pairz ® are made from 80% Combed Cotton, 18% Polyamide, 3% Elastane


What We Need & What You Get

Here's the breakdown:

  • I am hoping to raise £5000 which will be spent on marketing my product and building an e-commerce website.  Any additional money raised will go towards the upfront costs required to place my first big order.  Not forgetting the 10% which I will be donating directly to SOCK Charity's ongoing research. 
  • You can bag yourself some fantastic perks by contributing to this campaign, which include Pairz ®  at a special introductory price. 
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, do not worry, you will still receive any perks you have requested.  I have a small supply of around 500 pairs of socks ready to deliver to you in time for Christmas. 
AUTUMN/WINTER 2014 SIZES & DESIGNS: 

WOMEN'S (UK size 4-7) 

Red and Gold Christmas Polka Pear, 

Red and Gold Christmas Stripe, 

Christmas Frosted Almond Stripe, 

Plain Ecru Olive, 

Damson and Gull Grey Polka Pear,

MEN'S (UK size 8-12)

Red and Gold Christmas Polka Pear, 

Red and Gold Christmas Stripe, 

Black and Willow Polka Pear, 

Black and Willow Stripe, 

Plain Legion Blue


About SOCK

Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge (SOCK) was founded by the late Jane Keating following her diagnosis with ovarian cancer in August 2009 at the young age of 28. Jane vowed to promote awareness of ovarian cancer amongst the women of Ireland. SOCK is a non-profit organisation and is dedicated to raising funds for research into and awareness of ovarian cancer.

SOCK became very aware that there are leaflets in doctors’ surgeries in relation to breast cancer, lung cancer, cervical cancer, prostate cancer etc., however, not for ovarian cancer. In fact, SOCK noticed that there was no information available to women in relation to the symptoms of ovarian cancer. This lack of information can lead to misdiagnosis and late diagnosis. In addition, lack of information is one of the reasons why many women believe that smear tests which test for cervical cancer will identify ovarian cancer when in fact this is not the case. SOCK is not sponsored by a government body which means we are totally reliant on fund raising activities to fund initiatives and research.  We are delighted to have partnered with Pairz ® and are overwhelmed by the positive response so far.  Through this partnership we hope to make a real difference, and educate people all over the World by providing the knowledge needed to tackle this illness at full force, ensuring Jane's legacy lives on. 


Ways You Can Help

Contributing to this campaign will be a huge help in making Pairz ®  come to life. The support, enthusiasm and guidance received so far has been invaluable, and Pairz ®  would not be where it is today without the help of these special people.

If you would like to become part of this journey too, and become a Pairz ®  ambassador you can do so in many ways, selecting one of the perks is not your only option (although it does mean you will be the proud owner of some fantastic socks which you will never lose!).  As a small start up company, contribution in any form is welcomed, even a simple shout out on social media with a link to this page would make a huge impact. You can simply share this page with friends and colleagues via sites such as twitter and Facebook.  Tell your family, neighbours, or even that hot guy you've had your eye on in the gym! Go on.. let's spread the word together and make a difference.
story_txt:
Hello :-)I'm Alex, Chief Pairing Officer and founder of Pairz ®.  Thank you for your interest in my campaign, I am so excited to finally share my socks with you. The past 18 months have been a whirlwind adventure, the idea for Pairz ® was first born when I was sat frantically searching through a laundry bag full of miss-match socks...I had a brainwave, and after discussing the idea to create socks that stay together with my Mum I haven't looked back. Mum's have to approve everything right?! It's been a long journey to get my socks just perfect, and I now feel that I am in a place where my product is fit for market.  Pairz ® are available in a variety of signature patterns and colours, Polka Pear, Plain and Stripe.  Over time I hope to extend this range to include even more eye-catching designs, as well as introducing Petites Pairz ® for little feet. Through my partnership with SOCK Charity (Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge), Pairz ® will be helping to raise awareness of the signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer.  On behalf of myself and all of the volunteers at SOCK I am thrilled to have you join us on this journey, whilst helping to abolish the sock monster for ever more.Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions or comments. OK So...What Exactly Are Pairz?
Pairz ® socks stay forever together throughout the wash, dry and store process, right until you're ready to wear them again. The unique looped label keeps your Pairz ® firmly together at all times, it even comes in handy when hanging them on the line to dry. They're a fun and innovative answer to many hours wasted searching for a matching pair of socks.  As each pair comes with a little message, such as 'forever together', 'sole to soul', 'a pairfect match' and 'let's stick together' Pairz ® socks make the ideal gift to give to someone you care about.  Eventually, when ordering on-line there will be an option to add a personalised note, which will be included with the socks and delivered straight to the door of your loved one. 
A percentage of each sale will be donated to aptly named charity SOCK (Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge), a charity which is particularly close to my heart. Sock charity is totally reliant on volunteers and 100% of all donations goes towards vital research programmes and campaigns to educate people about the signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer. The signs and symptoms of ovarian cancer are frequently absent in it's early stages making diagnosis difficult. By contributing to this crowd funding campaign you will help me bring my product to you, the consumer. Together we can not only raise funds for SOCK charity but we can help to raise their profile, and spread word about the importance of being aware of the signs of ovarian cancer to people all over the World.                                                       The 'Technical' Bit


       1. Wear Pairz        2. Pair Pairz         3. Wash Pairz      4. Dry Pairz      5. Store Pairz. 
           Pairz ® are made from 80% Combed Cotton, 18% Polyamide, 3% Elastane



What We Need & What You Get
Here's the breakdown:

I am hoping to raise £5000 which will be spent on marketing my product and building an e-commerce website.  Any additional money raised will go towards the upfront costs required to place my first big order.  Not forgetting the 10% which I will be donating directly to SOCK Charity's ongoing research. 
You can bag yourself some fantastic perks by contributing to this campaign, which include Pairz ®  at a special introductory price. 
If I don't reach my entire goal, do not worry, you will still receive any perks you have requested.  I have a small supply of around 500 pairs of socks ready to deliver to you in time for Christmas. 
AUTUMN/WINTER 2014 SIZES & DESIGNS: 
WOMEN'S (UK size 4-7) 
Red and Gold Christmas Polka Pear, 
Red and Gold Christmas Stripe, 
Christmas Frosted Almond Stripe, 
Plain Ecru Olive, 
Damson and Gull Grey Polka Pear,

MEN'S (UK size 8-12)
Red and Gold Christmas Polka Pear, 
Red and Gold Christmas Stripe, 
Black and Willow Polka Pear, 
Black and Willow Stripe, 
Plain Legion Blue

About SOCK

Supporting Ovarian Cancer Knowledge (SOCK) was founded by the
late Jane Keating following her diagnosis with ovarian cancer in August
2009 at the young age of 28. Jane vowed to promote awareness of ovarian cancer amongst
the women of Ireland. SOCK is a non-profit organisation and is dedicated to raising funds for research into and awareness of ovarian cancer.
SOCK became very aware that there are leaflets in
doctors’ surgeries in relation to breast cancer, lung cancer, cervical cancer, prostate cancer etc., however, not for ovarian cancer. In fact, SOCK noticed that there was
no information available to women in relation to the symptoms of ovarian cancer. This lack of
information can lead to misdiagnosis and late diagnosis. In addition, lack of information is one of
the reasons why many women believe that smear tests which test for cervical cancer will identify
ovarian cancer when in fact this is not the case. SOCK is not sponsored by a government body which means we are totally reliant on fund raising activities to fund initiatives and research.  We are delighted to have
partnered with Pairz ® and are overwhelmed by the positive response so far.  Through this partnership we hope to make a real difference, and educate people all over the World by providing the knowledge needed to tackle this illness at full force, ensuring Jane's legacy lives on. 




Ways You Can Help

Contributing to this campaign will be a huge help in making Pairz ®  come to life. The support, enthusiasm and guidance received so far has been invaluable, and Pairz ®  would not be where it is today without the help of these special people.
If you would like to become part of this journey too, and become a Pairz ®  ambassador you can do so in many ways, selecting one of the perks is not your only option (although it does mean you will be the proud owner of some fantastic socks which you will never lose!).  As a small start up company, contribution in any form is welcomed, even a simple shout out on social media with a link to this page would make a huge impact. You can simply share this page with friends and colleagues via sites such as twitter and Facebook.  Tell your family, neighbours, or even that hot guy you've had your eye on in the gym! Go on.. let's spread the word together and make a difference.

story:
Hi, I’m Joanna Chief Knixpert at Knix Wear. Thank you for visiting our campaign. 

Our Story:

A year ago, we launched Knix Wear with an Indiegogo campaign. We received a tremendous amount of support from women all over the world and a lot of the great ideas that have made Knix Wear what it is today came from our first campaign. We were lucky enough to be featured in a ton of great media outlets, including Fast Company, The Financial Post, WWD, Forbes and dozens more. We also made crowdfunding history by becoming the first campaign to be picked up by a major retailer. You can watch that story here.

The new FITKNIX:

At Knix Wear, our mission is to make your every day better and that includes your workout. As with everything we do, we started by listening to women and what they want. The hard truth is that women aren't satisfied by their existing athletic underwear - so much so that 10% opt to not wear any at all. Panty-lines, leaks, sweat stains, chaffing and odor are all top of mind. There are a ton of big athletic apparel brands out there making underwear, but it’s a small part of their business and as result existing products are missing the mark. 

For the big guys, female underwear is almost an after thought – For us, it is our only thought.


Stretch Goals Added:

LIMITED TIME PERK- At Knix Wear we are proud to be a Canadian company and we couldn't be more proud of our Canadian athletes. In fact, we're so proud that we will be releasing a limited run of honorary underwear so we can all remember what is possible with dedication, focus and team work. 

We learned a lot from our first campaign, and so we are doing things a bit differently this time.

#1) Better pricing. You are helping to bring this product to life and as a result you deserve better pricing. For us, this isn’t about making huge profits it’s about getting these knickers to as many people as possible.

#2) Setting our goal lower, so we can start production and get rewards to you sooner. The second we hit our $15k goal you will be able to pick your sizes, styles and colours. We’ve also got some great stretch goals planned.

#3) Colours: You asked for them, and you’ve got them.

#4) Choice of technology: We want you to find the pair that is right for you, so now you can pick the level of protection you want and sweat hard with confidence. 

Just how is FITKNIX different? Scroll below to see what sets us apart.

Introducing FITKNIX™

With FITKNIX™, you’re getting exceptional performance in ways that will dramatically change how you feel when you exercise.

Note: Our gussets come with a 100% cotton top layer. We use silver as the anti-microbial agent, which is embedded in the fibres of the fabric and will not wash out. 

Research

To get to the root of the problem, we interviewed over 350 certified female athletic professionals to see where existing underwear options are missing the mark...and are they ever!

What we discovered

Women want breathable, flexible, moisture wicking and odor-combatting underwear, so we partnered with the LYCRA® brand team, and got access to some of the top fabric mills on the planet, to bring this product to life.

We have our production partners, packaging and distribution centres ready to go. We believe that women deserve a work out underwear upgrade - the question is, do you? By contributing to this campaign you'll help us bring this product life and forever raise the bar for female athletic underwear everywhere. 

Available styles

Potential Risks and Challenges

Production timing: Delivering on time is always is a concern. With that being said, we have gone through dozens of prototypes and have our designs, patterns, packaging and fabric ready to go. We also have experience thanks to our first crowdfunding campaign (we delivered less than a month behind schedule) and are heading into this campaign aware of the potential set backs that can delay delivery. We have worked with all of our partners before and they are ready to go. 

We will continue to give you updates along the way and as soon as we hit our $15,000 goal we will begin production. 

Sizing: Another concern is sizing, especially when it comes to underwear. Thankfully, we've produced thousands of pairs of underwear and have done numerous fit sessions with a top fit model in New York to get the sizing just right (so please follow the sizing guide). We are also available to chat at any time and want to help you find the pair that is right for you.  We are going to give you as much information as possible to help you pick the right pair. If for some reason, you find the product doesn't fit, you can always send it back to us and we will send you a replacement pair (once the other perks have been fulfilled). We simply ask that you cover the cost of shipping it back to us. Hopefully that sounds like a fair and reasonable plan.

FAQ:

When will I get to pick my sizes, styles and colours? We will be sending out a link with a survey where you can pick your styles/colours/sizes/gusset technology as soon as we hit our $15k goal. 

What is the difference between the two types of technology? Our Fresh Fix Technology consists of two layers. The top layer that is touching your skin is a one-way moisture-wicking cotton with antimicrobial properties. The second layer is essentially a built-in panty liner. It is absorbent (up to three teaspoons), uses silver as the antimicrobial agent, and is leak resistant on the sides and bottom. Our Fresh Fix Air gusset technology is the cotton one-way moisture-wicking, antimicrobial layer without the panty liner layer. 

Special thanks to: 

- The LYCRA® brand team for believing in Knix Wear and our potential to create the ultimate athletic underwear for women

- Consul Media for helping us bring our vision to life through our video 

- WhitmanEmorson for our new X logo and incredible packaging 

- Our 500+ first Indiegogo campaign supporters for helping us make Knix Wear a reality

- Movemeant for letting us shoot in their fantastic studio

story:
Short Summary

I am trying to start a brand of my handmade comic book shoes to raise money for college. Right now, I sell them at (https://www.etsy.com/shop/Ponita?ref=si_shop), but I would love to be able to be able to showcase them in a real shop! With $1,000, I can make many pairs of shoes, and I might be able to find a shop to display them in! Each pair of shoes is made-to order, and I put a lot of time and love intol them! This project is very important to me, especially as I consider my career and job opportunities during and after college.

What We Need & What You Get

To make the shoes, it takes money to buy the supplies, so that is what the funding will be going toward, as well as promoting and advertising.

If you donate $5, you get a thank you card in the mail.

If you donate $10, you get a thank you card, as well as a 10-minute drawing (of you, an animal, etc).

If you donate $75, you get your own pair of Ponita shoes, in your size! (Please allow 1-2 weeks)

If you dontate $150, you get 3 pairs of Ponita shoes, in any sizes! (Please allow 2-3 weeks)

Cost Break-Down

Cost of supplies (paint-brushes, glue, comic books): $200

Cost of shoes (per pair): $50

Advertising: ~$50

I am shooting to make about 15 pairs of shoes to stock my Etsy shop, and possibly a booth at art festivals and other markets.

The Impact

I have always been creative, and it is always very important to me to have a creative outlet. Making a lot of money from this is not why I am doing it. However, if I am going to be able to continue my project, I will have to get some help!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Promote my Indiegogo page, or my Etsy page! (AKA, tell your friends)
  • Help other fashion designers on Indiegogo and Etsy!
  • Favorite my shop and listings on Etsy!

Contact Us:
Company: Jiaxing Amec Textile Co.,Ltd

We are ready for shipment.

Feel free to reach out at ginoamec@ginosvateworld.com if you have any questions.

 

How Ginosvate insole kicks injuries out?  

Story of egg survivor 

 

Story of hand and hammer

Amazing? But it's  incredibly  Soft and Elastic.

 

Video here showes its visible softness and elasticity 

 

And excellent arch-supporting

 

How It Feels ? Let's See How Skateboarder Say about Ginosvate Insole

 

How could that be? 

The answer is "Non-Newtonian fluid  material ". 

That's why Ginosvate insole's so extraordinary.

 

Compared with tradition insole: 

Are you still suffering ?

Dedicated design is the another key to our product:

Features many advantages as below:

 

That's The Story Of Ginosvate. 

 Simple，but our great dream is to keep everyone away from injury. 

 

A Brief Story Of Us

In most circumstances, better gears usually perform better during the matches&exercises, and there is no doubt that both amateur sportsman and professional athletes are using the best gears and equipments, furthermore, the designers are always trying their best to improve the gears as well. However some athletes may miss their milestone/record-breaking timing because of slippery in a flash moment. That should never happen.

Ginosvate, Stands for Gear's Innovator，is the 1st one who uses this material  to create a product for most sportsman's daily life.

Ginosvate concentrates on high elasticity, breathability, shock-resistance, and all-round protection for feet, and intend to offer protective accessories for kneecaps, wrists, elbows etc in the future.

And of course, every backer is our motivation for discovering more. Each feedback, opinion, advise even disadvantage is precious for us, they will encourage us to improve and perform better. 

We are always ready and well prepared to offer better gears and protection for all people in the future.

 

SIZE CHART

Each of  S-size and L-size insole has 5 cut-lines,  as shown in chart below. But if you don't cut it at all, the original size will be one size bigger respectively. Lengths shown here are their original full length. 

 

WOULD YOU LIKE TO ENJOY THE SPORT AND KICK INJURIES OUT? THEN WE INVITE YOU TO:

• Choose one of the great perks.

•Share this campaign on social media to help us get the word out about the Ginosavte Insole Shoe Pads and the benefits that they offer for people’s foot health and comfort, especially when doing sports.

• Talk to your friends and family members about the Ginosavte Insole Shoe Pads—they may also want them for themselves.

 

CAMPAIGN TIMELINE

story:
The Story: 

My name is Yasmina and I am the Founder of ALWAN COSMETICS. I started making makeup in my dorm room my Freshman year and opened an Etsy shop selling my handmade eyeshadows and highlighters. Over the course of a year, I tested my makeup on every willing person I could find, ensuring that the products were as vibrant on the palest shades as on the deepest ones.

The Problem:

As an Arab woman, I never felt represented by the cosmetic industry. I wanted to make a bold statement of my pride in my heritage and the skin I am in, and I hope to help other young Arabs and women of color to feel confident in their culture and unique beauty.

 

I noticed that pigmented eyeshadows for darker skin tones were hard to find. So, I created the Mirage palette which was made to pop on all skin tones. It includes three duochromes, three shimmers, and three mattes. The palette is incredibly versatile, leaving you to create a basic matte look, a poppin pink, a blue, a gold, or many colors in between - and each row is made to be an easy look. If you look across you will find:

 

- a gold duochrome, a deep gold, a white matte in the first row

-a pink duochrome, vibrant pink, and a tan matte in the second row

- a duochrome blue, bright blue, and matte black in the bottom row

The Impact:

Inclusivity is not just about the appearance of the product. Inclusivity is about the ingredients in the product. We know Muslims, Jews, vegans, and cruelty-free customers need products that they can trust. With ALWAN you don't have to compromise your look for your ethics. It's always a package deal for us.

ALWAN is more than a beauty brand. It is a statement of pride and confidence in your unique background and style.

What We Need & What You Get:

  • We need upwards of 10k in order to purchase machinery. I am hand-making makeup in my apartment. This is not a viable business model as I scale up. I need funding to be able to purchase machinery to fill lip gloss tubes and press eyeshadows perfectly as it is incredibly difficult and ineffecient to conduct without professional tools - it's like trying to play football with a pinecone.
  • We also need funding to obtain copyrights on our shade names and collections, as well as seeking protection for our unique formulas.
  • We need this funding to scale up production and continue developing new products. 
  • If we fail to reach our goal, we will continue searching used cosmetic machinery sales and continue selling hand-made products in the meantime. Every dollar can go towards something, whether it is purchasing packaging, restocking pigment powders or raw materials, or running advertisements. 

Perks of Donating:

  • You can receive products before the launch, coupon codes, and custom palettes if you hit donation milestones. Even $1 of donated money will earn you a perk. 

Risks & Challenges

The cosmetics industry is cluttered with brands, however, we hope to offer something unique and aim to be the first Middle-Eastern-inspired brand to enter the mainstream of beauty.

  • I am supported by the AUCI incubator and studying business, so I can reach out to mentors and get professional business advice at any time. In times of struggle for the business, every resource available to me will be reached.   

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You don't have to donate to help! Spread the word, however you can to support the cause of inclusive beauty
story_txt:
The Story: 
My name is Yasmina and I am the Founder of ALWAN COSMETICS. I started making makeup in my dorm room my Freshman year and opened an Etsy shop selling my handmade eyeshadows and highlighters. Over the course of a year, I tested my makeup on every willing person I could find, ensuring that the products were as vibrant on the palest shades as on the deepest ones.
The Problem:
As an Arab woman, I never felt represented by the cosmetic industry. I wanted to make a bold statement of my pride in my heritage and the skin I am in, and I hope to help other young Arabs and women of color to feel confident in their culture and unique beauty.
 
I noticed that pigmented eyeshadows for darker skin tones were hard to find. So, I created the Mirage palette which was made to pop on all skin tones. It includes three duochromes, three shimmers, and three mattes. The palette is incredibly versatile, leaving you to create a basic matte look, a poppin pink, a blue, a gold, or many colors in between - and each row is made to be an easy look. If you look across you will find:
 
- a gold duochrome, a deep gold, a white matte in the first row
-a pink duochrome, vibrant pink, and a tan matte in the second row
- a duochrome blue, bright blue, and matte black in the bottom row
The Impact:
Inclusivity is not just about the appearance of the product. Inclusivity is about the ingredients in the product. We know Muslims, Jews, vegans, and cruelty-free customers need products that they can trust. With ALWAN you don't have to compromise your look for your ethics. It's always a package deal for us.
ALWAN is more than a beauty brand. It is a statement of pride and confidence in your unique background and style.
What We Need & What You Get:


We need upwards of 10k in order to purchase machinery. I am hand-making makeup in my apartment. This is not a viable business model as I scale up. I need funding to be able to purchase machinery to fill lip gloss tubes and press eyeshadows perfectly as it is incredibly difficult and ineffecient to conduct without professional tools - it's like trying to play football with a pinecone.
We also need funding to obtain copyrights on our shade names and collections, as well as seeking protection for our unique formulas.
We need this funding to scale up production and continue developing new products. 
If we fail to reach our goal, we will continue searching used cosmetic machinery sales and continue selling hand-made products in the meantime. Every dollar can go towards something, whether it is purchasing packaging, restocking pigment powders or raw materials, or running advertisements. 

Perks of Donating:
You can receive products before the launch, coupon codes, and custom palettes if you hit donation milestones. Even $1 of donated money will earn you a perk. 
Risks & Challenges

The cosmetics industry is cluttered with brands, however, we hope to offer something unique and aim to be the first Middle-Eastern-inspired brand to enter the mainstream of beauty.
I am supported by the AUCI incubator and studying business, so I can reach out to mentors and get professional business advice at any time. In times of struggle for the business, every resource available to me will be reached.   
Other Ways You Can Help
You don't have to donate to help! Spread the word, however you can to support the cause of inclusive beauty

story:
What's so Special about a pair of RawWood Shades?


1) Made of Bamboo - No more petroleum-based plastic sunglasses from the mall. Bamboo is a very sustainable resource, and can be replenished quickly. 
2) Polarized - Every single pair of RawWood Shades is polarized. You read that right, every pair, even at our crazy low prices.
3) Floating - Did those $150 shades you dropped while wakeboarding float?
4) High-Quality - Although we are offering our shades for a low price, we hold ourselves to a high standard. Every pair comes with two-way hinged arms to ensure a perfect fit for nearly everyone.

5) Custom Case Included - Every pair comes with a custom bamboo case with laser-etched RawWood logos!


Our Originals in Natural/Smoke


About RawWood Shades Co.

So wooden sunglasses are awesome. But everyone seems to want to make them cost a fortune as well. We can offer an affordable, yet still high quality product, for a fraction of the cost of the other guys. We believe we can successfully change the sunglasses game as we know it.

To get a feel for us, feel free to check out our website at RawWoodShades.com



Our Pledge

At RawWood Shades Co. we also care deeply about the environment. We pledge to plant one tree for every pair of sunglasses ordered. Through our partnership with Trees for the Future, we will be able to plant trees in Africa, Asia, and Latin America. Sure beats buying those petroleum-based plastic sunglasses from the mall doesn't it?


How it Works

On the right of the page you can choose what perk you want, and simply pledge the amount it says, and you will receive your shades at the end of our campaign!

What We Need & What You Get

We're looking to raise funds for our next lineup and to grow and expand our offerings. If you contribute to us, you'll receive your choice of our shades!
Lakers Model - 54x23x145
Brown/Orange

Lakers Model

Black/Blue

Originals Model - Size: 53x18x145
Natural/Green

Originals Model
Brown/Orange

Originals Model

Black/Blue

Originals Model

Natural/Smoke

Cruisers Model - Size: 57x15x145
Brown/Brown



    Why a 2nd Campaign?

    So I'm sure some of you are wondering why, if we've had a successful indiegogo campaign, (https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/rawwood-shad...) are we returning to this platform?

    • Starting a company isn't cheap or easy, we're learning a lot as we go!
    • We want to be able to provide many styles and color variations of our products
    • We want to be able to keep our sunglasses in stock, and this means more money to produce our shades is needed beforehand.
    • In order to continue to produce sustainable products and merge the boundaries between sustainability and fashion.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you don't have the funds to contribute, you can still help us a ton!

      • Like us on Facebook/Follow us on Twitter!
      • Share our project on your social media!

      Thanks again! Feel free to contact us personally if you have any questions whatsoever!

story:
Hughes Titanium Aviators

Completely reengineered to be strong, light, perfectly balanced, fit comfortably, and have incredible optics.

Purchase any of our William Painter Collection...

Finally, the perfect aviator-style sunglasses

Most sunglasses are flimsy, break easily, fit terribly, and are marked up to ridiculous prices. One company owns nearly 90% of the sunglasses market and has slowed innovation and price fixed eyewear. William Painter is changing this by completely re-engineering classic styles, using state of the art materials, and cutting out the middle man. This is the first campaign ever where we will have all of our products offered as perks in support of the development of The Hughes!
A complete new approach to how sunglasses are designed and constructed. 

What makes The Hughes different from other shades?






What does that mean for you?
They're a new level of quality, durability, perfect balance, the best optics and fitamazingly - allowing you to be you.

Look who's talking about William Painter Sunglasses:

Celebrities that wear William Painter sunglasses:


Here's what customers have said about our other sunglasses:


 AEROSPACE GRADE TITANIUM FRAME


Titanium is the strongest metal for its weight, which allows you to use your sunglassesactively without worrying about them breaking.These sunglasses are made from the same materials used in a Fighter jet, F1 Race Car, Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron and many ultra-luxury watches. The Hughes are extremely strong, but also deceptively light. Titanium is also hypoallergenic, meaning it is perfectly safe for the human body. Doctors use the element forhip and knee replacements for this reason.

ARMOUR COATING


You are an active person, who needs eyewear that can keep up. We examined drill bits, knives, firearms and F1 race car pistons. From this, we developed our own titanium protective coating. Our coating "Armour" comes in both matte gold and matte black! This stuff is strong...like military strong.

REAR WEIGHTED BALANCE


Ever had sunglasses fall down your nose? We HATE that! Proper sunglass fitment is taken to heart. By using a thick titanium and ultralight lens, we are able to greatly improve the center of balance.This makes for a very comfortable fit, helping ensure the glasses stay planted on your beautiful face.

WORLD'S LIGHTEST POLARIZED LENSES


Lenses are taken VERY seriously around here. What's the point in making awesome sunglasses if the optics are crappy? We literally searched all around the world looking at various types of lenses. From Glass, Polycarbonate, CR39, Acrylic, and Nylon. Each one hasits merits but we wanted something truly exceptional. We are extremely proud to introduce William Painter's Lifelong Lenses.They are the lightest in the world, less than half the weight of traditional glass lenses. Our lenses offer superior optical quality, durability, andacid resistance to anything else on the market. Our lenses are PREMIUM - they cost more to produce than an entire Oakley pair.

NEXT-GEN POLARIZATION


Polarized lenses neutralizes glare, clear up objects and reduce eye strain. They work especially well on car windshields, oceans or lakes and other high glare environments. Typically lenses have a polarizing and tint coating added to the top of the lens to achieve this effect. Over time, however, the polarizing and tint can bubble and flake off of the lens. Have you everseen a bad tint job on a car? Same problem. Our LifeLong Lenses go one step further. We integrate both the polarizing and tint layers all the way through the lens, so it will last forever.

LASER ETCHED


We want you to have only the very best. Each one of our titanium arms is laser engraved to ensure it stands the test of time. It's the details that matter, and we think it is the perfect finishing touch.

PROTECTIVE HARDCASE


We have worked really hard on making a high quality pair of glasses, but also a way to protect them. The William Painter hardcase is custom built for the "Hughes,"it fits snuggly and doesn't shake around when moving the case. We tried over 100 hardcases and this one is perfect.

PERKS



The Gold Hughes - $165 -  Save $20 off retail price!


The Matte Black Hughes - $165 -  Save $20 off retail price!


The Hook - $145 - Save $40 off retail price!

"The Hook" are made from aerospace grade titanium, ultra durable, top of the line nylon polarized lenses, rear weighted balance and open beer bottles. 



Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo allows us to purchase the materials required to create the Hughes and expand the William Painter brand. This includes: Our LifeLong Lenses, titanium and hard cases. This stuff is extremely high quality, but it is also expensive. We need your help!

Thank you for your support!

Here's the timeline to production:

• June-July Indiegogo Time!

• July -  Use funds to pay for initial deposit on inventory invoice

• November - Finish Production

• End of November: All orders ship to customers
Please Pledge Your Support!

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. We need your help to bring these to market! Help us make The Hughes sunglasses possible by clicking the "Contribute Now" button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

Thank you so much for your support! We look forward to delivering these amazing sunglasses and watch you get all of those jealous stares!

Risks and Challenges


We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for primetime and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks:

MANUFACTURING: The molds and tooling have already been created. The manufacturer has lined up and is trusted as we have used them for our other pairs.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team in Asia to get our products to the US. We have used them before, from there the product goes into our 3PL warehouse and should be on the way to you shortly after that!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share the campaign and let your friends know about this amazing project. 
Thank you so much for your support!
- The William Painter Team

story:
Odus: Time For Payback 

Hey all you Candy Crushers out there, it's time for us to ban together and get our payback. Odus is going down! 

Imagine the feeling of getting back at Odus for all those times he's fallen off and stopped you from getting to the next level. Imagine putting him in the cross hairs and taking him out for good. 

Now you can...  I'm making an app for all of us Odus haters! We'll finally be able to get the payback we've always wanted. 

App Development:

  • App development is under-way (design phase)
  • I'm working with a few app development companies on the concept/design
  • We'd welcome any ideas or ways you'd like to get back at Odus - maybe your idea would be part of the game! 
The Market:
Candy Crush is one of the most popular games out there. This is your chance to be a part of the next best app. 93 Million people play Candy Crush everyday!
