story:
Introducing WooBots – a high-quality wood robot collection designed for action-packed fun. Play, transform and enjoy!

About WooBots

 

 

They’re new, they’re full of energy and they’re taking over the streets. The WooBots have hit the ground to change the game for everyone.

 

 

WooBot is a collection of premium wooden robots specially crafted to transform into different states in just a few seconds. Each character is totally unique in design, and the limits to creativity are endless. This is a toy for people of all ages, and one that will make the most amazing gift for anyone. 

Meet WooBots Family 

Beetle: The youngest member of the team, Beetle is full of youthful enthusiasm, and can move at incredible speeds!

 

 

Truck: This guy always knows where he’s headed and is the one to lead the crew into battle. He becomes a sturdy truck in just a few seconds.

 

 

Warship: He’s tough and unstoppable, and contains the most awesome weapon of the whole team. Watch out when he’s angry…

 

 

AutoBus: Big, robust and reliable, AutoBus is one of the bedrocks of the team who you’ll always want on your side. He's always there with backup for the team.

 

 

Jet Fighter: They'll never stop this guy when he’s in jet mode! He’s aerodynamic in flight, and always ready for action on the ground.

 

 

Play and Transformation

All of the WooBots can turn into two different pre-determined forms, but what you do with them is really up to your imagination, making them not only a fun toy or a collector’s item, but also a tool for developing creativity. And we’re not just talking about little ones. the WooBots are just as much fun for grown ups too!

 

 

Why Did We Use Wood? 

It all started from a piece of wood, why? Because gone are the days of cheap and nasty plastic toys. The wood we use is of the highest quality, making it durable for years to come.

Concept and Design

We've spent a huge amount of time perfecting these toys, and though it wasn’t an easy feat, we’ve created something we’re very proud of. 

 

 

Each toy is 13-15cm tall and made of 15 to 20 wooden blocks, cut by a laser machine for precision. We’ve assembled the toys by hand to ensure that each of them moves and transforms perfectly.

story:
Who We Are

COUCOU is a Denver-based online specialty store comprised of thoughtfully curated designer apparel, accessories, art, and home objects.  Our point of view is distinct and not fixed, creating a store at the forefront of change yet firmly rooted in our values.  COUCOU is style before fashion, always considering design and our ecological impact on the planet.

Our Campaign

We are looking to meet and exceed our campaign goal of $30,000 towards the buildout of our brick & mortar store in the Navajo Arts Districts in the bustling Highlands neighborhood.  Your generous contribution funds store fixtures, art, interior improvements, and in-store events.

Contributors join the movement of bringing sustainable luxury to Denver.  We see the potential to introduce our designers to the Mile High City and host events to engage with the community. We aim to be your friend and destination for fun.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal: $30,000

What this covers:

  • Store fixtures (racks, furniture, greenery)
  • Art - we promote and feature artists we admire
  • In-store events -- our proposed calendar includes art exhibitions, DJ sets, classes, food truck events, and PopUp stores.  We also have a fantastic backyard which will host a PopUp tiki bar.

Your Impact

  • Your contribution supports a local, small, female-owned and operated business
  • Your contribution brings sustainable fashion, art, and culture to the growing Denver community
  • Your contribution solidifies Denver as an emerging creative-scene

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate all the help we can get.  For those that cannot make monetary contribution, here are other ways you can help COUCOU:

  • Get the word out!  Share our campaign on your social media and within your social circles
  • Shop our online store!  www.shopcoucou.com

Get the word out!  Share our campaign on your social media and within your social circles
Shop our online store!  www.shopcoucou.com

story:
Christmas in July - Special Olympics

Dagmar Obert, blogger and resident design at expert at Balsam Hill has chosen to support the Special Olympics for Balsam Hill's Christmas in July Giving Campaign. 

Pictured above, Coach Dagmar Obert with her Special Olympics Unified Sports soccer team, Team BUS. 

The Mission of the Special Olympics 

The mission of Special Olympics is to provide year-round sports training and athletic competition in a variety of Olympic-type sports for children and adults with intellectual disabilities, giving them continuing opportunities to develop physical fitness, demonstrate courage, experience joy and participate in a sharing of gifts, skills and friendship with their families, other Special Olympics athletes and the community.

The Impact

The Special Olympics is the world's largest sports organization and public health organization for people with intellectual disabilities. The donation tiers and perks are as follows...

  • $5 - A chance to receive the entire Balsam Hill Mistletoe & Holly Ornament Set
  • $25 - A Balsam Hill Mistletoe & Holly Christmas Ornament

Your donation will go directly to the Special Olympics, as improve the lives of people with intellectual disabilities worldwide.
*All donations to this campaign, up to $1,000, will be matched by Balsam Hill.

Other Ways You Can Help

The Special Olympics has numerous opportunities in volunteering and fundraising. 

Click here to see the efforts of other bloggers, as they raise money for various charities, with Balsam Hill matching their funds raised.

story:
My Story

I have a real passion for curling and making it fun. After finding that most of the available uniforms and bags for curling were black, I took it upon myself to make things more colorful, fun and speak to an individual's personality.

While in college I took some extra time to learn how to make kilts and bag patterns. I've been curling in a kilt for about 15 years. I played most of my junior years in New Brunswick Canada, and when I moved to Los Angeles, I desperately missed the curling pro shops. This made it more important for me to expand my small efforts into the local curlers.

It started to blow up after I was making uniforms for my team "the Bond Girls". We enjoy trying to be ambassadors to the sport, spreading the idea of the game of curling wherever with go with tons of conversations and friendships. We became known in some of the curling communities for our positive attitudes and bright pink uniforms. We now have 3 different changes of pink kilts, all with matching broom bags for traveling. Our broom bag sure stands out in a sea of black bags at tournaments!

It makes me so happy to have someone order their custom kilt or bag that speaks of their personality. I truely enjoy every item that I make and have started to expand into curling themed purses and linens.

What I Need & What You Get

There are so many thing that I want to accomplish, but I need your help!

  • This year I sponsored the US Womens' curling team with items to take to Sochi as well as a broom bag for the US junior boys to take to Switzerland. I would like to have the funding to be a sponsor to all teams representing the US at the World level of play, every year, not just in an Olympic year.
  • There are curling supply stores that are willing to carry my products and take custom orders for me. The funding would help me supply them with sample bags and kilts as well as a catalog and fabric samples.
  • I would like to provide a better quality of bags for my customers with an upgrade to my current embroidery machine. The stitching would be of better quality and detail as well as a possibility to be much larger in size.
  • Every order I get I need to travel to my supplier for individual fabric in hopes that they still carry it. This I will always gladly do, but it would be great to have a constant supply of fabric in my studio to guarantee my customers will always get their first choice!
  • All donators or $25 and above receive something special that is handmade by me and every single donator gets a shout out on all of my social media pages. The more you donate the more elaborate of a gift you get.
  • Everything helps, even if I don't make my goal, all of my fundraising will help me get one step closer to my goal, this fundraising will help me towards any of my individual goals

The Impact

I love giving curlers personality in their uniforms and equipment storage. Once you talk to me, it's not hard to see how much love I put into every single item that I make.

Notable projects:

  • 60 broom bags for the Optima junior curling league
  • 20 custom kilts for a highland dance company
  • Sponsorship of multiple teams at a national and international level.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not all support of my endeavors requires a donation

  • Spread the word about my custom products over the internet www.facebook.com/cinsationalcurling                                                                   www.twitter.com@kiltedcurler                                                                                                             and on www.CinSationalCurling.com
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to help me get the word out!

I have had so much support for the years I've been making my custom curling items, so thank you so much  to everyone!

story:
Who is behind this project?

We are two sisters from Venezuela. We are obsessed about graphic design and we love to share our vision with the world. Rather than an actual physical studio, picture us living in 2 different cities (Los Angeles and San Diego) making our design studio out of every space where the creative process happens. Even though we rely on technology 100% to keep us connected in business, we share an amazing bond that allows our design magic to happen with ease and grace.

Our designs are eye-catching. We have developed a portfolio of a variety of innovative designs that reflect our multicultural influences crossed with the modern trends of today. Our designs hold the potential to develop into a unique brand yet still converge into today's audience demands.

This project is all about supporting us to get to the big Trade Show SURTEX 2013 in New York City in May 2013 - where we can have the opportunity to connect to buyers from around the world. We hope that your support of our design collections will make a big impression at this important event!

Along this page is a sneak peak of our designs. We wish we could show more but we need to be copyright cautious.

Here is a scoop of our plans..

This show will be a key platform to expand our business into the licensing industry... So we are building an extensive portfolio of our original art, so that when we connect with potencial buyers everything is in place for buyers to take our designs out to the world.

Besides designing, designing and more designing we've taken care of more than the basics. We have paid for our booth, made flight and hotel reservations, designed our promotional material and started to design our booth decoration. Now, here is where we need your help: once the booth decoration and the promo material are ready for production we'll need to cover the following:

The money that you donate to the project will go directly toward funding the following expenses:

  • Printing promotional materials 
  • Marketing Campaign
  • Furniture and general decoration for the booth 
  • Shipping all those materials (for booth decoration to NYC) 

Funding will also go towards:

  • Copyrighting our art
  • Printing and building Hardcover Portfolios
  • Purchasing the technology necessary to show our art during the trade show

THE BEST SUPPORT YOU CAN GIVE US IS TO PLEDGE FOR US!

Thank you so much! for your pledge. We hope you’ll not only help us make our dream a reality by supporting and donating to our project, but to also help us spread the word far and wide! We are counting on you!!

HERE’S HOW YOU CAN HELP SPREAD THE WORD:

1.    Tweet about it! This is our handle @daridesign on twitter. Here are some sample tweets that you can copy and paste (or change to make your own or whatever) to make it extra quick and easy for you:

@daridesign is going to #SURTEX2013! Help them make their dream a reality @indiegogo http://ow.ly/fayM1 

Amazing Designs! @daridesign needs your help to make it to #SURTEX2013 @indiegogo http://ow.ly/fayM1 

Great Designs! Help @daridesign reach their dream of going to #Surtex2013 for the first time! http://ow.ly/fayM1

2.    Please feel free to use the same messages above to post on facebook, change them to your liking or write your own. If you haven't already this is great opportunity to like us on Facebook.

3.    Post a badge on your blog or your website telling the world that you’re supporting our project! You can right click and save the badges below to use them. Link it back to this page so more people can learn all about it! :)

Connect with us--> Our Website, Blog, Facebook and Twitter!

story:
Our Story

Simply put, we want people to wear our shirts and we want to help great causes.  We design comfy, quality screen printed shirts inspired by our own vintage and modern style t-shirt collections.  Our shirts are sold to benefit various charities and causes that, in some way or another, have become important to us.  As well as selling our shirts to benefit some well known charities, we also offer an avenue for people to contact us with their own personal cause, we will design and print shirts to benefit them.  We feel that we can make shirts that people will not only feel good about buying, but will also want to wear.


The Impact

We hope to impact many various charities and causes through the sales of our shirts.  We also want to spread the word and encourage people to contact us with their own cause that they would like us to support.  It would be a great feeling for us to know that the more we were able to help these causes, the more people are walking around in our shirts - and vice-versa.


What We Need & What You Get

We have set a goal of $1500 to help us get MiMA off the ground.  If we meet our goal this money would be used primarily to print shirts, and a small amount may go towards possible website improvements.  In the unfortunate event that we don't reach our goal, donations here will be returned and we will seek out other sources of funding to ultimately make our project a success.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to help us with funding, we do ask that you help us to spread the word.  Please tell a friend about us.  Check us out at http://www.mimaclothing.com !!!


Like us on Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/MiMA-Clothing/117...


Follow us on Twitter:

http://twitter.com/#!/mimaclothing


Thanks for reading this far!

story:
Sponsor a hat for PatPat'sHats for just $5!!!

 

On August 30th, 2011, Patrick James Raymond was taken to Yale New Haven Children's Hospital ER. For about 2 weeks he had been complaining of a "boo boo" on his head and Vomiting. The Pediatrician thought he must have a stomach bug, but he just wasn't  getting better. That day she advised his mommy to take him to the hospital. The ER residents immediately recommended an MRI, that showed 3 masses on Patrick's brain.

 

Surgery to remove the tumors was scheduled for the next day, and the surgeon was able to perform a 100% resection. However, we also learned that the tumors were malignant. A condition called Desmoplastic Medulloblastoma.

As a knitter, I immediately cast on a hat for Patrick to wear. I continued to knit him more hats, as I knew chemo would leave him with no hair. When I discovered that one of the hats was too small for Patrcik, I decided to donate it to the hospital.

 

I reached out to my knitting and crafting friends to see if they would be able to knit hats to donate, and I received an overwhelming response.

 

Thus began, PatPat's Hats!!

 

We were able to donate 650 hats in January, and are well on our way to donating over 2000 hats!!! Visit our Website to see the other organizations that have benefitted from PatPat's Hats (www.patpatshats.com)

From beginning to end, it costs us about $5 to donate a hat. These costs include Storage bags for each hat (to keep them clean), postage for shipping hats and thank you notes, paper for our PatPat's Hats Tags, and also providing yarn and needles to community groups who want to make hats for PatPat's Hats.

 

For those of you that are not able to craft a hat, would you consider sponsoring a hat so that we can continue to reach out to many children.

story:
It started with an idea for one excellent little logo...

 Hoopie!

The spirit of an Ohio town captured in one simple word.

Now you can wear it with pride!

 

 

We are putting our hoopie logo onto t-shirts, long sleeve t-shirts, sweatshirts, hoodies, vinyl stickers, magnets and postcards, and then making them available to you!

 

This is a completely unique design which is available NOWHERE ELSE but right here!

 

Carry your hoopie pride on a Glamorgan castle tour!

 

 

Drive your hoopie-emblazoned car to Super Duper to pick up some Chinese Cookies!

 

 

Send a note to your granny on a hoopie postcard telling her how this year's fireworks were good, but last year's were better!

 

 

Slap a hoopie on your laptop and brag to all your facebook friends while enjoying some blue moon ice cream!


 

Right now we're starting small, with just a few items available, but if this project goes well we hope to produce more exciting hoopie items, including hoopie underwear, hoopie dog shirts, hoopie baby bibs, hoopie camouflage shirts, and hoopie label root beer, orange and cherry pop!

Also, while this logo is specific to what we consider to be the center of the hoopie world, Alliance, Ohio, if we get word that folks in surrounding communities would like to join in the fun we can create items for their towns as well. You hear that, Sebring, Salem, and Louisville? Give us a shout!

 

Bonus: The hoopie holidays are coming!

 

We also have this excellent hoopie holidays logo available on holiday cards, t-shirts and hoodies!

 

Orders placed through this indiegogo campaign will be available for delivery before Christmas, so don't delay!

 

All prices include domestic shipping.

 

Out-of-country orders please include an additional $10 for international shipping.

All items are high quality products, professionally screenprinted onto preshrunk heavy cotton Gildan t-shirts and sweatshirts, sizes available from youth small to unisex adult XXL (please add $2.00 for XXL shirt orders). All shirts are available in black, grey, red, green, orange, purple, pink and light and dark blue.

 


Who We Are

This project is a collaborative effort between Stacey Smith and Devon W Thompson, who have known each other since they were both eight-years-old. In the many days and weeks since they first met Devon and Stacey have, between the two of them, been gainfully employed as a photographer, travel writer, manny, puppeteer, accountant, newspaper columnist, park ranger, hostel manager, barmaid, bookseller, kindergarten teacher, pharmacy clerk and sideshow illusionist. They live in the center of the hoopie universe, Alliance, Ohio, with two children, Lulu and Liam, a cat, Sushi, a fish, Redtail Spiderman, and an enormous moustache. Combined, Devon and Stacey are over eleven-and-a-half feet tall.

story:
This watch is named “Tokiji”. The direct translation from this Japanese is “time numerals” 

The seven segment digit was patented in 1903 for a method of telegraphically transmitting numbers to be printed on tape. The first digital wrist watch was an LED prototype in 1970. Perhaps this type of digit is fading away as our interface design, and display technologies advance, but let’s not forget how they have taken such a prominent place in the background of our everyday lives. Our new Tokiji watch gives them the respect they deserve. These vivid digits are generously spaced on a rich, black dial, surrounded by a handsome, minimal case. 

 

This watch features a striking display based on a unique approach that we have spent years developing. This breakthrough process is something that we began to develop with our original digital watch, but have refined this process for Tokiji.

All digital watches hide the frame of their liquid crystal display (LCD). This is usually done by printing a masking window on the underside of the watch’s lens. What always irritated us, is that the black of the LCD, and the black of the mask are essentially the same. However, when they are overlapped, the light is refracted, so they always look different. The window’s shape stands out, and is not particularly related to the watch’s overall design. It is simply something that the watch designer has to work around.

Our digital display eliminates this problem with an original process developed by us. After much trial and error,  we found the best way to remove all of the air, and space from between the lens, and the LCD display, so the light can pass straight through. Because the light is now uninhibited, both of these blacks line up perfectly. This allows us to eliminate the window all together, and make our mask the shape of the actual display graphics. 

The result of this process makes for a very deep, and consistent black across the entire watch face to accentuate its vivid digits.

 

  • Movement:  custom digital module
  • Batteries:  two V371 silver oxide batteries*
  • Dimensions:  Ø38 x 8.5 mm  / Ø1.5” x 0.35” 
  • Functions: Time, Date, Alarm, 2nd Timezone, Stopwatch, Backlight
  • Case: 304 stainless steel 
  • Lens: hardened mineral glass 
  • Bands: premium calfskin leather, or stainless steel mesh
  • Weight with leather band: 50 g / 1.76 oz. 
  • Weight with mesh band: 70 g / 2.47 oz. 
  • Water resistance: 3 ATM (30 m / 100') 
  • Warranty: 2 Years  

 

In this campaign, we are offering two case styles: uncoated stainless steel, and IP black plated stainless steel. These can be combined with one of three bands: black leather, stainless steel mesh, and IP black stainless steel mesh. Once the Tokiji campaign is complete, we will be in touch every backer directly to take their preference. 

 

We believe that the products we choose for ourselves, particularly the ones we carry with us throughout the day, are extensions of us. They should act to reinforce our persona, not distract from it. Therefore, as policy, we never display our logo on the face of your watch. Our branding is always close by on the back of the watch. Commonly, this information is etched onto the removable caseback. In this case, ours is set outside of the caseback, to make this an ideal location for etching your personal message. We are planning to offer this service in the near future.

 

Final assembly, and quality check will be directly overseen by us at our Tokyo studio. 

 

All of the leather, and mesh bands we produce have release levers attached. No tools are required to easily remove, and replace these bands.

 

Normal Timepieces packaging, and warranty card.

 

Normal Timepieces was founded by Ross, and Madoka McBride in 2006. Ross is from the United States, but has lived more than half of his life in Tokyo. Madoka is from Hiroshima. Their motivations for creating this brand is an analogy to their relationship itself. It was founded on the combined influences of pioneering mid-century American design, as well as the Japanese sense of minimalism, and craftsmanship. Wikie Sato joined this team in 2015. Her previous experience was perfectly tailored to Normal with her Hong Kong upbringing, graphic design studies in Australia, and work experience the Japanese fashion industry.

If you would like to know more about us, and the Normal brand, you can always see more information on our website <www.normaltimepieces.com>, and through our social media accounts <Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook>.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tokiji in action. 

This is a video of us playing with an idea of how to present Tokiji for its first public display. 

 

 

SHIPPING

Please note that if you live outside of Japan, we will be sending your order through the postal system by EMS. These shipments are express, and insured. Once sent out, we will email you its tracking number so you can monitor its progress. We will cover the shipping cost. However, you will be responsible for any applicable custom fees that your country’s post office may require for delivery. Additionally, the estimated delivery time is generally 7~14 days. However, this may take a little longer due to the standards of destination country’s postal system. 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

While this is our first crowd funding project, we have been making wristwatches since 2006. We have a good relationship with the company that is producing this watch's components as they are one of the first factories that we ever worked with. For this watch, we will be doing the final assembly, and quality check in Japan so we can oversee this part directly before shipping out.

Of course, every project like this potentially has unforeseen bumps in the road. We will be monitoring all aspect of this project diligently. We will post our progress on a regular basis, and be upfront about any issues, or delays.
story_txt:
This watch is named “Tokiji”. The direct translation from this Japanese is “time numerals” The seven segment digit was patented in 1903 for a method of telegraphically transmitting numbers to be printed on tape. The first digital wrist watch was an LED prototype in 1970. Perhaps this type of digit is fading away as our interface design, and display technologies advance, but let’s not forget how they have taken such a prominent place in the background of our everyday lives. Our new Tokiji watch gives them the respect they deserve. These vivid digits are generously spaced on a rich, black dial, surrounded by a handsome, minimal case.  This watch features a striking display based on a unique approach that we have spent years developing. This breakthrough process is something that we began to develop with our original digital watch, but have refined this process for Tokiji.All digital watches hide the frame of their liquid crystal display (LCD). This is usually done by printing a masking window on the underside of the watch’s lens. What always irritated us, is that the black of the LCD, and the black of the mask are essentially the same. However, when they are overlapped, the light is refracted, so they always look different. The window’s shape stands out, and is not particularly related to the watch’s overall design. It is simply something that the watch designer has to work around.Our digital display eliminates this problem with an original process developed by us. After much trial and error,  we found the best way to remove all of the air, and space from between the lens, and the LCD display, so the light can pass straight through. Because the light is now uninhibited, both of these blacks line up perfectly. This allows us to eliminate the window all together, and make our mask the shape of the actual display graphics. The result of this process makes for a very deep, and consistent black across the entire watch face to accentuate its vivid digits. 
Movement:  custom digital module
Batteries:  two V371 silver oxide batteries*
Dimensions:  Ø38 x 8.5 mm  / Ø1.5” x 0.35” 
Functions: Time, Date, Alarm, 2nd Timezone, Stopwatch, Backlight
Case: 304 stainless steel 
Lens: hardened mineral glass 
Bands: premium calfskin leather, or stainless steel mesh
Weight with leather band: 50 g / 1.76 oz. 
Weight with mesh band: 70 g / 2.47 oz. 
Water resistance: 3 ATM (30 m / 100') 
Warranty: 2 Years  
 In this campaign, we are offering two case styles: uncoated stainless steel, and IP black plated stainless steel. These can be combined with one of three bands: black leather, stainless steel mesh, and IP black stainless steel mesh. Once the Tokiji campaign is complete, we will be in touch every backer directly to take their preference.  We believe that the products we choose for ourselves, particularly the ones we carry with us throughout the day, are extensions of us. They should act to reinforce our persona, not distract from it. Therefore, as policy, we never display our logo on the face of your watch. Our branding is always close by on the back of the watch. Commonly, this information is etched onto the removable caseback. In this case, ours is set outside of the caseback, to make this an ideal location for etching your personal message. We are planning to offer this service in the near future. Final assembly, and quality check will be directly overseen by us at our Tokyo studio.  All of the leather, and mesh bands we produce have release levers attached. No tools are required to easily remove, and replace these bands. Normal Timepieces packaging, and warranty card. 

Normal Timepieces was founded by Ross, and Madoka McBride in 2006. Ross is from the United States, but has lived more than half of his life in Tokyo. Madoka is from Hiroshima. Their motivations for creating this brand is an analogy to their relationship itself. It was founded on the combined influences of pioneering mid-century American design, as well as the Japanese sense of minimalism, and craftsmanship. Wikie Sato joined this team in 2015. Her previous experience was perfectly tailored to Normal with her Hong Kong upbringing, graphic design studies in Australia, and work experience the Japanese fashion industry.
If you would like to know more about us, and the Normal brand, you can always see more information on our website <www.normaltimepieces.com>, and through our social media accounts <Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook>.         Tokiji in action. This is a video of us playing with an idea of how to present Tokiji for its first public display.   SHIPPINGPlease note that if you live outside of Japan, we will be sending your order through the postal system by EMS. story:
Campaign Ended

The crowdfunding campaign for this project has ended. Head to  http://pridosaurs.com to order Pridosaurs merchandise from now on.  . 

Overview

Hi, I'm Jordan Raskopoulos. I'm a comedian, musician, content creator and variety streamer. I'm also a member of the LGBTQIA+ community and proud advocate.

A few months back, my friend Alex Clark and I created a mascot for my twitch channel, a Transgender Tyrannosaurus called The Tranosaurus. I was looking at developing some new merch ideas and wound up creating a whole gang of dinosaur characters to represent different parts of the LGBTQIA+ community. And I would love your help bringing them to life by funding the production of the first set of Pridosaurs Enamel Pins.

The initial campaign has concluded but you can still contribute and place an order for pins on this page. If you'd like to order stickers, patches or any of the stretch goal pins then place a pledge on this page and a few days later you will receive an e-mail from BackerKit with a link to where you can change the items ordered or order the extra items.

The Pridosaurs

Each Pridosaur represents a different part of the community and is styled in the colours of that community's pride flag.

Lesiosaurus - Lesbian Plesiosaurus
Stegaysaurus -  Gay Stegosaurus 
Biceratops - Bisexual Triceratops
Tranosaurus - Transgender Tyrannosaurus Rex 
Queertzalcoatlus -  Queer Quetzalcoatlus
Interodactyl - Intersex Pterodactyl
Archaeopterace - Asexual Archaeopteryx
Non Binosaurus - Non Binary Spinosaurus
Pankylosaurus -Pansexual Ankylosaurus
Allysaurus - Straight Ally Allosaurus

The Pins

Pridosaurs Pins will be  60mm (2.4 inches) wide, a bit larger than your average pin. They'll feature a double pin back so that they don't rotate or pull on fabric. They will be soft enamel pins pressed into dyed black nickel .

This sample of the Tranosaurus pin is a good indication of the size shape and designs of the pins. Although the final designs won't have the black bar. It's important to see dino feet!

The Campaign

Our aim is to produce ten designs to represent as much of the community as possible. To do that we need to raise at least $5000 to cover production, packaging and shipping of the ten designs.


 

Production

Presuming that the campaign is fully funded the pins will go into production in January 2020 and  shipping will begin in  March.

Shipping

Free shipping for orders within Australia. International orders will occur additional shipping charges based on country and quantity of pins ordered.

Designs

These are the ten designs. Final products may vary slightly

Stretch Goal Designs

These designs will be able to be selected from the backer kit survey at the end of the campaign

story:
What is Marbre by SJ?

Marbre by SJ is a brand that focuses on recycling marble stones into wearable artisan jewelry. Marbre by SJ allows people to see marble in a different way. Marble is typically used as an architectural element, being used in floor plans, kitchen counter tops, and various other categories. The task of an entrepreneur is to come up with innovative ways to make use of wasted materials. Marbre by SJ’s mission is to create the next artisan jewelry store involving all marble jewelry.

How is it made?

Marbre by SJ requires a craftsman’s hands to be fully involved in the making of the marble’s shape, cut, size and shine. Just like any gemstone, marble stones require extra care as it is as fragile as glass. Therefore Marbre by SJ also plays a role in job opportunities, by keeping craftsmanship alive.

How are we eliminating waste?

We search through marble quarries ( a.k.a dumping ground for scrap marble), and find the pieces worth re-purposing. We at Marbre by SJ see the beauty and value in this natural resource, and wish to share its recycled beauty.

Design elements?

Marbre by SJ is made for all ages and ethnicities. We are unique and simple. The ideal type of jewelry we are going for is the “Minimalist” look. Following our identity of eliminating waste, the designs of our projects determine the feel.

Are they heavy?

We have shared our early prototypes with many people and the most common question is whether or not the jewelry is too heavy. We have kept this at the front of our mind and have addressed this concern in the design, our mission was testing the human body and its capacity to feel comfort within the density of physical material to and on the body. Therefore we researched and reviewed every detail that has to do with physical goods an average body can handle. Movement and functionality within the body. We cut and shape our marble to fit as the perfect statement piece.

What we need and what you get?

We as a brand, need your support in the manufacturing process of our pieces. Our jewelry is created an designed by artisan craftsman. What you get for your generosity, is having a hand in creating value for our rising brand, as well as some unique perks! We are showing that scrap marble can be re-purposed and used for something beautiful. Marbre by SJ will be the next artisan store that reuses marble for unique jewelry pieces.

What are our perks?

The perks include all marble features. From magnets, tic tac toe boards, to recycled marble turned serving trays. We are able to give you a glimpse of how marble can be put together creatively, while simultaneously reducing waste in our environment.

When will the perks deliver?

We will have perks delivered by February 2018.

Who are we?

My name is Shireen, studying at Suffolk University, majoring in entrepreneurship. I took the challenge of taking a unique crowdfunding course offered at my school. Compared to other courses this course challenged me to create a product which is sustainable recyclable and unique. Growing up I was always found of marble as the veins within it and its colorful textures  tell a story about earth's vibrational rhythms to me. I wish the whole world can contribute in changing the ways we see marble.

&

My name is Kristy, studying at Suffolk University, double majoring in Entrepreneurship and Marketing. I am collaborating with Shireen and becoming a partner of Marbre by SJ, because I add value to this unique brand. My father is a craftsman, and I fell in  love with the idea of re-purposing marble into artistic jewlery pieces! I am excited to be a part of this exciting journey, for I am a young Entrprenuer as well.

story:
The World's 1st LMD* (Liquid Metal Display*) Watch!

Join a revolution in watch design, chemical intelligence, and support this first amazing liquid metal technology and watch design break-through!

Liquid Metal Display Watch changes from cool shapes into metal hands to tell the time!

** Pre Order   You can Pre Order LM Watch on our site

       http://www.seahope.com/page002.html

**For Japanese
　  日本語のプレオーダー（ご予約）はこちらからもできます。→　ご予約・プレオーダー

（ 価格につきましては為替リスクも考慮しましてこちらindiegogoより若干高くなります。　　こちらのindiegogoでもサポートをいただけましたら幸いです。）




Metallium*(Liquid Metal) and LMD* (Liquid Metal Display*)

The Watch design concept is inspired in part from art,  and by famous sci-fi movies  "Terminator". For many years have we dreamed to use an amazing Liquid Metal as a technology of the future - that can function and change into any shape; just like the morphing metal seen in the "Terminator" movies - but in a less ominous way of course!


Now, after many years of search and research, we found a new material called 'Metallium'*.  We studied it, learned to program it, and found a way to use it in this world First Ever Invention - The Liquid Metal Display Watch!


LMD* (Liquid Metal Display*)

We are excited to share With YOU, our first backers, this World's 1st - A Watch using the 'liquid metal display'* of time! This liquid changes shape freely and then stops at the position of time.  One stops at the hour, another at the minute to reveal the time!






LMD* Watch Samples

Sample of LMD* Movement / Properties





LMD* Color variation

We were able to find ways of altering the liquid metal and change its color gradient.  This first ever LMD*  Watch is available in Star Dust (Silver/Chrome), Gun Metal Black (Pewter), and Gold.

We also offer 2 types of straps: Leather or Metal



Gun Metal Black is a cool mix of silver and black pewter.  See our stretch goals, as we plan to release even more colors if our initial goal is achieved!


How to read the time




Features of the watch 

 1 Liquid Metal Display ( Liquid metal indicate the  time)

 2 Analog quartz movement

 3 Back light

 4 3ATM water resistant

 5 Center liquid feels "Liquid" (becomes small flower/jewel shape)


Light up image


Material of the watch

     Brass Metal case

     Japan quartz movement

     SS case back

     Leather strap or SS metal strap

     Mineral glass lens

    LMD* Display


   Sizes  

  


Stretch Goal



If we surpass our initial goal, we will release 3 more colors, Chrome BLUE, Chrome GREEN, and Chrome RED. This is only possible if we raise more than $20,000.


Experience

Master Kimura and his staff at SEAHOPE have over 18 years experience producing stylish, unique, and sci-fi inspired watches. 

We have already released many unique LED watches and LCD watches (see photos). We think that LMD* will create a revolution in the watch industry - hope you can be part of it.


Production schedule

Below is the schedule for our First production run.



Development

We need your help to start mass production. On the success of the campaign, we will send you updates about the first production and your perks!  We will also post on this page, as well as our website.


Warrantee

LMD Watch has 1 year warrantee.

Note on Repairs:

You can mail the watch to our post  directly to our Office in Japan for repairs if needed. Contact us for more details and the procedure/timing.

Note on Wrist Band Length:

We are able to accommodate special requests for wristbands sizes - please send us a request after you have pre-ordered, and tell us if you need a large size of over 9 inches or a small size of under 5 inches. 


Perks


*

story:
Meet CUJO

CUJO Continuously Improves
To Keep Your Accounts, Finances
and Privacy Safe From Criminals.

Now shipping! Your order ships next business day.

 
 

Who Is CUJO For?

 
 
 

That's Why We Built CUJO

To protect your devices from a broad range of attacks, CUJO goes beyond traditional security by using a multilayer approach that combines firewall, antivirus, and malware typically found in separate devices.
 

What CUJO Can Do

 

How We Do It

CUJO acts as a gateway between your devices and for your connection to the Internet. We inspect packets of data coming and leaving your network and block threats before they can reach the target or do damage. We analyze behavior and secure all devices connected to your network. This is critical because newly connected devices don't have pre-installed security.
 
Unlike traditional solutions, CUJO adapts and reacts when your home is attacked and does not rely just on libraries of known malware issues. We analyze a humongous amount of behavioral data in our cloud and push learnings from one home to all CUJO protected homes.
 

Perks: Only on Indiegogo

As a thank you for backing us, we are offering a CUJO device at a price well below what it will retail for later. All our devices are bundled with many months of service so you will be saving a lot by getting a CUJO here on Indiegogo. After your initial subscription is over you will be able to switch to a monthly ($8.99). So unlike others who require you to pay to protect each individual device, for a small monthly fee we will protect all of your devices.
*Why charge a subscription for service? Your CUJO will be connected to our security network, which requires expensive upkeep. Also, Internet security is a 24/7 battle. We have a team of people that will enforce the latest security practices to keep your home safe against new hacks. Enterprises pay thousands for such a service, we make it available for homes for much less. And don't forget, as our backer you will get many months of absolutely FREE service!
 

Our Team

We are a team of researchers and engineers with decades of collective security and engineering experience. We combine brilliant software with flawless design to create fantastic products. We are inspired to be working on a device that will allow you to experience a connected life without compromise. If you ever find yourself in LA, stop by to say hello!
 
 

Why We Need You

We've spent a lot of resources to get this far, but now we need your help. With your backing we will bring CUJO to the masses.
We will pay for tooling and manufacturing setup. To manufacture a device like this one, we need to place an order of at least 1,000 units. We already picked manufacturing partners and will be making our device in the USA. This funding will allow them to go to work.
 
We will complete the electrical design. We've prototyped CUJO on a simple board and are now working with a firm to complete a more powerful version.
 
We will continue to refine and perfect our security algorithms. That's an ongoing process that will continue through the life of the product.
 
Timeline
 

Start CUJO in Seconds

 

What do others think about Internet security?

 

Privacy

As a company passionate about security, your privacy is of the utmost importance to us.

We use bank-level security to protect the communication between your CUJO and the CUJO cloud. Such communication is stored and encrypted using AES-256 bit encryption. Our employees do not have regular access to sensitive information. Our device will contain several layers of hardware security, making it difficult to break into it even with direct physical access to it.
 

FAQ

1. What is the device's range? Same as my router? What if I have a big mansion with devices on three floors?
CUJO connects to your router with an Ethernet cable, so range is not applicable since CUJO does not need to connect to each individual device to offer protection. If your device receives signal from your router, rest assured CUJO has it covered.
2. Will CUJO connect to my network?
To connect CUJO to your network you need to have a wireless router or extender. If you have two wireless routers at home, connect CUJO with an Ethernet cable to the router that you want to protected.
3. If someone else comes to my home with their tablet, laptop or phone and connects to my internet, will CUJO protect it?
When a visitor comes to your home and connects to the internet using your WiFi log in information, their devices will have full protection while they're connected.
4. If CUJO doesn't recognize a device, will it shut the device down?
CUJO will never shut down your connected devices. If it recognizes malicious activity in your network that is attacking a device, CUJO will block the hack or stop the activity on the back end without affecting the device itself. You can, however, choose to shut down any connected device using your CUJO app.
5. Can CUJO be used for small business? At what point would I get a consumer product vs. enterprise product to protect my small business?
While the device is powerful enough to protect some small businesses, that market isn't our focus. Our reasoning? Since homes are most vulnerable to attacks, the safety and security of your home is where the bulk of our efforts lie.
6. How many devices does CUJO protect at once?
To date we have not hit the ceiling, so this answer remains “to be determined.” That being said, our hardware is powerful enough to handle capacity in 99 percent of homes. This means CUJO is able to protect 50+ devices simultaneously.
7. What is the Indiegogo campaign close date?
The campaign closes on November 13, 2015.
8. If I live outside of the U.S., can I purchase CUJO and reap all its benefits?
Customers in Canada and the European Union can purchase CUJO to protect their homes. Even though the device will work elsewhere, the U.S., Canada and the European Union are the countries/regions we are focusing on from the regulatory and service perspective. Australia? Yes, your CUJO will work perfectly well in Australia. Please note that you may have to pay duties and taxes when shipping a CUJO outside of the US.
9. Is there a subscription for service?
There are two subscription options: one is a monthly subscription ($8.99) and the other is an annual subscription ($89).
10. What tech support is available?
To start, tech support will be available via phone and email from 8am to 6pm PST. Once we ship in the first quarter of 2016, tech support will be available 24/7/365.
11. What is the lifespan of the device? Will there be updated models? If so, how often?
We are building a device that will be improved through software updates, so our goal is not to sell you a new hardware product every year. We expect your CUJO device to last at least a few years before the hardware will need to be replaced. As we learn from our customers, we will release improved hardware versions when necessary, but again, our main focus is to improve the software.
12. How do I get software updates?
Software updates are available continuously, without service interruption. The CUJO cloud communicates updates and new threats to the device around the clock – it never takes a break, so your device is always up to date.
13. Why do I need CUJO?
We used to have 1 or 2 computers in our homes. Now our home is full of connected devices - from tablets to thermostats - that don't have proper security installed. Virtual criminals are exploiting our networks to steal data, destroy devices, and monitor us at home. This has led to countless incidents that have affected people both virtually and physically. CUJO acts as a shield for your entire home network, adapting continuously to keep you safe.
14. Do I still need Antivirus software for my PC?
CUJO does not scan what is on your PC, but rather looks at traffic coming to and leaving from your PC and other devices. Security needs to be multi-layered so it is absolutely important for you to have a good Antivirus software on your desktops and laptops.
15. Is CUJO going to completely hack-proof my home?
We see CUJO as a very important, hopefully most important, layer of your Internet security. That said, no single solution could protect you against 100% of attacks. For example, modern Antivirus solutions are said to be effective in less than half of attacks. We believe CUJO will be much more effective because it inspects attacks at the gateway level. However, you should keep your current software security and, most importantly, stay vigilant.
16. Can CUJO be hacked?
Any device can be hacked. It is a matter of how much effort and resources one would spend to do it. Being a security company we naturally focus much of our attention to prevent that from happening. We encrypt our connections. And we secured our hardware to be very difficult to penetrate. If it were to happen, criminals would not find much information since we do not store credit card data ourselves and we aggregate only limited packet information in the cloud.
17. Is CUJO a VPN device?
A VPN device secures the information you are sending to your destination. It does not keep you safe from criminals penetrating your network. Though we have a VPN feature in our product roadmap, we are focusing on the larger issue of home hacking. We do that in several ways: behavioral analysis of your device payloads, malware and virus scanning DNS, and packet inspection.
18. I would like more info about privacy. How much of my traffic will my CUJO capture?
It sees MOST of your traffic. We cannot see encrypted payload from banks, social media, etc. We do collect metadata headers based on deep packet inspection. Raw deep packet inspection NEVER leaves your CUJO device and it is not stored. When the CUJO device publishes the metadata, It is important to know that is encrypted and anonymized.
19. What do you collect and what do you keep? Do you log? Will you share with 3rd parties? Could you be required to divulge the information?”
We collect metadata based on destination IP addresses. We log that the communication of your CUJO device is functioning with our cloud. We will NOT share data with 3rd parties. If legally obliged, we can divulge, but the derived data may not be of much use.
20. You state that you anonymously analyze our traffic. How is this possible?
We do see your IP, and is anonymized. Messages come in via push notification on your mobile device.
21. Our home network consists of two access points, connected to a main switch, which then connects to an ERLite-3. Would the CUJO be connected between the router and main switch, or just directly into the main switch? I saw 2 ethernet ports on the back I though, so I was guessing the former was possible.
Plugging the CUJO into the main switch or the router will work.
22. Where can I learn more about CUJO the company?
Please visit our CUJO website to find out more about us. Also, send us an email to hi@getcujo.com.
23. What are the Risks & Challenges associated with this project?
Our team is well equipped to deliver on our promises and to get you working products in time. We have both the technical expertise and previous experience to execute. With that said, there are several things that we need to overcome to succeed: 1) We need to finish electrical engineering. For that, we hired a company with multiple decades of hardware engineering experience. 2) We need to perfect the software. Our beta products are already equipped for that task, but over the next few months we will have to improve software to support thousands of homes. This is certainly a challenge, but one that we have collective experience to overcome. 3) We rely on 3rd party suppliers to build the CUJO hardware. We've approached the vendor selection very carefully, but some aspects and deliverables will always remain out of our control. Given the experience of our suppliers, we trust that there will be minimal unforeseen issues.
 

Press?

Find All Assets and Info Here
 

We should also give a medal to anybody who actually reads all of this...
story_txt:
Meet CUJO
CUJO Continuously ImprovesTo Keep Your Accounts, Financesand Privacy Safe From Criminals.Now shipping! Your order ships next business day.




 

 




 

Who Is CUJO For?


 


 

 

That's Why We Built CUJO
To protect your devices from a broad range of attacks, CUJO goes beyond traditional security by using a multilayer approach that combines firewall, antivirus, and malware typically found in separate devices.
 

What CUJO Can Do


 

How We Do It
CUJO acts as a gateway between your devices and for your connection to the Internet. We inspect packets of data coming and leaving your network and block threats before they can reach the target or do damage. We analyze behavior and secure all devices connected to your network. This is critical because newly connected devices don't have pre-installed security.
 
Unlike traditional solutions, CUJO adapts and reacts when your home is attacked and does not rely just on libraries of known malware issues. We analyze a humongous amount of behavioral data in our cloud and push learnings from one home to all CUJO protected homes.





 

Perks: Only on Indiegogo
As a thank you for backing us, we are offering a CUJO device at a price well below what it will retail for later. All our devices are bundled with many months of service so you will be saving a lot by getting a CUJO here on Indiegogo. After your initial subscription is over you will be able to switch to a monthly ($8.99). So unlike others who require you to pay to protect each individual device, for a small monthly fee we will protect all of your devices.
*Why charge a subscription for service? Your CUJO will be connected to our security network, which requires expensive upkeep. Also, Internet security is a 24/7 battle. We have a team of people that will enforce the latest security practices to keep your home safe against new hacks. Enterprises pay thousands for such a service, we make it available for homes for much less. And don't forget, as our backer you will get many months of absolutely FREE service!
 





Our Team
We are a team of researchers and engineers with decades of collective security and engineering experience. We combine brilliant software with flawless design to create fantastic products. We are inspired to be working on a device that will allow you to experience a connected life without compromise. If you ever find yourself in LA, stop by to say hello!


 

 

Why We Need You
We've spent a lot of resources to get this far, but now we need your help. With your backing we will bring CUJO to the masses.

story:
We are pleased to let you know that we have launched our new campaign. Therefore, if for some reason you did not buy the desired wallet - now you have this the opportunity! Moreover, by your multiple requests we designed a new eco line. Don't forget to share with your friends!

      

Minimalist wallets have seen a huge spike in popularity over the past few years. Slimmer. Smarter. Better.

One would think there is only so much you could do with a wallet, but we have got for you some great stuff. We are all for the shift into the slim wallet era.

Therefore, if you have decided it is about time you invest into a streamlined, minimalist wallet for yourself – we have something really exciting for you!

If you are looking for something minimal, with lots of functions – we have got you covered. 


We took as an example the most stylish and handy of all the existing formats of wallets, with exquisite operating characteristics and a practical design.

AVIADOR is not just a practical and beautiful accessory, but also a multifunctional device with a set of absolutely unique features. It’s an absolutely new kind of accessory that you have never seen before. 

    

By your multiple requests, we would like to introduce a new simplified perk!
Please welcome AVIADOR Basic, that costs only 75$!!!
This offer is exclusive to Indiegogo supporters only!!!
You save 100$ of the retail price! Hurry up!!! 
Please note, this offer is limited.

Please note! This model does not include the following features:
Wallet Open Alert and Flash memory. 


AVIADOR Black - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a black enameled body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Silver - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a silvered body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Gold - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet comes in a gold plated body. Made out of high quality leather, equipped with 8 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

AVIADOR Limited - is a fashionable, handmade tracker wallet, comes in a body of your choice. Made out of high quality snake leather, equipped with 32 GB USB flash memory, NFC chip and electronic key, Panic Button 

The Tracking option will prevent you from losing sight of your wallet and losing your money and valuable information. Once you enable this option, you will receive alerts on increasing distance between the wallet and the Smartphone, so you can quickly return to the place where you have left your wallet. This application will help you finding your phone by displaying the distance left until the wallet. 

The connection works both ways: not only you can find your wallet using your mobile phone, but you can also find your mobile phone using your wallet. You can easily find your phone by pressing the button on your wallet, which will activate tracking regime on your phone and it will ring, helping you find it quickly! 

AVIADOR can inform you when your wallet is being opened, so you will always know when your wallet was opened and keep track of your valuable belongings.Just activate an alarm regime and your wallet will inform you about each time when your wallet is being opened.In case you are in the coverage zone – you will receive notification in the moment of opening, and if you are out of coverage, you will receive the notifications of all the attempts of using your money, once the wallet will be in the coverage zone.

That is not all. One of the wallet’s features is a built in NFC chip, which means that you can pay for your purchases, provide personal information from your business card and so on (check out the NFC options). AVIADOR is also equipped to be used as an electronic key.

You don’t need to worry about your wallet and your mobile phone – you’d better take care of yourself. In case of a dangerous event, you can calmly give the mugger your wallet after you break one of its corners. This Panic Button will activate the SOS regime

Immediately showing the location of the mugger. This data could be used to help the police, to notify your relatives or for your personal use.

When designing the wallet, we paid particular attention to the quality. The wallet is handmade. We use Herbert Kade leather, which is perhaps the best Austrian leather in the world.

We apply rigorous quality standards to the metal part of the wallet that contains the digital information of the device and the memory card. This will make your wallet truly unique.

Built-in BLT4 module with accelerometer, allows  the implementation of amazing features. Even last year this was just a dream and now its about to come true. Whilst working on our prototype, we have paid special attention to the features that are still not available to the users of the BLT trackers. We had to work hard to make the SOS and PANIC functions very reliable, as they will help you save your property and possibly life. To be able to use all the features of AVIADOR tracker wallet, all you need to do is to install a special application to your smartphone and synchronize it with AVIADOR tracker wallet. The application will allow you to make configuration to the SOS notification settings, provide telephone number to send notifications to in case of emergency. The message will contain customized text and GPS coordinates of the location, as well as information about the subsequent movement of the phone at specified intervals. Once the SOS function will be active,the phone will be switched into simulation of discharged phone and the muggers wont know that the phone is still working. The content of the text SMS, may also be configured. Alert function will be available only when using AVIADOR tracker wallet application. Meanwhile, the tracker feature will be available whilst using other applications.

Important Disclaimer: By submitting your contribution you agree that all questions and communication related to this project, contribution and transactions is to be directed to and handled by the project team ONLY (aviador.company@gmail.com). You further agree that no other party is liable for the contributions or any communication. By sending your contribution it is legally binding that you have read and consent to this disclaimer. 



WE RECOMMEND

story:
About us

ZURICH INDUSTRIES is a small Swiss fashion label, based in Zurich Switzerland, inspired by Martial Arts and Bodybuilding. All designs are our own creations and all of our textiles are sustainably manufactured. We pay particular attention to a fair and ecological manufacturing process and the use of high quality materials. Moreover we're supporting humanitarian relief projects worldwide with each sold item. 

About our campaign

This Indiegogo campaign gives us a unique chance to find supporters for our idea and to start the production of our items, especially basic T-Shirts, Sweatshirts and Gymbags. Moreover we have the chance to enlarge our assortment with more items as Performance Shirts, Accessories, Sports bags and a bigger selection of our classic T-Shirts with new designs. 

We are also going to offer individual designs for our supporters.

If our campaign does not reach the target sum, we are going to donate a big part of the reached amount to the Swiss Solidarity foundation, that raises funds for humanitarian relief projects. With the other part we would try to start our business with a tiny selection.

Our main idea

Our main idea is to offer unique clothes with inexpensive prices and to support relief projects at the same moment.

Supporting

We sincerely thank everyone who like to support us and who talks about our campaign using the Indiegogo Tool. 

Kind regards

Your ZURICH INDUSTRIES Team


Deutsch:

Über uns

ZURICH INDUSTRIES ist ein junges Schweizer Modelabel aus Zürich, inspiriert durch Kampfsport und Bodybuilding. Sämtliche Designs sind Eigenkreationen, welche durch uns kreiert, nachhaltig hergestellt und vertrieben werden. Dabei achten wir insbesondere auf einen fairen und ökologischen Herstellungsprozess sowie auf die Verwendung hochwertiger Materialien. Mit dem Verkauf jedes einzelnen Artikels unterstützen wir zudem humanitäre Hilfsprojekte weltweit.

Über unsere Kampagne

Diese Indiegogo Kampagne bietet uns eine einzigartige Möglichkeit Unterstützer für unser Projekt zu finden um die Produktion unserer klassischen T-Shirts, Sweatshirts und Gymbags starten zu können. Des Weiteren hätten wir die Möglichkeit unser Sortiment mit weiteren Produkten wie z.B. Performance Shirts, Accessoires, Sporttaschen und einer grösseren Auswahl an T-Shirts mit neuen Designs zu erweitern.

Unseren Unterstützern bieten wir sogar individuell gefertigte Designs.

Sollten wir unser angestrebtes Ziel nicht ereichen, beabsichtigen wir einen Grossteil des erzielten Betrages an die Schweizer Glückskette zu spenden. Den Restbetrag würden wir für die Produktion eines sehr kleinen Teils unseres eigentlichen Sortiments verwenden.

Was wir bezwecken

Unsere Phylosphie ist es Bekleidung mit einzigartigen Designs zu einem erschwinglichen Preis anzubieten und dabei gleichzeitige Hilfsprojekte auf der ganzen Welt zu unterstützen. 

Unterstützung

Wir danken jedem herzlich, welcher uns zu unterstützen beabsichtigt und über unser Projekt mittels Indiegogo Tool spricht.

Liebe Grüsse

Euer ZURICH INDUSTRIES Team
story_txt:
About us
 ZURICH INDUSTRIES is a small Swiss fashion label, based in Zurich Switzerland, inspired by Martial Arts and Bodybuilding. All designs are our own creations and all of our textiles are sustainably manufactured. We pay particular attention to a fair and ecological manufacturing process and the use of high quality materials. Moreover we're supporting humanitarian relief projects worldwide with each sold item. 
  About our campaign
 This Indiegogo campaign gives us a unique chance to find supporters for our idea and to start the production of our items, especially basic T-Shirts, Sweatshirts and Gymbags. Moreover we have the chance to enlarge our assortment with more items as Performance Shirts, Accessories, Sports bags and a bigger selection of our classic T-Shirts with new designs. 
We are also going to offer individual designs for our supporters. 
If our campaign does not reach the target sum, we are going to donate a big part of the reached amount to the Swiss Solidarity foundation, that raises funds for humanitarian relief projects. With the other part we would try to start our business with a tiny selection. 
  Our main idea
 Our main idea is to offer unique clothes with inexpensive prices and to support relief projects at the same moment. 
  Supporting
  We sincerely thank everyone who like to support us and who talks about our campaign using the Indiegogo Tool.  
Kind regards
Your ZURICH INDUSTRIES Team

story:
We are the Kidswatcher team, located in the heart of Amsterdam. A year ago started our dream. With 9 ambitious developers we ‘re working day and night to launch our kidswatcherproject. And we did it. The Kidswatcher betaversions are ready together with a stable backend and Apps. We present the smallest and smartest GPS-GSM Childwatch. Next step will be producing on a larger scale. With your support, we can do it. The more pre-orders, the  sooner we can go into production. Support us now by placing a pre-order. Thanks in advance for your support!

Kidswatcher, for children between 5 - 10:

We were dedicated to build the smallest, most reliable locator in the world. So no camera, no mp3 player or phone. Locating is what the Kidswatcher does. In comparison with our competitors the Kidswatcher is the smallest, fastest and most reliable locator in the world. Many start-ups claim that they will produce such a device somewhere in the future, but they gave foreign companies the order to do the development. At Kidswatcher our dedicated team has developed every part inhouse and our prototype proves that it works.

  • Most reliable Communication: GSM, SMS (quadband)
  • Tracking outside and inside buildings: Using Wifi-signals (unique in the world) 
  • Worldwide Connection: In almost every country with a mobile network around the world
  • Simple to use,  no installation
  • In the future: S.O.S. service centre for help

Product:

The is a very smart and small GPS watch for children. By using the Kidswatcher, parents always have a connection with their children. The Kidswatcher actually consists of two products; the free Watcher App, and the Kidswatcher itself. The watch communicates via the GSM mobile network with the Watcher App. So parents, who are using the app, always know the whereabouts of their children.

The ingenuity of the Kidswatcher is the combination of different technologies which has been in-house developed by the Kidswatcher Team. The watch works with advanced location determination modules, like GPS and Wifi. This makes our product much more reliable than those from competitors. We have finished the Kidswatcher prototype and it works better than expected! We are ready to produce, so pre-order now.

Pricing Kidswatcher:

Retail Price Kidswatcher = 139 euro  

Subscription costs: 
- Europe  = 6 euro / month 
- World elite = "Standard" + High Risk countries = 8 euro / month

Circuit board

 Components of the Kidswatcher:

 Prototype fases:

Idea:

In the winter of 2013 founder Erik Recter was skiing in Switzerland with his niece Nikki and the worst case scenario happened. Nikki was nowhere to be found on the slopes. Uncle Erik : "Instantly you realize how big a skiing area can be. It was getting dark and every minute seemed to last forever. Luckily after 90 minutes Nikki was found". The fear of Nikki getting lost inspired Erik to develop the Kidswatcher.



Timeline and achievements so far:

Our project Kidswatcher started in 2013 and we made a lot of progress last year. Here you see an overview of all our achievements till 2014:

 Also in 2014 we had some big challenges to overcome, check them out:

Validating with our target group, kids:

About us:

In the summer of 2013 Erik assembled a team with highly experienced engineers who believed in the idea of the Kidswatcher. From a room in the middle of Amsterdam they started from scratch working on the whole process from software to hardware engineering and also the backend solution.

Our Team:
- Erik Recter: Founder of Watcherenterprises
- Dave Clark: Graphic / UX Designer
- Cas van der Weegen: Lead Software Engineer
- Mark Vels: Embedded Software Engineer
- Remco Kleine: Hardware Engineer
- Timothy Tseng: Back-End Developer
- Erik Weihs: UI / UX Engineer
- Margot Polman: PR and Communications
- Edo Molhoek: Business Developer

Check for more detailed information: http://kidswatcher.org/#/team


Prototype to production. Our 2014 Roadmap:

We have completed the design of Kidswatcher. Now we will start testing the alpha versions to get ready for first production.

Manufacturing plan:

We have established partnerships with several Dutch companies for the production, molding and assembling of the Kidswatcher. We are developing with Dutch companies to be assured of the highest standards which are needed for such a complex product and efficiency purposes.

Investments so far:

The record for the fastest crowdfunded company ever in the Netherlands was broken by Kidswatcher. We have raised 185K in just two days in the first round, and in the second round 150K in four days. The raised money was spend in the R&D phase with in our mind building the most reliable and smallest locator in the world.

story:
We all have a dream. Be reminded and inspired to go after it by simple words that you can wear every day.


Short Summary

I have a goal to launch 6 new bold collections this year, interview the people behind the design inspiration, and bring inspiration to individuals all over the world.

  • I have been designing jewelry since I was 12 years old and selling it part-time for the last 5 years.
  • My campaign is to raise money to grow my jewelry line designed around my passion to share with others the importance of self-empowerment. I love seeing people pursue their dreams and encouraging them to stay inspired along the journey. My jewelry is designed to motivate.
  • With the support of others, I can pursue my goal of running my own business full-time and live out my dream of being a positive contribution to the world through what I have learned about the power of self-talk from my own journey.

What I Need & What You Get

Let me break it down for you:

  • My goal is to raise $15,000 for new materials, tools, a tent and tables to set up at local markets and events, and wages for myself as I design every thing from the jewelry to video editing. 
  • My designs are unique. They are made with quality materials so you can be a badass and still stay classy!
  • If by chance I don't reach my goal, I will use the funds to develop and market my first collection. 

The Impact

I was a young girl when I first began to understand the power of language. After struggling with self-confidence as a teenager I taught myself how to overcome fear and depression by changing my thoughts and self-talk. I want to continue to share with others how changing our outlook and internal dialogue can transform our life and that the process of pursuing lifelong dreams can be extraordinary.

So far my designs have helped women find inspiration and motivation when pursuing fitness goals (shout out to all you fitness competitors!), while they have also helped women transition through heart break, and some to simply embrace their own authentic self-expression.


The Perks

story:
DESIGN JOURNEY

My name is Victor, fashion designer currently based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. I am passionate about fashion and have more than 15 years fashion industry experience (Betty Jackson, Ben de Lisi, Ghost, Markus Lupher, Tristan Webber, Alexander Mc Queen, Matthew Williamson, C&A, Stella Luna, Quiksilver, Myers, Isetan and etc.) from London, Shanghai and Kuala Lumpur. I came from a not very well off single parent family. My mother never remarried and raised my whole family with her own bare hands. In order to make her proud, I worked extremely hard and graduated with a First Class Honors, awarded a British Council Scholarship and interviewed by various international and local media and press on my work and achievements. My life is definitely not a smooth sailing journey but I survived and ready for my next mission. 


OUR GREEN FASHION MISSION


All the natural disasters around the world in recent years was a wake up call from the mother earth for everyone of us. As a fashion designer, I started to rethink my role as a fashion designer. What I could do to cut down the carbon footprint. I started writing fashion column Trendsformer for The Star newspaper. I encouraged and shared with the readers various way to up-cycle their old wardrobes and still in tune with the current fashion trends. October 2011 and January 2014, I was interviewed by NTV7 Bella and BFM89.9 where I talked about green fashion. I explored different way of designing. I collaborated with Isetan Kuala Lumpur in September 2010 and came out Cultivation by Victor Khoo collection where I designed a top that could be transformed into a dress and etc. I also started looking into sustainable or Eco friendly fabric. September 2012, I was invited and partly sponsored by Bamboo Malaysia to showcase my SS2013 collection all made of Bamboo fabric in conjunctions of World Bamboo Day and was then featured by NTV7 Breakfast Show.

I would like to continue my green fashion journey. Currently in the market, there were few stylish Eco friendly fashion brands. I also would like to research more into the variety of Eco friendly material/fabric could be used to make wearable clothing. At the same time, experimenting various way of designing and producing a sustainable yet stylish fashion collection. It will be an affordable yet fashionable ready to wear collection from daywear till eveningwear similar like my previous collection below but with different designs. All new design sketches will be posted on Fashion We Care new facebook page. My contributors (You) will vote for which designs to be put into production.

Certain designs will have bigger sizes so all of my contributors will get a chance to wear Victor Khoo's creation. All garments will be made from Eco friendly materials by fair paid workers with good working environment. The finished collection will be sold via my website https://www.victorkhoofashion.com and Fashion We Care new facebook page.

Part of the fund will be donated to charity organization World Vision. https://www.worldvision.org

Please kindly help me to reach our dream and make the world a better place for you, me and the future generation!

YOUR KIND CONTRIBUTION

To get the whole campaign up and running will cost us 35000USD!!!

Researching and purchasing Eco friendly material will cost around 18000USD

Production will cost around 17000USD

If we didn't reach the entire fund, the money will be used to develop a smaller scale Eco friendly fashion collection.

PERKS

Various exciting perks for all contributors. Please kindly look at the "Your Perks" section.

THE IMPACT

No matter how small or big your contribution, you are healing our mother earth by helping us building an Eco friendly fashion collection. At the same time, you will contribute towards World Vision.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you couldn’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you couldn’t help:

You could kindly share our campaign on your social media page by using the Indiegogo share tools! Or any form of communication tool. Thank you all in advance.

story:
Unexpectedly coming across to learn about the Miss Nepal USA 2012 pageant is no surprise as I've grown with my admiration towards such beauty pageants. Getting selected was just a baby step taken. Yet, I have another step of raising $1000 to complete inorder to participate.

My goal of participating in this magnificent beauty pageant is to represent our motherland, Nepal. Its to acquire as much knowledge and experience as I can and to promote our Nepali culture throughout the United States and beyond.

You can help me achieve my goals and in return get your name listed as a sponsor and much more. Every small amount will count and will be highly appreciated. Your help is not limited to the small amounts. Check out the link below for high sponsorship opportunity.

http://missnepalus.com/sponsorship_oppurtunity.php
