story:
Who are we?

Thanks for taking the time to pop past! We are SheKudo (Amy Iheakanwa and Shetu Simone), a clothing label born out of our love for both our heritages (African and Australian) and the cultures in which we have been raised. We are both students who share a love for fashion and expressing who we are through what we wear.

We at SheKudo saw not only a massive gap in the market for unique clothing pieces at affordable prices, but wanted to create collections which embodied both Western and Eastern elements of fashion. 

SheKudo incorporates common African printed fabrics into our contemporary designs, creating - rather than following - fashionable trends. In addition to this we re-create pre-loved denim into wearable pieces with a twist (see our denim bustier and T4 tee, which were both originally 3 pairs of Men’s jeans), and last but not least, we have our quirky 'Naija Tees' T-shirt range.

We are very excited about our project and hope that there are like minded folk out there who believe strongly in having unique, covetable pieces which transcend seasons without burning away your back pocket.

  •  

What We Need & What You Get

Due to being students - we are constantly on struggle street (fellow students, can we hear a grunt of approval) and would immensely appreciate support from those who also believe in our vision.

We recently had our launch in September to release to the world our SS 12/13 Collection entitled "Wahala" (see video) and now need at least $20,000 to continue to move forward.

20,000 would assist us in buying fabric, reproducing our current designs, marketing, setting up of our online store and to commence our next collection which is quite behind due to lack of funds.

We have thrown in a number of perks which we believe are great value to say thank you for supporting our plight. Some perks even include non-fashion items such as local artist contributions - as we are big supporters of our local Australian musical talent – (and we also thank them for allowing us to utilise their talents through gifts).

  •  

The Impact

The funding and support would mean a great deal to us. Not only will it create a platform for us to expand from but it will also assist us in our growth and exposure for the future.

Once SheKudo is up and running at full steam ahead - we aim to contribute 10% of each online sale to a self-developed fund which will eventually look to employing 3-5 seamstresses in Ghana to assist in the production of our future collections. As our label develops, we will look at increasing this number and hopefully opening up a small scale manufacturing factory there. We believe very strongly in self sustainability and want to use our label as well as what we have learnt through personal experience to bring about change in what ways we can.

  •  

I aint' got no money honey!

We hope you can believe in our brand as much as we do.

Ain't got no funds?- all gravy baby. Words can be just as effective, so please do spread the word and help us promote via Twitter, Facebook and other forms of social media.

 

Thanks again for your time and love!

SheKudo - Transcending the Trend.

We are very excited about our project and hope that there are like minded folk out there who believe strongly in having unique, covetable pieces which transcend seasons without burning away your back pocket.

 
What We Need & What You Get
Due to being students - we are constantly on struggle street (fellow students, can we hear a grunt of approval) and would immensely appreciate support from those who also believe in our vision.
We recently had our launch in September to release to the world our SS 12/13 Collection entitled "Wahala" (see video) and now need at least $20,000 to continue to move forward.
20,000 would assist us in buying fabric, reproducing our current designs, marketing, setting up of our online store and to commence our next collection which is quite behind due to lack of funds.
We have thrown in a number of perks which we believe are great value to say thank you for supporting our plight. Some perks even include non-fashion items such as local artist contributions - as we are big supporters of our local Australian musical talent – (and we also thank them for allowing us to utilise their talents through gifts).

 
The Impact
The funding and support would mean a great deal to us. Not only will it create a platform for us to expand from but it will also assist us in our growth and exposure for the future.
Once SheKudo is up and running at full steam ahead - we aim to contribute 10% of each online sale to a self-developed fund which will eventually look to employing 3-5 seamstresses in Ghana to assist in the production of our future collections. As our label develops, we will look at increasing this number and hopefully opening up a small scale manufacturing factory there. We believe very strongly in self sustainability and want to use our label as well as what we have learnt through personal experience to bring about change in what ways we can.

 
I aint' got no money honey!
We hope you can believe in our brand as much as we do.
Ain't got no funds?- all gravy baby. Words can be just as effective, so please do spread the word and help us promote via Twitter, Facebook and other forms of social media.
 
Thanks again for your time and love!
SheKudo - Transcending the Trend.

story:
Our Story

The Pink and Blue Revolution

Ken Patrick's Pink and Blue Revolution was inspired by the Beau Ideal brand colors. While looking at his business card one day he had an epiphany. Noticing that Pink is the color of Breast Cancer Awareness and Light Blue is the color of Prostate Cancer Awareness, he knew that the company must champion these causes. He immediately sat down and began to plan the launch of the Pink and Blue Revolution. Not only did he realize that he had to begin a movement that would transform lives, he knew he had do it in such a way that it would draw the attention of Chicago and eventually the nation. He launched it on his 42nd birthday â€“ November 25, 2011.


The Impact

Every one around us has been affected or knows someone who has been affected by cancer. We want to help great organizations fight this dreaded killer. Your contributions will provide needed resources and funding for research, mammograms, and prostate cancer screenings.


Our Goal and How We Will Get There

$5k of our goal will be given to the Chicagoland Area Affiliate of Susan G. Komen For the CureÂ®

$5k of our goal will be given to the Chicago Prostate Cancer Center.


In addition to our efforts via this site we have over 200 aspiring models from Chicago, Wisconsin, and Minnesota who will be leading fundraising efforts to raise a total $5000.


This effort will culminate in models, members of the Chicago fashion community and concerned citizens participating in a one mile "Model Walk for Cancer." At the end of the walk, we will present representatives from each organization with a check and hear from a 27 year old mother of one who was diagnosed with breast cancer and recently had a double mastectomy.


If we do not reach our goal the total funds raised will be divided equally and given to the organizations we support.


Unleash Your DIWO and Do It With Others

Please pass this link on to your Facebook friends, Twitter followers, family, friends and fans. Let them know that you support us and encourage them to give to this incredible cause as well.

story:
Question the Answer is a jewelry collection turned small business in 2014. I am the owner, designer and maker behind Question the Answer and I am so excited to take this next step in the evolution of my business. 

BRIEF HISTORY OF THE FORM:

    I graduated from the University of Memphis with a BFA in Studio Arts in 2010. My thesis addressed materialism and the idea of inanimate desire behind every frivolous purchase within the world of fashion. I chose to depict this idea by painting a luxuriously dressed life-size skeleton with bright colors and sculptural features. 
    About a year later in 2011, I decided to downsize the image into a wooden pendant, beginning my path into jewelry making. For about two years I perfected my design, changing the height and width of the skull and eventually changing the material from scrap wood into maple. Finally in late 2013, I had committed to the most refined version of my original design. It was then that I realized, I wanted to depict this form in metal.

   


PRODUCING WORK IN METAL:

    Since my degree and  trade had mostly been in painting in two dimensions, I decided to take some continuing education classes in small metals and began to learn to solder and forge. I took three of the classes locally throughout 2013 and 2014, and eventually I had learned most of the basic techniques and started building forms to enhance my hand painted sugar skulls.

 

 \


    Throughout this process, my designs began to wander away from the sugar skull and my own style as an artist became more polished. I started creating minimal forms that I adored and eventually I produced enough work for two separate collections. 

   

  

    I continued to refine my work while still making the sugar skull pendants my niche customers loved. 

    In March 2015,  I traveled to the CreativeSide Jewelry Academy in Austin, TX in an effort to increase my education in small metals and more specifically, jewelry. There I learned several new settings, including the flush setting, channel setting and a couple of different prong settings. With these new techniques and with the knowledge of my new medium, I have returned to that pivoting and decisive moment. I will cast my sugar skull design in various semiprecious metals and set a flush gemstone into the "minds eye" of the design.


  

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

If I am able to meet my entire goal I will be able to acquire all of these resources to quicken my production process and ensure a quality product. New tools & equipment are critical to the growth of Question the Answer. Since I already purchased a Neycraft SpinCaster & a Neycraft Kiln from an estate sale back in October 2014,  my costs will be significantly lower.

  • $370 for a GRS BenchMate Stone-Setting Holder & Kit. This makes it much easier for me to hold the piece and set a stone without harming the work.
  • $500 to build a vent above my kiln. The kiln burns out the wax from the investment mold and to keep my studio ventilated, I'll need to build a vent-a-hood above the kiln.
  • $500 for a larger tumbler machine. This machine cleans the pieces before they are ready to ship out, currently I have a VERY small one, these pieces require much more space. 
  • $545 for a wax injection machine. This machine allows me to make one mold from rubber and inject wax into it, allowing for a quicker production process and a quality cast every time.
  • $170 for a slide & lock adjustment bracket. This contraption is built for the BenchMate Stone-Setting Holder and will allow it to be moved to the correct angle and height on my jewelers bench so that I may set stones comfortably and without harming the piece.
  • $170 for a BenchMate Vise. This vise tilts & rotates on two axes to hold pieces perfectly angled for stone-setting & will solve many holding problems. Remember, jewelry is tiny and hard to hold stable to set a stone into.
  • $225 for a steam cleaning machine. This machine will clean the pieces effectively so that every piece arrives perfect right to your doorstep.
  • $1600 for a plating system. This will allow my work to have the highest in craftsmanship by coating the finished work in yellow gold or rose gold. This way none of the plating is compromised while sanding and finishing the piece.
  • $300 for plating solution. As you might have guessed, even the solutions to plate metals are expensive. I mean it's basically liquid gold.
  • $520 for a large cast iron bench anvil & base. Believe it or not, I've been working without one for quite some time.
  • $200 for Other small production costs for casting like investment & a scale.
  • $600 for tools such as a cutting tool, a mandrel & flat stock professional pliers. These tools will help my production process immensely & will allow me to work comfortably so that I may produce more pieces in less time.
  • $2000 for initial inventory material costs. This means the actual metals, the chains they are hung on and findings for the actual pieces.
  • $750 for product packaging materials including my printed boxes, hang tags for the pieces & shipping supplies.
  • $500 for other startup expenses including unforeseen construction costs.


Of course if the unthinkable happens and I'm not able to meet my entire goal, I will reconsider my most necessary needs & assess my options. This may mean changing the quality of metals I will cast in, to lower my material costs. This action would only be made in the most extreme conditions as I am very committed to the design and the product details.


                                 

PERKS YO: WHAT YOU GET FOR HELPING!!!

Here are a Few of the AWESOME & Exclusive Indiegogo PERKS:

LIMITED EDITION Hand Written Thank You Card - $15.00

Your contribution means everything to me and I would like to personally thank you. This hand-written thank you will be on a limited edition card with the image of the rendered sugar skull and of course will be written and signed by me!

EARLY BIRD: Question the Answer Stack Ring Set (3 Rings) - $50.00

Available in sterling silver, yellow gold fill or rose gold fill- these stackers fit seamlessly into your everyday wardrobe & for a limited time will be discounted just for you & just in time for the HOLIDAYS! Available in sizes 3-10 (size 3 & 4 are made for midi-rings)

EARLY BIRD: Question the Answer Stack Ring WORKSHOP - $100.00 

This is the VERY FIRST- EXCLUSIVE ring workshop where I will teach you how to make your very own set of 3 stack rings in Sterling Silver, Yellow Gold Fill or Rose Gold Fill. Students will arrive at my studio and work for three hours with me to produce their very own stack ring set!!!! FOR LOCAL RESIDENTS OF MEMPHIS, TN ONLY 

             

STERLING SILVER STACK BANGLE - $88.00

This perk is for a sterling silver bangle in an 8 gauge size (Approximately 1/8" thick). This is a classic piece from the Eternal Curiosity Collection that is perfect to wear alone or stacked, with a t-shirt or a dress. Because everyone is a different size, I offer my bangles in a standard size and also a petite size. 
Standard: 2 7/8" in diameter
Petite: 2 1/2" in diameter


THE SKULLS: VARIOUS PRICES & METALS

When you contribute these amounts you will receive one of the first editions of the the Sugar Skull Pendants on a 28" chain with a semiprecious gemstone delivered right to your doorstep. Be the first to have it and invest now- your friends will be so jealous when they see you in this one of a kind piece made by hand in Memphis, TN.

Chain: 28" Size of Pendant: 1.5" x 1.75"


QUESTION THE ANSWER Brass Sugar Skull Pendant - $175.00

QUESTION THE ANSWER Yellow Gold Plated Sugar Skull Pendant - $275.00

QUESTION THE ANSWER Rose Gold Plated Sugar Skull Pendant - $275.00

QUESTION THE ANSWER Sterling Silver Sugar Skull Pendant - $375.00


THE IMPACT & TIMELINE:

This campaign is so important to my business's growth and to the evolution of this specific design. Your contribution means I will be able to complete a path I began five years ago, and will ultimately expand the product line Question the Answer is able to produce. 
Question the Answer is able to be a business because of the amazing support of my customers! Ya'll built this, now let's grow it together!

As a contributor, you're not only strengthening my work, you're expanding my reach and ability to make quality & unique collections. If you love handmade & supporting small businesses this piece will represent those values every time you wear it!


If you're curious how I will be spending my time until you receive your piece, here's a timeline...

             Mid-October 2015: FUNDS RECEIVED

             November 2015: INSTALL EQUIPMENT & HOLIDAY RUSH

             December 2015: HOLIDAY PERKS SHIPPED & PRODUCT SAMPLING

             January 2016: PRODUCT SAMPLING

             February - Mid April 2016: PRODUCTION of PIECES

             End of April 2016: PRODUCTS RECEIVED


RISKS & CHALLENGES:

Because of crowdfunding, I have this creative opportunity without enduring the limits of a financial risk. This allows me to present a product to my established community and introduce my business to a larger audience while growing my brand. 
Craftsmanship is extremely valuable to Question the Answer. Because of this, I would like to have as much time as possible to perfect my pendants and ensure their quality. These pendants will involve techniques that are brand new to me so they may require more time for testing than originally promised, which potentially could postpone the delivery date of your piece. If this occurs, you will be notified and guaranteed that when your handmade piece arrives it will certainly be worth the wait.
I assure you that I am able to overcome the hurdles related to this challenge. I have already changed mediums and built this business while doing so; I am confident that I will work through these potential problems to find the best solution. 

   


PRESS YA'LL:

Interested in seeing what kind of press Question the Answer has already received? CLICK HERE!


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

MAKE SOME NOISE & SHOW SOME LOVE!!!

If you LOVE everything about this but you're unable to donate, you can still help a girl out!!!!

All you have to do is share this page on social media and you will have helped me immensely! Please POST & SHARE this campaign to get the word out on Facebook, Twitter & Instagram!

Join our mailing list to be updated on Question the Answer news & for web exclusives!!!

Website: questiontheanswer.com

Instagram: @questntheanswr

Facebook: facebook.com/questiontheanswer

Twitter: @questntheanswr

                        

Photos by Well Worn Co. | Zachary Gray | Annabella Charles | Sophorn Kuoy

story:
Hi there! I'm Tisha, a serial entrepreneur, founder of The Mom-e Club (The Mom Entrepreneurs Club), author, wife and mommy to Caleb (6) & Ellie (3) from Gilbert, Arizona.

I officially became a "mom entrepreneur" in 2008.  I soon realized that having the best of both worlds, motherhood and being my own boss, was/is the MOST REWARDING, yet CHALLENGING role I have ever taken on. I longed to be around mom and women entrepreneurs that understood my often crazy, unpredictable lifestyle.  

The Mom-e Club® was born out of complete, utter necessity in September 2010 for women, just like me, who needed a place to call their own.  We provide an outlet and are a resource to both aspiring and established women entrepreneurs nationally.  Check out this video of what a "typical" day consists of. :)  Some slight exaggeration, but not by much! HA!  

I quickly learned that mom-es rarely give themselves or receive credit for everything they do on a daily basis for their families, clients or household. I decided it was time to change that and honor mom entrepreneurs everywhere for their hard work, commitment and achievements, which do not go unnoticed.  

In 2010, I created the first Annual Mom Entrepreneur Celebration in Arizona, and put it on my own 0% interest credit card as I believed in it so much, to honor all amazing women, share their entrepreneurial journeys and inspire so many others as they've inspired me. Five years later, the event continues to grow strong, has been profitable since year one, and is now moving to its new home in Orange County, CA to reach a larger audience! 


2014 finalists, past five Mom Entrepreneur of the Year recipients, and
founder Tisha Pelletier

2014 Mom Entrepreneur of the Year finalist Brie Hall holds up the special memento given to her at the awards ceremony to remember her entrepreneurial journey

Why Contribute?

By contributing to this event, you show your tremendous support for these hard working, talented mom entrepreneurs and help fund their dream, thus support the economy and their business.  Our mission is to show women everywhere that YES! you CAN have the best of both worlds, no matter how difficult at times.  It takes dedication, passion, and of course, a support group to lift you up and propel you forward.  The Mom-e Club and this event do just that. Now, you no longer have to choose between the mom hat or the business hat.  Here, we accept you for the real you!   


What We Need & What You Get!

Our event costs total roughly $5,000 to bring the event to Huntington Beach, California.  This includes travel expenses from Arizona, venue, event food and beverage, printing, promotional products, advertising, and necessary vendor fees like photography. 

If we exceed our $5,000 goal, I not only will be over the moon, scream and jump around my living room with my kiddos, but it will help The Mom-e Club hire the necessary staff (social media firm and assistants) to continue helping women nationally, even globally.  Each year, The Mom-e Club awards a $500 grant to a woman entrepreneur to use toward her business.  With additional funding, we can afford to reward more women entrepreneurs the funding they need to move forward with their passion.  

About the Perks!

As a generous contributor, we've set up a range of contribution levels to fit any budget from $5 on up, and since we've just launched our official Mom-e Club apparel line, you'll receive some sweet items to express just how much you love mom-es with our I Heart Mom-es tee, window decal, Mom-e Club annual memberships, and/or tickets to our May 3rd Annual Mom Entrepreneur Celebration!  If you donate, but can't make it to the event on May 3rd in CA, we will gift your tickets to others in the OC area.  Our goal is to pack the house and it all starts with YOU!  

If we're not able to obtain our goal of $5,000, we will be forever grateful for the support we've received as it results in more people learning about our passion and mission - to encourage mom and women entrepreneurs every step of the way.  Any amount raised will go toward covering our Annual Mom Entrepreneur event expenses in 2015.  THANK YOU in advance for supporting our campaign!  We are beyond thrilled!
 

Other Ways You Can Help!

The Mom-e Club is grateful for any help we receive whether it's financial or voluntary.  We're always looking for an extra hand at our Annual Mom Entrepreneur Celebration.  If you have a talent to share that we can use like catering or photography, we'd love to explore an in-kind sponsorship opportunity with you, or if you'd like to donate a silent auction item of $25 or more, we'd gladly accept it!  If you're part of an organization and our missions align, we'd love to connect.  Additionally, we're looking for support in sharing our event via social media/advertising to encourage ticket sales, and for a few volunteers the day of the event. 

If you could use the support of being in The Mom-e Club, please join us at any one of our live meetings, or virtual meetings throughout the month.  Or, become an affiliate by sharing what we're about with those who could benefit from what we provide.  Visit our site at www.mom-eclub.com for more details, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter.

Hi there! I'm Tisha, a serial entrepreneur, founder of The Mom-e Club (The Mom Entrepreneurs Club), author, wife and mommy to Caleb (6)
& Ellie (3) from Gilbert, Arizona.I officially became a "mom
entrepreneur" in 2008.  I soon realized that having the best of both worlds, motherhood and being my own boss, was/is the MOST REWARDING, yet CHALLENGING
role I have ever taken on. I longed to be around mom and women
entrepreneurs that understood my often crazy, unpredictable lifestyle.  The Mom-e Club® was born out of complete, utter necessity in September 2010 for women, just like me, who needed a place to
call their own.  We provide an outlet and
are a resource to both aspiring and established women entrepreneurs
nationally.  Check out this video of what a "typical" day consists of. :)  Some slight exaggeration, but not by much! HA!  I quickly learned that mom-es rarely give themselves or receive credit for
everything they do on a daily basis for their families, clients or household. I decided it was
time to change that and honor mom entrepreneurs everywhere for their hard work, commitment
and achievements, which do not go unnoticed.  In 2010, I created the first Annual Mom Entrepreneur Celebration in Arizona, and put it on my own 0% interest credit card as I believed in it so much, to honor all amazing women, share their entrepreneurial journeys and inspire so many others as they've inspired me. Five years later, the event continues to grow strong, has been profitable since year one, and is now moving to its new home in Orange County, CA to reach a larger audience! 2014 finalists, past five Mom Entrepreneur of the Year recipients, and founder Tisha Pelletier2014 Mom Entrepreneur of the Year finalist Brie Hall holds up the special memento given to her at the awards ceremony to remember her entrepreneurial journeyWhy Contribute?By contributing to this event, you show
your tremendous support for these hard working, talented mom entrepreneurs and help fund
their dream, thus support the economy and their business.  Our mission is to show women everywhere that YES! you CAN have the best of both worlds, no
matter how difficult at times.  It takes dedication, passion, and of course, a support group to lift you up
and propel you forward.  The Mom-e Club and
this event do just that. Now, you no longer have to choose between the mom
hat or the business hat.  Here, we accept
you for the real you!   What We Need & What You Get!
Our event costs total roughly $5,000 to bring the event to Huntington Beach, California.  This includes travel expenses from Arizona, venue, event food
and beverage, printing, promotional products, advertising, and necessary vendor fees like photography. 

If we exceed our $5,000
goal, I not only will be over the moon, scream and jump around my living room with
my kiddos, but it will help The Mom-e Club hire the necessary staff (social media firm and assistants) to continue helping women nationally, even globally.  Each
year, The Mom-e Club awards a $500 grant to a woman entrepreneur to use toward her
business.  With additional funding, we
can afford to reward more women entrepreneurs the funding they need to move
forward with their passion.  About the Perks! 
As a generous contributor,
we've set up a range of contribution levels to fit any budget from $5 on up,
and since we've just launched our official Mom-e Club apparel line, you'll
receive some sweet items to express just how much you love mom-es with our I Heart Mom-es tee, window decal, Mom-e Club annual memberships, and/or tickets to our May
3rd Annual Mom Entrepreneur Celebration! 
If you donate, but can't make it to the event on May 3rd in CA, we will gift your tickets to others in the OC area. 
Our goal is to pack the house and it all starts with YOU!  
If we're not able to obtain our goal
of $5,000, we will be forever grateful for the support we've received as it
results in more people learning about our passion and mission - to
encourage mom and women entrepreneurs every step of the way.  Any amount raised will go toward covering our Annual Mom Entrepreneur event expenses in 2015.  THANK YOU in advance for supporting our campaign!  We are beyond thrilled! Other Ways You Can Help!
The Mom-e Club is
grateful for any help we receive whether it's financial or voluntary.  We're always looking for an extra hand at our Annual
Mom Entrepreneur Celebration.  If you have a talent to share that we can use like catering or photography, we'd love to explore an in-kind
sponsorship opportunity with you, or if you'd like to donate a silent auction item of $25 or more, we'd gladly accept it!  If you're part of an organization and our missions align, we'd
love to connect.  Additionally, we're looking for support in sharing our event via social media/advertising to encourage ticket sales, and for a few volunteers the day of the event. 
If you could use the
support of being in The Mom-e Club, please join us at any one of our live
meetings, or virtual meetings throughout the month.  Or, become an affiliate by
sharing what we're about with those who could benefit from what we provide.  Visit our site at www.mom-eclub.com for more
details, like us on Facebook  or follow us on Twitter.

story:
F*** Masons

Hi! My name is Johan, I'm a graphic and web designer. I've created a line of shirts that i want to share with you...

Expose "The Porblem" with style

Unless you've lived under a rock these past few years, you would have noticed that the economic and political world are under a so called ''crisis'': Banks, medias, politicans... they all tell us how we should live our lives, how and what we should think about and the way we need to get things done... but banks, medias and politics are linked by something we're not supposed to know.
Secret societies rule our human world and many of us don't know squat about this. Should it be the stinky filthy riches from Bohemian Grove, the Hellfire Club, the O.T.O. or another of those groups, they have all ties with something called Masonery, the first "School of thought" those guys acting in secret were part of. Masonery loves to speak about their great "benevolent" members like Washington, but did you know that people like Albert Pike (founder of the K.K.K.) and the satanist Aleister Crowley were grandmasters of Freemasonery? Not that bright, huh? 
 
Well, F*** Masons!  Let's use and pervert the code of Masonery to create nice, impactful and unique T-shirts to expose them.

Please check out our website to see the first collection available!
 

Want to order?!

It's very easy! Click on the banner 35€ to pre-order 1 T-shirt or take advantage on the promotion at 65€ for pre-ordering 2 T-shirts! When you're paying, please specify your gender, size and model(s) (Aleyster, Victoria or Franklin) You'll be delivered directly at home!

Spread the Word!

Please feel free to follow the brand on Facebook to see how the project is envolving.

Thank you very much and keep on supporting F*** Masons!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

F*** Masons

Hello! Mon nom est Johan, je suis graphiste & webdesigner. J'ai crée une marque de T-shirts que je souhaiterais partager avec vous...

Exposer "Le Porblème" avec style

A moins que vous étiez caché sous une île perdue au milieu de l'océan ces dernières années, vous auriez remarqué que le monde économique et politique est plongé dans une "crise": Les banques, les médias, les politiques,.. nous enseigne notre manière de vivre nos vies, comment réfléchir et la manière dont nous devons faire les choses... mais ces derniers sont tous liés avec quelque chose que nous ne sommes pas censé connaître...
Les sociétés secrètes dirige le monde humain et beaucoup d'entre nous l'ignore ou veut l'ignorer. La franc Maçonerie, où comme ils aiment l'appeler "L'école de la pensé", agissent dans le plus grand secret. Ils adorent parler de leur grands membres "bénévoles" tels que Washigton, mais saviez-vous que Albert Pike (fondateur du K.K.K) ou le sataniste Aleyster Crowley étaient les grands maitres de cette confrérie? Pas très brillant, non?

En d'autres termes, F*** Masons utilise et détourne les codes de la Franc-Maçonnerie pour créer de beaux, puissants et uniques T-shirts pour les exposer. 
 
Visitez le site internet de la marque pour voir la première collection qui sera prochainement disponible
 

Envie de commander?!

C'est très simple! Il suffit de cliquez sur l'encart 35€ pour pré-commander un T-shirt ou bénéficiez de la promotion à 65€ pour en pré-commander 2. Lorsque vous pré-commanderais, précisez votre sexe, votre taille et le modèle. (Crowley, Victoria ou Franklin). Vous serez livré directement à la maison!
 

Partagez l'information!

Suivez la marque sur son compte Facebook pour voir comment le projet évolue, et être au courant des dernières nouvelles.

Merci beaucoup et continuez à supporter F*** Masons!

story:
Short Summary

Andrew and DJ have a dream of using their talents and passions as a ministry to reach the unreached. Their whole goal with Dead Name, and this line is offer Christian Clothing with a meaning and to offer hope to a broken world. 

 

The plan is to start helping out Non Profits and Charities once they reach a sustainable level, donating a portion of profits to help out the hurting, lost, and broken, later down the road. 

What We Need & What You Get

Heres the Break Down :

  • We need 2000 dollars in order to Print the line and to get you the Rewards.
  • We have all sorts of Perks for YOU! From small Priced perks receiving an exclusive shirt, to the largest perk that allows you, your band, or your business to be featured in our Online Store with a Collaborative Tee. 
  • The Funds will still go to Printing off the Line if our Goal isnt met, we will just have to work harder, and get the rest of the money. This Line means alot to us.

The Impact

Why it Matters: 

  • Andrew and DJ will be able to pursue their dream Job, something that might not be so easy without your help.
  • We will be reaching out to Charities and Non Profits as we grow, in order to help as many people as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Make sure to share the project using the IndieGogo share button!

 

Initial Designs for the debut line:

the Debut 2013 Exclusive shirt

Breathe Life design

 

The Cat Skull design

The Matthew 5:30 Design

The Merika Design

And The Living God Hoodie Design

story:
Jewelry is a girl's best friend. Diamonds are divine, rubies are ravishing and emeralds are exciting! While gems are nice, only a few select divas can afford them. 

Small Luxuries is an online website that will be launching on October 14th to bring beautiful jewelry pieces to divas on a budget. Every week, new pieces will be added. The best part? FREE shipping and no items over $10! 

Please save in your favourite websites: www.shop.smallluxuries.com


Want to spoil yourself? Join the Luxury Club and receive a new piece sent to your address every two weeks, for SIX months! That's 12 beautiful pieces for you to work like the fashionista you are! Great for a gift for fellow fashionistas too.

On our launch date at 2:30pm, there will be a fabulous tea party held in Toronto where the line will be on display. All Toronto ladies are welcome to pledge and put themselves on the Guest List for this fabulous party! The more the merrier. Come and have tea and cookies while purchasing the hottest new jewelry pieces!

All funds raised will go to updating the technology at Small Luxuries including purchasing a new (faster!) computer to better receive orders and send out products. It will also go to more marketing, to make an even larger community!


Thank you to all pledges for making my dreams come true and letting me bring beauty to the lives of fashion divas everywhere! xo

story:
Get Around Our Indiegogo Campaign

Referral Rewards Why Hybrid? How Can You Help

Our Love of Beauty Why Crowdfunding What's next after Hybrid?

Welcome to HD Professional Upcoming Accessories HD Professional Team

What is the HD Hybrid Styler? Hybrid Specifications FAQ

Refer Your Friends, Help Us Grow, Get Rewards Go To Top

We love Indiegogo! It is an amazing platform. It helps us keep track of our campaign backers, you amazing people, and lets us know who is doing what. So, when you refer a friend to our campaign, we can keep track of that and we know where the referral comes from. It's simple and easy and it lets us reward you for helping us achieve our goals!
Important: In order for the tracking technology to work, you have to use the SHARE buttons that are located at the top of our campaign page and right under the video. Keep in mind, you have to be logged in.

Also, you DO NOT need to be a current backer of our campaign to refer your friends and get your rewards. You do have to be logged into your Indiegogo account when you refer us, however. Don't forget.

Our love of beauty Go To Top

The beauty industry is a magical and powerful place for creative, artistic, and innovative producers. We chose to delve into this world because we are passionate about enriching the lives of those around us through beauty and lifestyle tools and products. We love helping those around us look beautiful, but more importantly, feel beautiful. One's aura that radiates with inner beauty and confidence is unmistakable. We have simply designed an innovative and specially crafted tool that will enhance such beauty.

As anyone can affirm, the way our hair looks says a lot about us and is one of the first things people will notice. Having a great hair day seems to have a proportionate effect on how we carry ourselves through the rest of the day. Here at HD Professional, we want everyone to be able to experience great hair days, everyday. With our new Hybrid Styler, beautifully coiffed hair is attainable and with such ease! Psychologists have been studying and reporting on the effects hair has on a person and their attitude about themselves and how they carry themselves throughout their day. Dr. Diller explains it beautifully in her article, click here to view it

The Psychology Behind A 'Good Hair Day'

www.huffingtonpost.com

Are you having "a good hair day"? Seems like a simple, even silly, question coming from a psychologist whose work is about getting underneath the surface. But in all honesty -- superficial or not -- I have to say I'm familiar with that feeling.

So what if we could give everyone a tool to make their attitude about their life change for the better? Give them a tool that would help them look beautiful, make them feel great, give them that high definition hair? Waves, curls, straight, however they want to style their hair, whatever look they are going for, we give them the tool to make that happen. That is what we are all about at HD Professional. We make tools that make people look and feel beautiful!

Welcome to HD Professional Go To Top

Located in San Jose, CA we are proud to be a Silicon Valley startup. Our company is one year old and since our inception, we have been developing and producing the next generation high-end beauty and lifestyle tools, we are ready to introduce our product and are sure it will shake up the beauty industry. We are an energetic team of educated business and fashion addicts who love fashion, beauty, digital business, and doing great things to benefit our communities.

We began working on our business at the beginning of this year. It took us nearly 8 months to develop our initial product because we wanted every aspect of it to be absolutely perfect. The resulting product is a beautiful combination of technology and hair awesomeness.

In November of this year, we considered very seriously the option of doing a crowdfunding campaign. We thought it would be really great to see what people thought of our business, our product, and whether people were genuinely going to be interested in the thousands of hours we invested in order to bring this product to reality. We also felt that the crowdfunding space would be an ideal place for us to get our potential market's feedback on our upcoming products and some really

cool ideas that we have to forge into real products. So, we are here now! We are crowdfunding our amazing Hybrid Styler and offering this level of product quality at an amazing price. This a great product for yourself, your wife, your fiancée, your loved one, or for any of your friends.

So, that's all! We are here to build great lifestyle and hair and esthetic products for consumers and professionals around the world. We are an incredibly strong team of people who decided to quit our day jobs to get this company going. Our academic backgrounds are in Economics, Finance, Marketing, Physics, Electrical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Fashion, and we even have cosmetologists on staff. We have a PhD. in Physics, another PhD in economics, and just a great team overall with a lot of experience looking to make a difference in our community and to give back to those in need. Through building a strong company anchored in philanthropic efforts!

Join us, give our product a try, help us build our business, and help us make a difference in our little world called Earth! Again, welcome to HD Professional. May goddess-like looks be with you!

What is the HD Hybrid Styler? Go To Top

When we set out to create a great hair-styling tool people to use when they style their hair, we were shocked by the products available on the market. What we saw were cheaply made products, with limited features, that were selling in stores and online for ridiculously inflated prices. We then started to examine the market. We researched where these products were manufactured and actually contacted their manufacturers, all of which are in China. We found out that these companies are producing these low cost products anywhere from $6 to $8 and selling them to consumers at prices ranging from $140 to $220. The women on our team had also made purchases of these competing products. They too were quite unhappy with the price they paid for the performance the tool delivered. Unfortunately, that is all that is out there.

We set out on a mission. We did not want to create another mediocre product with standard functions and we did not want a bunch of buttons and useless LCD displays on our tool. We wanted precision, the highest temperature available, and we wanted a very sleek user control interface. Something that was "old school" in the best way. We wanted to also have something look and feel soft and light, was not cumbersome, and protected our user's fingers from heat and burns. We wanted to produce a device that really optimized the heat effect of releasing ions. So, we did it.

Nine and a half months later, we have our Hybrid Styler! It's a power-apcked tool, designed and engineered together with our manufacturer, both here in California and in South Korea. South Korean producers are known throughout the world for being meticulous in manufacturing. They produce incredibly high quality products. Yes, our production costs are a lot higher than China but our quality is untouchable and we leave our competitors in the dust with our performance.

We do not believe that anyone should charge the amounts they are charging for these tools, so we wanted to make our $200 iron affordable for everyone. Actually, even at $200, our iron outperforms our competitors products in the same category. We put a lot of thought into this device.

Our Hybrid Styler is a mix of analog and digital technologies. We wanted the ease and stability of an analog control interface; something that is easy to turn the device on and off and easy to dial in the exact temperature by simply spinning a traditional control knob. The brain on the inside of our tool is purely digital. It takes the analog control references and turns it into digital signals performing at digital speeds, thus providing features in safety, temperature calibration and real-time-all-time temperature monitoring. This ensures the device is always at the prescribed temperature with incredibly rapid heating of the plates, and rapid cooling once temperature is lowered. The system provides much less power consumption, and even has a safety and auto shutdown after 45 minutes of non-use. All of this can only be achieved with digital smarts.


So, this is what we have created! Analog controls and functions, and a true digital brain providing digital performance. Through our combined efforts, the Hybrid Styler was born. An amazing tool packed with current and future technology! Give one a try, contribute to our campaign. We know you will love this tool and use it for years to come!

Why Hybrid? Go To Top

Hybrid is a new way of binding old analog technology together with digital technology and making them work efficiently and effectively together. For our Hybrid Styler, we wanted to have the ease of use of traditional knobs and dials, simple, quick controls, and we wanted to put those simple accurate controls into a digital system that would provide great performance and low power consumption.

Hybrid; what does it mean? For purposes of our product, it can be defined in two ways. A hybrid technology (computer) is a system that exhibits features of an analog system and a digital system. Wiki defines it here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hybrid_computer . For our other purpose, and from an integrated circuit (the brain inside the Hybrid Styler) a hybrid integrated circuit is a miniaturized electronic circuit combining different semiconductor devices and passive components on a substrate. More information can be found here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hybrid_integrated_circuit .

So why hybrid? Because we felt that providing analog control of a tool like ours and pairing it with the performance of a digital system is not only an amazing combination, but our users will love the reliability and amazing performance that this product will provide. Try for yourself and let us know how you feel. One of our main reasons for being on Indiegogo with our campaign is to elicit user feedback. Tell us what you think of this product and the idea. Shoot us an email if you have any comments or suggestions on how we can improve our concept and design. info@hdprofessionalhair.com

Why Crowdfunding? Go To Top

Besides the fact that it is an awesome way to introduce a business or a concept, meet new friends, and build a better economy together, crowdfunding gives us access to the many thousands of beautiful people like you. Together, we can help build a better world, a better nation, a stronger economy, and build and grow small businesses around the world. We want to be a part of reducing unemployment through hiring and be active in our community through giving time and money from revenues. All of this can be achieved with the help of the generous contributors and adventurous people that are involved in crowdfunding! It is an honor and a pleasure to be part of this community and to have the ability to create a campaign to share our hard work and the product we are so proud of. We are a manufacturer of these high end beauty tools and have been working to bring a new kind of device to the market. We wanted a set of products that were more consumer friendly, more price appropriate, and of quality that is unexpected i the market.

We also wanted to understand more about our market. See what people thought, and open a free two way communication with interested contributors to help us make our products better and focus our ideas more towards exact wants. This is where you all come in. Help us by trying out one of our products. Let us know if we can add you to our client advisory committee. Every one of our crowdfunding contributors has an opportunity to come onboard and become a beta tester and product idea advisor to our company.

How will the funds from our campaign be used? We will use most of the funds to purchase our first round of inventory, this inventory will be used to support our campaign contributors and give us enough inventory to really start to move the company forward. Proceeds from the sales of the remainder of our inventory will allow us to give back to our community and to some really great charities totaling about $40,000. Your contributions will also help us put together our customer support team and help us really learn what we need to do for our next project.

We need your help. We need your feedback. We need you to try our product, tell us what you think, tell us what you feel should be improved, and help us shape the ideas for our next set of products. If you are buying this for your loved one, invite them to join our advisory group and become a voice for feedback and new product development. We need everyone's help to build our next generation of innovative tools! So, we summarize below why we are here on Indiegogo

  • We want to introduce our products to you all and hear what you think about them. How can we improve our design, our engineering, our performance?

  • We want to use our crowdfunding campaign to invite you all to join our HD Advisors Club. You can do this by going to our website and signing up. This will get you some really cool perks and give you access to all of our future products, before the public gets them. We need people like you to perform quality controls, give us input and help us make the best products with features you all want. Its not about us, it's all about you! Help us by joining our Advisors Club. Follow this link.

  • Our HD Professional Hybrid Styler is our first product manufactured and released. We need your feedback to help us develop this product line, which will include other quality essential tools. This way you can be part of the process of building your HD Pro tool set and know you had something to do with the features and benefits you will enjoy. Help us, get involved! Contribute and advise!

  • Your support in our campaign will help us tremendously. You will receive a beautiful HD Professional Hybrid Styler, a bunch of great perks, and you will help us get our first production run completed and shipped out for an on time delivery shortly after the end of our campaign. Please, contribute to our campaign and help us make people all over the world look and feel more beautiful. Help us fund our business engine allowing us to give back to our communities, and help us make our dreams come true!

Hybrid Specifications Go To Top

Model: HD Professional Hybrid Styler HD-HYB1

Body material:Heat resistant PET Plastic enhanced with Silicon

Coating: Heat resistant Silicon

Heating Plates: Improved heat transfer aluminum plates double coated Ceramic with infused Tourmaline particles.

Ceramic:Thick dual layer improved ceramic coating infused in both layers with extra Tourmaline particles to improve ion production.

Plate mount:Silicon heat resistant floating plate pads allowing for full range of plate floating motion.

Heat Range: 240°F to 455°F, 120°C to 230°C

Temperature uses and range: See chart below for reference on heat settings and usage.

Time to heat: Ultra fast heating, maximum time to 455 degrees Fahrenheit is 40 seconds.

Temperature variance:Variance at low temperatures is ±0.5°F to high temperatures ±5.0°F.

Temperature control:Analog turn potentiometer with temperature dial in easy thumb control position.

Power control:On/off switch controlled by thumb. Long life a/b switch.

Chemical treatment capable: Yes, Keratin and all other treatments. Professional grade styler.

Electic consumption:110V AC, 50Hz, 43W, 2.5 Amp

Weight: 0.49 lbs, 228 grams.

Shipping weight:1.4 lbs, 0.64 kg

Dimensions:Width 1.4" (36mm), Length 10.7" (272mm), Height 1.5" (38.5mm).

Plate size:Width 1.3" (32mm), Length 3.5" (90mm).

Length of cord: 9 feet, 108" (275cm) swivel cord.

Plug type: Type A NEMA 1-15 US 2 pin Edison plug rated at 125V AC.

Upcoming Accessories Go To Top

In the very near future we will be launching several new accessories to support out beautiful HD Hybrid Styler. We would love your feedback on these accessories or anything else you all feel we should design and introduce. These accessories should be available sometime before Mother's Day 2014. All of our contributors here on Indiegogo will get first access to our accessories and any other products we release way before the general public. If you are a member of our Advisory Club, you will get things even earlier because you were part of the development team! Join today. Contribute today! We need your help.

  • Styled silicon heat resistant pouch / bag / table pad. This really cool accessory will fit your HD Hybrid Styler and will even have a sweet little pocket in the front where you can put your cord safely away. This awesome case for your styler will act as a heat protectant for the styler once you are done using it, will make a great travel case, and will also serve to act as a heat resistant pad where you can place the styler while you are using it. We will come out with 12 different colors. The design will be amazing and nothing like you have ever seen before. We may use this as a bonus goal if we can meet and exceed our campaign goals for all of our awesome contributors.

  • More accessories will be announced soon. If you have any great ideas please, let us know.

How can you help Go To Top

Back Us Up!
Help us by contributing to our campaign. Your assistance will be more than just a contribution to our mission, it will let us know if you think our idea and our product is any good and it will give us a chance to prove to the world that we may be onto something great! Help!

Share our campaign with your network.
The most incredible way for you to help us reach our goal is if you share this campaign with your network and your friends. Let everyone know about us and it will be an incredible contribution to our cause. Share us on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+, LinkedIn, anywhere you can and we will be very grateful. We even setup a great referral program where you can earn some awesome perks and products just for sharing our campaign with your friends and networks. This is very important for us, please, contribute and then let everyone know about us. Please!

Talk to your stylist and talk to your friends. Let them know about our company.
Your stylist is a great source of support for us. Tell them about us and our campaign during your next visit. In fact, pick up the phone and call them. Invite them to look at our campaign and get involved. For salon owners we have awesome incentives. Tell your friends! Help us grow.

Join our HD Pro Advisory Club and help us develop and improve our technology.
Give us your advice and your opinion on what you think we should do next, what you think we should do now, and what you think of our product design and specs. Let us know how to make our stuff better and we will listen and follow your lead. Help us improve, and please, don't forget to contribute also!

What next after the Hybrid? Go To Top

Well, this is a great question. We have already started working on the next amazing product. This product is going to use advanced aerospace engineering and the technology behind the jet engine and high bypass thrust to create the ultimate hair drying tool (We will probably crowdfund this project as well as just the science behind this tool is going to consume a lot of resource and cost a little bit.) We have started working with a major aerospace university to source engineers to help us develop this new product. It is going to be amazing, keep your eyes and ears open for upcoming announcements.

We are also coming out with a very cool retro dryer that will easily fit in any small bag and deliver a great big punch! The power of a full sized drying tool in a small retro package. We should announce more on this in mid January.

Clips, accessories and other tools will be introduced throughout the first quarter of 2014. We will be very busy so we really need your help now! Help us get this show on the road and contribute to our campaign today. Thank you so much for reading our campaign page.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Go To Top

OK, so I changed my mind. Is there a way to get a refund?
Unfortunately there is no way to do that. It is not because we do not want to give you a refund, it is just Indiegogo's policy. We don't have any way to get around that as they control the way contributions flow into Indiegogo and out of Indiegogo. For more information on their policies you can see Indiegogo's rules for crowdfunding here.Indiegogo's rules for crowdfunding here.

Can I get multiple perks or only one?
Of course you can get multiple perks. The more perks we give you the happier we are! We have made our perks offering really stupendous. If you have any suggestions on improvements, please let us know. Also, don't forget about the referral perks. They are awesome!

Can I contribute feedback on the product or any upcoming product?
Of course you can. We would love your feedback as much as we would love for you to contribute. Please, let us know how you feel. Shoot off an email to info@hdprofessionalhair.com with your input.

What is the warranty on the HD Styler?
We offer a standard limited one (1) year warranty on our product however, Indiegogo contributors and perk winners will get an added year of warranty making the total warranty two years. Pay for your contribution with your American Express card and we believe you can get a third year of warranty from Amex. Be sure to check with them though as we cannot guarantee this.

Will you ship international?
Definitely. Just remember, our product is 110V AC and has an Edison plug. Check to make sure your country supports that type of voltage and plug. Also, we will ship your product with a commercial invoice showing the price of $89 or $99 depending on which level you purchase at. We cannot change that value. Duties and taxes are up to you to handle.
story_txt:
Get Around Our Indiegogo Campaign
Referral Rewards
Why Hybrid?
How Can You Help


Our Love of Beauty
Why Crowdfunding
What's next after Hybrid?

Welcome to HD Professional  
Upcoming Accessories 
HD Professional Team

What is the HD Hybrid Styler?
Hybrid Specifications
FAQ








Refer Your Friends, Help Us Grow, Get Rewards Go To Top





We love Indiegogo! It is an amazing platform. It helps us keep track of our campaign backers, you amazing people, and lets us know who is doing what. So, when 		you refer a friend to our campaign, we can keep track of that and we know where the referral comes from. It's simple and easy and it lets us reward you for 				helping us achieve our goals!
Important: In order for the tracking technology to work, you have to use the SHARE buttons that are located at the top of our campaign page and right under the video. Keep in mind, you have to be logged in.
Also, you DO NOT need to be a current backer of our campaign to refer your friends and get your rewards. You do have to be logged into your Indiegogo account when you refer us, however. Don't forget.





Our love of beauty Go To Top

The beauty industry is a magical and powerful place for creative, artistic, and innovative producers. We chose to delve into this world because we are passionate about enriching the lives of those around us through beauty and lifestyle tools and products. We love helping those around us look beautiful, but more importantly, feel beautiful. One's aura that radiates with inner beauty and confidence is unmistakable. We have simply designed an innovative and specially crafted tool that will enhance such beauty.

As anyone can affirm, the way our hair looks says a lot about us and is one of the first things people will notice. Having a great hair day seems to have a proportionate effect on how we carry ourselves through the rest of the day. Here at HD Professional, we want everyone to be able to experience great hair days, everyday. With our new Hybrid Styler, beautifully coiffed hair is attainable and with such ease!
Psychologists have been studying and reporting on the effects hair has on a person and their attitude about themselves and how they carry themselves throughout their day. Dr. Diller explains it beautifully in her article, click here to view it 



The Psychology Behind A 'Good Hair Day'
www.huffingtonpost.com
Are you having "a good hair day"? Seems like a simple, even silly, question coming from a psychologist whose work is about getting underneath the surface. But in all honesty -- superficial or not -- I have to say I'm familiar with that feeling.

 
    So what if we could give everyone a tool to make their attitude about their life change for the better? Give them a tool that would help them look beautiful, make them feel great, give them that high definition hair? Waves, curls, straight, however they want to style their hair, whatever look they are going for, we give them the tool to make that happen. That is what we are all about at HD Professional. We make tools that make people look and feel beautiful!





Welcome to HD Professional Go To Top

Located in San Jose, CA we are proud to be a Silicon Valley startup. Our company is one year old and since our inception, we have been developing and producing the next generation high-end beauty and lifestyle tools, we are ready to introduce our product and are sure it will shake up the beauty industry. We are an energetic team of educated business and fashion addicts who love fashion, beauty, digital business, and doing great things to benefit our communities.

We began working on our business at the beginning of this year. It took us nearly 8 months to develop our initial product because we wanted every aspect of it to be absolutely perfect. The resulting product is a beautiful combination of technology and hair awesomeness.


In November of this year, we considered very seriously the option of doing a crowdfunding campaign. We thought it would be really great to see what people thought of our business, our product, and whether people were genuinely going to be interested in the thousands of hours we invested in order to bring this product to  reality. We also felt that the crowdfunding space would be an ideal place for us to get our potential market's feedback on our upcoming products and some really
cool ideas that we have to forge into real products. So, we are here now! We are crowdfunding our amazing Hybrid Styler and offering this level of product quality at an amazing price. This a great product for yourself, your wife, your fiancée, your loved one, or for any of your friends.

So, that's all! We are here to build great lifestyle and hair and esthetic products for consumers and professionals around the world. We are an incredibly strong team of people who decided to quit our day jobs to get this company going. Our academic backgrounds are in Economics, Finance, Marketing, Physics, Electrical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Fashion, and we even have cosmetologists on staff. We have a PhD. in Physics, another PhD in economics, and just a great team overall with a lot of experience looking to make a difference in our community and to give back to those in need. Through building a strong company anchored in philanthropic efforts!

Join us, give our product a try, help us build our business, and help us make a difference in our little world called Earth! Again, welcome to HD Professional. May goddess-like looks be with you!





What is the HD Hybrid Styler? Go To Top

When we set out to create a great hair-styling tool people to use when they style their hair, we were shocked by the products available on the market. What we saw were cheaply made products, with limited features, that were selling in stores and online for ridiculously inflated prices.

We then started to examine the market. We researched where these products were manufactured and actually contacted their manufacturers, all of which are in China.
We found out that these companies are producing these low cost products anywhere from $6 to $8 and selling them to consumers at prices ranging from $140 to $220. The women on our team had also made purchases of these competing products. They too were quite unhappy with the price they paid for the performance the tool delivered. Unfortunately, that is all that is out there.

We set out on a mission. We did not want to create another mediocre product with standard functions and we did not want a bunch of buttons and useless LCD displays on our tool. We wanted precision, the highest temperature available, and we wanted a very sleek user control interface. Something that was "old school" in the best way. We wanted to also have something look and feel soft and light, was  not cumbersome, and protected our user's fingers from heat and burns. We wanted to produce a device that really optimized the heat effect of releasing ions. So, we did it.
Nine and a half months later, we have our Hybrid Styler! It's a power-apcked tool, designed and engineered together with our manufacturer, both here in California and in South Korea. South Korean producers are known throughout the world for being meticulous in manufacturing. They produce incredibly high quality products. Yes, our production costs are a lot higher than China but our quality is untouchable and we leave our competitors in the dust with our performance.

We do not believe that anyone should charge the amounts they are charging for these tools, so we wanted to make our $200 iron affordable for everyone. Actually, even at $200, our iron outperforms our competitors products in the same category. We put a lot of thought into this device.

Our Hybrid Styler is a mix of analog and digital technologies. We wanted the ease and stability of an analog control interface; something that is easy to turn the device on and off and easy to dial in the exact temperature by simply spinning a traditional control knob.
The brain on the inside of our tool is purely digital. It takes the analog control references and turns it into digital signals performing at digital speeds, thus providing features in safety, temperature calibration and real-time-all-time temperature monitoring. This ensures the device is always at the prescribed temperature with incredibly rapid heating of the plates, and rapid cooling once temperature is lowered. The system provides much less power consumption, and even has a safety and auto shutdown after 45 minutes of non-use. All of this can only be achieved with digital smarts.

So, this is what we have created! Analog controls and functions, and a true digital brain providing digital performance. Through our combined efforts, the Hybrid Styler was born. An amazing tool packed with current and future technology! Give one a try, contribute to our campaign. We know you will love this tool and use it for years to come!






Why Hybrid? Go To Top


        Hybrid is a new way of binding old analog technology together with digital technology and making them work efficiently and effectively together. For our Hybrid Styler, we wanted to have the ease of use of traditional knobs and dials, simple, quick controls, and we wanted to put those simple accurate controls into a digital system that would provide great performance and low power consumption.

    Hybrid; what does it mean? For purposes of our product, it can be defined in two ways. A hybrid technology (computer) is a system that exhibits features of an analog system and a digital system. Wiki defines it here:  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hybrid_computer . For our other purpose, and from an integrated circuit (the brain inside the Hybrid Styler) a hybrid integrated circuit is a miniaturized electronic circuit combining different semiconductor devices and passive components on a substrate. More information can be found here:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hybrid_integrated_circuit .
    

    So why hybrid? Because we felt that providing analog control of a tool like ours and pairing it with the performance of a digital system is not only an amazing combination, but our users will love the reliability and amazing performance that this product will provide. Try for yourself and let us know how you feel. One of our main reasons for being on Indiegogo with our campaign is to elicit user feedback. Tell us what you think of this product and the idea. Shoot us an email if you have any comments or suggestions on how we can improve our concept and design. info@hdprofessionalhair.com





Why Crowdfunding? Go To Top

Besides the fact that it is an awesome way to introduce a business or a concept, meet new friends, and build a better economy together, crowdfunding gives us access to the many thousands of beautiful people like you. Together, we can help build a better world, a better nation, a stronger economy, and build and grow small businesses around the world. We want to be a part of reducing unemployment through hiring and be active in our community through giving time and money from revenues. All of this can be achieved with the help of the generous contributors and adventurous people that are involved in crowdfunding!
It is an honor and a pleasure to be part of this community and to have the ability to create a campaign to share our hard work and the product we are so proud of. We are a manufacturer of these high end beauty tools and have been working to bring a new kind of device to the market. We wanted a set of products that were more consumer friendly, more price appropriate, and of quality that is unexpected i the market.

We also wanted to understand more about our market. See what people thought, and open a free two way communication with interested contributors to help us make our products better and focus our ideas more towards exact wants. This is where you all come in. Help us by trying out one of our products. Let us know if we can add you to our client advisory committee. Every one of our crowdfunding contributors has an opportunity to come onboard and become a beta tester and product idea advisor to our company.

How will the funds from our campaign be used?  We will use most of the funds to purchase our first round of inventory, this inventory will be used to support our campaign contributors and give us enough inventory to really start to move the company forward. Proceeds from the sales of the remainder of our inventory will allow us to give back to our community and to some really great charities totaling about $40,000. Your contributions will also help us put together our customer support team and help us really learn what we need to do for our next project.


We need your help. We need your feedback. We need you to try our product, tell us what you think, tell us what you feel should be improved, and help us shape the ideas for our next set of products. If you are buying this for your loved one, invite them to join our advisory group and become a voice for feedback and new product development. We need everyone's help to build our next generation of innovative tools! So, we summarize below why we are here on Indiegogo


We want to introduce our products to you all and hear what you think about them. How can we improve our design, our engineering, our performance?
We want to use our crowdfunding campaign to invite you all to join our HD Advisors Club. You can do this by  going to our website and signing up. This will get you some really cool perks and give you access to all of our future products, before the public gets them. We need people like you to perform quality controls, give us input and help us make the best products with features you all want. Its not about us, it's all about you! Help us by joining our Advisors Club. Follow this link.
Our HD Professional Hybrid Styler is our first product manufactured and released. We need your feedback to help us develop this product line, which will include other quality essential tools. This way you can be part of the process of building your HD Pro tool set and know you had something to do with the features and benefits you will enjoy. Help us, get involved! Contribute and advise!
Your support in our campaign will help us tremendously. You will receive a beautiful HD Professional Hybrid Styler, a bunch of great perks, and you will help us get our first production run completed and shipped out for an on time delivery shortly after the end of our campaign. Please, contribute to our campaign and help us make people all over the world look and feel more beautiful. Help us fund our business engine allowing us to give back to our communities, and help us make our dreams come true!





Hybrid Specifications Go To Top

Body material:Heat resistant PET Plastic enhanced with Silicon
Coating:  Heat resistant Silicon
Heating Plates:  Improved heat transfer aluminum plates double coated Ceramic with infused Tourmaline particles.

Plate mount:Silicon heat resistant floating plate pads allowing for full range of plate floating motion.
Heat Range: 240°F to 455°F,  120°C to 230°C

What We Need & What You Get

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Some products I have done before this?



A visionary thinking of the refrigerator meets resistance from producers who will not give up the negative environmental PU foam.



That´s why you should go all in....


Inventor behind this new product seeking sponsors, you can help too!


A visionary rethinking of the refrigerator meets resistance from producers who will not give up the negative environmental PU- foam

 

Let´s make a Happy Cold Revolution

 We use a special designed plastic Air-mat as the insulation instead of PU-foam
 like all other refrigeraotors.

  • Reduce your energy cumsumption. 
  • Cheap to run.
  • 300 Liters big and can be build-in or stand alone. 
  • Standard size approx.188 x 60 x 58 cm.
  • NEW insulation and 100% renewable.
  • StayCoolFridge can be taken apart and all parts replaced. 
  • 100% recyclable
  • Great new design 
  • Ajustable feet for height.
  • Pick a personal colour and "draw system" that suits you.
  • Choose your own grip design.
  • Bio-zone and meat-zone inside the fridge. The food will last longer.
  • Better material, not toxic and easy to recyclable and better insulating ability.
  • NO PU-FOAM


All the founding goes to

  • Make two aluminum prototypes, and test. 10.000$
  • Drawings and final technical drawings for tooling 100.000$
  • Test final cooling system and integrate electrical system and digital display. 100.000$
  • LED Lights needs design and to be integrated into the fridge 20.000$
  • Getting IP-rights on all insulate material, design and trademark 20.000$ 
  • Go to 1 Internationals fair (Germany) 40.000$ PR.
  • Finalize tooling and last ajustments getting ready for production 280.000$
  • Setting up production, doing all packaging ready, setting up website and getting ready to handle order including packaging and salary for all people involved in the project for 14 mounth, like experts and knowhow.119.000$

Here you invest in a better environment

We dont need banks we need people .....join this venture. Together we can make this come true. You get a discount and we get started, fair for all and the environment is the winner.

You will get a refrigerator which has low energy consumption and long-lasting.

StayCoolFridge will use less than other refrigerators , but the most important theme is the total amount of energy that is used to make the refrigerator. At the same time, it is extremely important to measure the energy to be used to obtain the product when it can not be used anymore. LIFETIMECYCLES (consumption of energy)

This refrigerator is made of bioplastic and the insulation is made of plastic Airmats too. Instead of alminum/steel frame/body we use Plastic. It makes perfect sense environmentally....REUSE and REDUSE......

  • I have developed several children’s products like www.flexibath.com and www.fredachair.com all done with respect for the enviorment.


More room

Thin insulation gives you more space inside even if you make a "build-in solution"

Ice machine is best next to the refrigerator, it is also better in terms of energy consumption and hygienically.


Customized refrigerator

How cool........





Makes no sense to...

to break down or burn old of refrigerators, a waste of time and effort.

IT IS STUCK - LIKE GLUE?



NEW - Special insulation

We will put special plastic material like a mat into the refrigerator instead of PU-foam.
This insulation material is developed by one of the biggest US-plastic developer and we hope to use the matts in other products too.
It will give a lower consumption and be 100% reusable. NO pollution, just clean technique and RENEWABLE !! It even have a better insulation property.

(this is not final insulation,just stock photo)

                                                                


Good bargain too

Even with all these new possibilities, the refrigerator is not the most expensive on the market. We are aiming for a FOB price of 1000 - 1699 $ and we would love to be a good bargain and get even lower.



Estimated Price ; 1000 - 1699$ 

We hope cheeper than many other brands, but this depends on the funding.... Please help us....!




This fridge last a long time 

and it can be repaired by the local handyman.


Standard size.

188 cm. x 60 cm. x 58 cm. 




3 nice doors

 to keep most cold air inside the cabinet when it is opened.


Great Design - choose your colour - 

Nice LED light inside. SUPER SAVER



Different cool zones -  

One for meat and some for happy fruit and vegetables.

Wine and Water has its own special space at the bottom of the refrigerator where it is most cool and proper temperature for these products.

Medications and makeup have their own trays that can be closed securely so that children do not get into contact with these products.
You can get customized drawers too.


"Pull-easy" draws - 

gives you quick overview



Choose your grip and door color.


Get a grip........!

Nice easy display to show temperature

(stock photo)


We can make it happen !

we have done it before with www.flexibath.com. Starting out with nothing and people just thinking "you must be crazy"..... but after a lot of work and finding the money it was done. The FlexiBath is sold in more than 40 countries. 

No Bank but People

If you like us to put this fridge into the market, we can do it together, but we need the money to get it done. You get the discount and pay like a "preorder" then we end up "homesafe"

Some big companies in the "refrigerator industry" see the opportunities in this new product They have evaluated the project, but rejected because they don't want to change the "PU-foam  sandwich " method, even they know about the consequenses using that kind of insulation. 

WE can put an end to that, just by introducing this first fridge in the market without the foam.


Final design

When we start the final drawings towards the tooling, we may change some of the design, but only if we need to. We hope the customer can choose , different grips, feet and door colors. The inside drawers can be  customizedtoo, but all these details will be noted on the months update paged.

www.staycoolfridge.com

Here is some of the earlier drawings of the " Stay Cool Fridge"




New and innovative 

insulation....safe and renewable.


Long time to develop

We started out trying to do a wooden frame. Now it is plastic. Plastic is more    hygienic and economic reasonable, so we changed to renewable PP-plastic.




Let´s make it a better world, let´s make it possible to recyclable the refrigerators......here is the solution.

In a small country like Denmark we burn of 220.000 old refrigerators yearly, nothing get´s reused, just burned (the liquid is reused only)?

Just a waste


Get a Grip !!


Cool renewable grip.....

When the refrigerator is finished, we will make a freezer-cabinet similar to this design and again with this new insulation, then you have a total central cool unit in your kitchen, right......!
