story:
Short Summary

  • Belle Chapelle hopes to build an identity as a designer and seller of women's modest dresses that are fashionable in style, of quality construction, and value priced. 

  • The average price for these dresses will be $75.

  • These dresses will not only be an answer for church going women but for all who value a respectable image. 

  • This project seeks to construct an eclectic of modest dresses.

  • Once I receive the funds my main focus will be to create actual samples of each dress. I strongly believe that once the prototypes are made the response from friends, family, and social media followers will be outstanding. 

  • This is a much need solution in the fashion industry. I see nothing but positive outcomes for this endeavor. 

  • The name Belle Chapelle is french. It is was inspired by the target market, women who attend church. 

  • Please share this link with everyone you know.

What We Need 

Here is where the money will go:

  • Serging Machine $200

    http://www.overstock.com/Crafts-Sewing/Singer-ProFinish-Serger/5536242/product.html?gclid=CInHiITK_7wCFchFMgodXDkASg&cid=202290&kid=9553000357392&track=pspla&ef_id=UvD8dQAABFt3Ar@q:20140307042417:s

    $1000 for materials and notions to make the dresses. The average retail price for each of the 23 dresses is $43.

    $195 Dress form

    http://www.etsy.com/listing/104720354/new-female-professional-fashion?utm_source=google&utm_medium=product_listing_promoted&utm_campaign=supplies_high&gclid=CJOIkdLO_7wCFYY7MgodqF8A8Q

    My Pattern Designer 2.0 by Livingsoft
    http://mypatterndesigner.com
    $499 Pro Version

    Sullivans 12570 Home Hobby 60x36x36"H Cutting & Craft Table

    Our Price: $99.99 + about $35 for shipping

    http://www.allbrands.com/products/3782-sullivans-12570-home-hobby-60x36x36-h-cutting-and?utm_source=froogle&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=feeds&utm_term=Sullivans&gclid=CO-3xvzP_7wCFeY-Mgod_DAAoQ

    $1400 Mac computer- Proper to work on and store all of my images and major software programs such as Adobe Suite, My Pattern Designer 2.0, and Final Cut Pro for YouTube video updates. This will be a great replacement for my HP which often slows down when I have several pages, programs, and images on Photoshop opened at the same time. Multiple pages opened at once is must for my kind of work.

  • $1000 miscellaneous fabric and notion expenses. If I stumble upon value bulk materials, I think it would be feasible to make a large purchase rather than purchasing for one dress.

  • If I do not reach my entire goal the money will go towards purchasing the fabric and notions.
  • Please share this link with everyone you know.
  • Information crossed out on the list was gifted and have recently been purchased. However, the goal amount cannot be changed, Indiegogo does not allow such changes after the campaign has been launched.

The Impact

  • My graduate study detailed how young ladies are conditioned to dress improper beginning at childhood. This has caused many to do-away with modest attire and accept styles that have no discrete code of esteem.
  • Upon this research I created a Pinterest account dedicated to modest dress/classic fashion and a Facebook account. Since October my Pinterest has 489 pins and 328 followers. My Facebook has 1,746 followers. The images are examples of modest dresses with the purpose of teaching young women that it is possible to dress appropriately and still look attractive. 
  • If I am fully funded it should take no more than 2 months to construct all 23 dresses.
  • After I reach that goal my BIGGEST DREAM is to have these dresses manufactured in large quantities so I can sell them online. A project like that would cost $50,000.00.

Thank you.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able contribute, you can still help:

  • Please share this link with everyone you know.
  • Feel free to use Indiegogo to share my information.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8vT_ZPXwirk

story:
About us

District Roots is a urban apparel clothing line founded by 'Big Ed' and 'Mini' in 2012 from that awesome city in England they call Manchester. District Roots is a unisex urban clothing brand, for those who believe their roots and origins form a key part of their identity.    

                                                                                  .

We focus all our efforts on crafting the most unique unique designs and prints without compromising quality. All of our clothing is manufactured with
the highest quality.All of our designs and concepts are rooted in the passion people have for their cities and origins. 

The campaign 

This campaign will help District Roots provide better training and apprenticeship opportunities for young people in Manchester. We want to build a creative hub where those who want to gain skills in textile printing and graphic design have a place to learn. We currently have one apprentice but need your support in order to provide better equipment, so we can better teach those who want to learn.

Why this is important to us

We feel that there is currently a skills gap in the U.K. employment market, especially in textile manufacturing and apparel design. By supporting the District Roots movement you will be helping bring back grass roots manufacturing and enable us to hire young talent in the industry.

What We Need 

We are aiming to raise at least £25,000

The funds will be used to purchase printing inks, industrial sewing machine, heat presses and screen printing equipment for clothing production. These items will enable us to bring our customers better quality clothing; but most importantly give us the ability to take on more young apprentices in Manchester who we can teach manufacturing and production techniques too.

What You Get

All those who support the District Roots cause;
  • Will get a warm fuzzy feeling inside
  • Will be given a shout out on twitter &/ facebook
  • Stickers and badge packs.
  • T-shirts, jumpers, hoodies and bags from the current collection
  • Gain some of awesome merchandise depending on how much you donate.
  • Exclusive not yet released apparel for the 2014 collection.
  • Exclusive one of pieces.
  • Chance to be involved in our next video shoot :)

When you will get it & Delivery info

  • All orders for current clothing in stock will be shipped by the end of October.
  • New lines not yet released will be shipped once in stock.
  • We ship worldwide prices for shipping included.

The Impact

  • District Roots will be able to purchase new machinery which will be used for teaching.
  • As a business we will be able to take on two new apprentices providing more jobs for Manchester.
  • We aim to open a co-working creative space for those in the industry who want to share knowledge. 
  • Make Manchester more 'awesome' (not sure if it's possible but we'll give it go)

    Other Ways You Can Help!!!!!!!!

    Use the Indiegogo share tools! 

    Help spread the word on Twitter/ Facebook/ Google +, youtube anywhere someone will see us. 

    BIG BIG BIG thanks guys, wish us luck.

   What We Need  We are aiming to raise at least £25,000
The funds will be used to purchase printing inks, industrial sewing machine, heat presses and screen printing equipment for clothing production. These items will enable us to bring our customers better quality clothing; but most importantly give us the ability to take on more young apprentices in Manchester who we can teach manufacturing and production techniques too.

What You Get
All those who support the District Roots cause;


Will get a warm fuzzy feeling inside
Will be given a shout out on twitter &/ facebook
Stickers and badge packs.
T-shirts, jumpers, hoodies and bags from the current collection
Gain some of awesome merchandise depending on how much you donate.
Exclusive not yet released apparel for the 2014 collection.
Exclusive one of pieces.
Chance to be involved in our next video shoot :)




When you will get it & Delivery info

All orders for current clothing in stock will be shipped by the end of October.
New lines not yet released will be shipped once in stock.
We ship worldwide prices for shipping included.



  The Impact 
District Roots will be able to purchase new machinery which will be used for teaching.
As a business we will be able to take on two new apprentices providing more jobs for Manchester.
We aim to open a co-working creative space for those in the industry who want to share knowledge. 
Make Manchester more 'awesome' (not sure if it's possible but we'll give it go)


  Other Ways You Can Help!!!!!!!!
Use the Indiegogo share tools! 
Help spread the word on Twitter/ Facebook/ Google +, youtube anywhere someone will see us. 
 BIG BIG BIG thanks guys, wish us luck.

story:
T H E   S H O E S   -   S T O R Y

Have you ever been on a shopping spree, walking by the windows and seeing the perfect pair of shoes? But as soon as you went into the store and found out about the price, you just felt like hell no? We feel you, however Guivre Homme wants to make a difference. 

We are a team of three people (17, 18 and 22 years old) who want to found a fashion business called Guivre Homme, for fashion has always been our passion. As a start of our own fashion brand, we want to manufacture high quality pairs of shoes at a fair price. We spend a lot of time designing three pairs in total. Our design is simple and classic. We strongly associate our brand with nature. That's why our shoes are produced climate friendly and we only use high quality materials such as genuine leather. In addition all the shoes are handmade.

We searched month for the perfect factory which is able to produce the shoes in a high quality and to manufacture the right quantity. We found a company in South Korea which has its partner factory in Guangzhou, China. The factory seems to be perfect for our claims and we were positively surprised about the conditions within the factory itself. Because fair salaries, good working conditions, harmonic treatment and environmentalism is extremely important to us! We have a close contact to our supplier in South Korea which enabled us to cooperate easily. For now, we have the prototypes only.

T H E   S H O E S   -   D E S I G N

THE WINNETOU

"The Winnetoo is specifically designed to make the leather stand out. The color you see is identical to what the skin of the calf was. We also use wild leather for the inner part of the shoe, so that the shoes perfectly fit to your feet. In addition to the classic sneaker design, it’s curved sole gives it a slight touch of a vintage training shoe. The Wynono is a perfect combination of authentic quality with a timeless, modern design."

THE WYNONO WHITE

"The Wynono is a streetwear shoe which still has a classy look to it. We used real calfskin for it.  This allows the shoe to be comfortably soft and fit perfectly to your feet.The waxed cotton laces easily fit into the eyelets, plus their surface adds a bit more elegance to the shoe."

THE WYNONO BLACK

 The Wynono black is identical to the Wynono white except for its color.


We worked really hard on the design of the shoes. Now it is time to promote them. We know that here on Indiegogo are thousands of excellent projects, however, we hope that ours stand just a little apart from the rest. Thank you very much for your support!!

story:
NotMine

For each belt sold, we will disarm a landmine somewhere in the world and you as a buyer will get a video that that starts on you home address on Google Earth and ends on where your landmine was found. Then we have actually included a short video of when your landmine is detonated. The belt itself has the number of landmines left in the world stamped into it, and it is counting down for each belt sold. 

This is what the video looks like:

The first belt we made went to the Crown Prince of Norway (yes really!!) but the first other 9 belts ever made will go to the highest bidder/backer. Starting with the number:

and counting down.


The Issue of Landmines

Landmines still plague some 70 countries and over 42% of (registered) casualties are children. What drives us in this project is the fact that landmines has been designed to do just that, linger after the war and kill and maim civilians. We give you the opportunity to sponsor the removal of one, and who knows, maybe you just saved the life of a child somewhere. All you have to do is buy this stylish belt, instead of another stylish belt. 


Our local de-mining partners

We cooperate with local de-mining teams in Zimbabwe, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Tajikistan. Since the landmines are detonated and the gps-locations registered and the detonations often filmed, we cause very little extra workload onto the teams. For more information please visit our website: NotMine.info


The funds raised will be used to

  • Disarm landmines, each belt sold sponsors the removal of one landmine
  • Stock up in order to handle larger volumes
  • Create new products, with more variety
  • Expand into brands, similar to NotMine

The Making

To punch in the numbers, the leather is soaked in water, and then we use 3D-printed blocks of letters to press the numbers into the belt. The leather is produced using ecological methods only. 


Challenges

I guess that most of you who read this can guess how many "you want to do what?!?!" I got from NGO:s working with humanitarian de-mining. It was not an easy sell, but in the end we got a trial contract for the first 100 landmines we will sponsor the removal of. Setting up the back-end: which translates your address to a gps, have Google Earth export the recording and to have everything cut together into a video, that was all but easy... Figuring out how to get the right number of letters onto a belt, so that it still fits, and just learning how to get the technique right. 

But here we are.



Why are we doing this?

I needed to buy some new clothes a year ago, but I was totally uninspired by what I saw. I thought of the words of Ghandi: “There is no beauty in the finest cloth if it makes hunger and unhappiness.” And from my years in China, I know what the people making the clothes are paid, and how they are treated. I know what the handling of textiles does to the local environment. Did I want to show everyone around me that I am willing to boost corporate profits at the cost of the workers and the environment? No. So why is there not a brand that say: I did something good. And instead of creating a brand with a "story" why not have that deed be the story. That is the idea behind NotMine.


The future

We have hundreds of ideas and concepts, but we started with landmines, because a landmine nearby a village is never ever a good thing. But there is so much more we could do, why not provide employment opportunities in refugee camps, why not buy Kalashnikovs of the streets in a war-torn country and make belt buckles out of them as well? If we can make NotMine-work, there is so much that we could do. Would you want Livestyle Clothing to become the next big thing? If so, buy a belt or a t-shirt and share this video with anyone you might think like the idea.

story:
HOLSTER MINIMAL WALLET

Swappable Colors as a add on reward. Add the following cost to your perk and receive additional colors with your reward.

$2 - One (1) color

$4 - Two (2) colors

$6 - Three (3) colors

$7.50 - Four (4) colors

$9 - Five (5) colors

$10 - Six (6) colors

ABOUT ME

I'm Andrew. I started sewing in 1982 when I was in junior high and I found out in home economics class that I have a natural ability to sew especially with a the sewing machine.  I have personally owned a few sewing machines to date and have personally made bags, wallets and even a snowboard suit.

I remember helping mom sew, she even had a job as a seamstress at a small Hawaii factory and lots of family members on her side did some type of sewing. On dad's side of the family, grandfather was a master tailor and owned his own shop in the Philippines and great grandfather was a Haberdasher (a dealer of men's fine clothing and accessories) and dad was a true salesman who was always selling the next best product.

So you can say I am taking on a little twist in the family business by using the sewing and designing skills I have and personally launching a line of accessories called "A. Magpoc."

story:
Short Summary

My name is Max. Over the past year I have been developing a way to coat a pair of Dr. Dre Beats headphones in Gold. I have recently found the perfect way of doing this. The result is an amazing pair of headphones!

I have used Beats Pro headphones. Beats Pro headphones are designed for sound engineers, musicians, and those who take sound seriously. They’re the headphones that artists like Will.i.am use in the studio, and are designed to deliver the same level of emotion and power the artist originally intended. And now you can have these state of the art headphones coated in 24-Carat gold.

Headphone Features

THE SOUND OF THE STUDIO.

Beats Pro professional headphones sound so good because they put back the quality lost in modern-day file compression. That means you’re really hearing music the way it was originally heard by the artist in the studio.

CLEAR HIGHS AND DEEP LOWS.

Beats Pro are made of steel and aluminum, giving you an interior sound platform more solid than most. That’s why you’ll feel the kind of bass that resonates deep in your chest when you play your music.

PRACTICALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE.

No cheap plastic, no frayed cords. Beats Pro headphones are made with an aluminum gunmetal frame, encasing overstuffed leather ear cups.

TRUE NOISE REDUCTION.

Because Beats Pro headphones have heavily padded, pivoting ear cups, you get the noise cancelling effect without the need for power switches or batteries. It’s the real studio monitor experience in a headphone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Now we have the method and we have the equipment, all we need is your help to start producing large quantities of these headphones.

 

What will you get in return...?

For $300 you will recieve the special pair of headphones. Not only is this over 50% off the production cost, but this is cheaper that buying the normal headphones themselves that retail for $399! (http://www.beatsbydre.com/headphones/pro/beats-pro.html)

For $450 you will be able to customise the headphones and engrave whatever you desire on them.

If you are feeling generous and want to donate $1500, you can have these line of head phones named after you or anything you choose!

We will ship the headphones worldwide free of charge!

The Impact

This product will provide the most luxury headphones available.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this arround to others who would be interested! Thank you!

story:
“Story is powerful. Story is fluid and it belongs to nobody.”

On Our Radar is a charity that supports people from some of the most remote and marginalised communities in the world to tell their own stories from their own perspectives.

We believe that the best stories are told straight from the source, and that voices from the margins make a real difference to society. Our vision is a fully inclusive world, where everyone enjoys their right to speak and be heard on issues that most affect their lives.

Mobile phones are crucial to the work we do - they are the most accessible form of communications technology in the world. Even in some of the most remote and marginalised communities in the world, access to a basic mobile phone handset is almost universal. This allows for an unprecedented opportunity to take part in dialogue. This is why some of our team will be running the race dressed as a mobile phone 

You can watch a video of them training here! https://www.facebook.com/paul.myles/videos/10100810468541954/?pnref=story 

In the past year, we've :

- used our SMS hub to allow citizen reporters in Sierra Leone to cover the Ebola crisis for the Guardian, C4 News, BBC World Service and Sky News. These reporters were nominated for a One World Media Award.

ebola.onourradar.org 

- supported a group of 25 people with dementia around the UK to trend nationally on twitter, sharing their 'Dementia Diaries' using custom built 3D printed phones

 dementia.onourradar.org

- trained a new reporter network in Nigeria, who covered the recent elections via SMS and whatsapp, helping to expose irregularities and intimidation and challenging mainstream media narratives about their country 

nigerdelta.onourradar.org

- supported communities in Sierra Leone and Kenya to interact with local government via SMS, fostering dialogue and improving services.

Read more here: onourradar.org

story:
SCOTTeVEST ULTIMATE POCKET FLEECE

A smart fleece jacket with 19 tech-enabled, hidden pockets to carry everything you need… invisibly!



While clothing styles and technology have changed dramatically over time, pockets have NOT evolved to keep up with either.  Today, people carry smartphones, tablets and the wires and batteries to keep devices charged… but we’re still essentially carrying that high-tech stuff in pockets designed in the 18th century.

…until now.

This is the Ultimate Pocket Fleece. A jacket so beautifully complex and precisely engineered with 19 pockets that we need to show you an x-ray view to appreciate all the details.

What sets SCOTTeVEST apart?

Do you have an iPad?  We have a pocket for that.


Do you have a smartphone?  Just imagine being able to see and control your phone through the clear fabric of an interior pocket.


Ok, now stop imagining, because our clothing does all this and much more:

The Ultimate Pocket Fleece has 19 pockets, and each of them has a purpose.  We even include icons on the clothing with the suggested uses for each pocket to help you stay organized.


Ever had your headphones wind up getting tied into a knot in your pocket?  We have a patented system for running your wires through the lining of the jacket, so they will never get tangled again.


We pay extreme attention to the details.  If you’re a traveler, you need to protect the RFID information on your passport and credit cards… so we lined a special pocket with RFID blocking material.


No one likes smudges on their glasses or touch screens, so we include a cleaning cloth on an elastic tether in the glasses pocket.  It even has a mini pocket map printed on it so you can find all the pockets and features.


You will never lose your keys when you keep them attached to the integrated keychain.

And you’re more likely to stay hydrated when it’s easy to carry a water bottle hands-free without it spilling.

Too hot?  Take off the sleeves.


I could go on and on and on describing the specifics and features of the 19 pockets in this Ultimate Pocket Fleece.  

If you already “get” the idea and can imagine how awesome it would be to have a SCOTTeVEST in your life, I would be happy to share the world of pockets with you!  Just check out the sizing chart and jump right in.


If you want to really appreciate the quality and level of careful design that goes into this product, you should know why I created it in the first place.

Why 19 Pockets?

While most fashion designers are concerned with things like hemlines and draping, we consider ourselves to be function designers first and foremost.

Yes, the outside matters, but the structure of the pockets, the way they improve your life, and the way they make carrying and accessing your technology easier are our first focuses.

Think of the stuff you use all day, every day.  Your cell phone.  Your keys.  Your subway pass.



When you carry it in a backpack or shoulder bag, you may have it with you, but you can’t easily access it.  Sure, you could wear a fanny pack, but they look terrible and you have the weight of everything you carry hanging from one part of your body.



All ^^that stuff^^ is being carried in the pockets of this vest… and you can’t even tell.

The way we engineer our pockets spreads out the load of whatever you carry so that you aren’t weighted down, and you don’t look lumpy.  And because the pockets are laid out in an organized manner, everything is at your fingertips and you can access your gadgets whether you are sitting or standing, without needing to rummage through a bag.

Our Story

My personal quest to evolve pockets began years ago. I was commuting a lot for work – to a job I did not love – and was carrying all of the gadgets that I had to bring with me. I tried backpacks, computer bags, fanny packs… every variation of what could be considered a man-purse you could imagine.

Not my best look.

One day, while on a hike with my wife, she expressed very succinctly that she was tired of carrying my crap when we went out, and that I needed to find a better solution.

I looked into fishing vests, and while all those exterior pockets may have had the capacity, they were no better looking than a fanny pack, and none of those pockets were designed to hold the devices I wanted to carry.

With no clothing design background, I grabbed a pair of scissors, some scrap fabric, and a stapler.  I cobbled together a super rough prototype of my first pocket product: a vest.  I took a chance, quit my job, and formed a company – SCOTTeVEST – to produce and sell these pocket-filled vests.

In the 15 years since producing my first prototype, the devices have totally changed but my commitment remains the same: to produce high-quality, good-looking clothing with tons of hidden pockets.

Wearing SCOTTeVEST will change the way you look at clothing.


Why are we on IGG?

Clothing changes… Technology changes… Our products change… But one thing that has not changed very much is the business model of creating and selling clothing.

Our Indiegogo campaign is not just about raising some cash to put a new product on the market.  We want to take the same type of radical thinking that we apply to the pockets in our products, and evolve the way clothing is ordered, produced, and sold.

We’ve been changing the clothing industry since our first product:

  1. We were the first clothing brand started online (in 2000) and set up exclusively to sell direct to the consumer.  Our first product was actually sold on a pre-order model, very much like Indiegogo today!

  2. One of our guiding design principles in non-obsolescence, which is a fancy way of saying that our clothing doesn’t go out of fashion.  This allows us to order in larger quantities and sell the same style for several years.  No one else does this… but it’s not without its risks.

  3. Now, I want to change the game again, reduce my inventory risk and pass those savings directly on to YOU.

I’m not a big gambler.  Nickel slots and low-stakes poker are about all I can stomach most of the time.  Unfortunately, the traditional clothing company model is set up as a gamble.

Right now, any clothing company – whether they are massive or tiny – will come up with a design a full year in advance, produce a whole bunch of them, and hope that they sell.  

If they do sell, great. Hopefully that success will help them break even for all the other styles that did not perform nearly as well.  

Our first two innovations in the industry - selling online and creating timeless designs - have allowed us to succeed in spite of these gambles, but we still need to buy and stock huge quantities of clothing.  That’s a big risk, and a huge expense.

This risk is why some clothing brands charge outrageous prices, and then you see them a few months later in discount stores for 75% to 90% off their original price.  Once “the season” is over, they know they won’t get any more money from all their stock, so they can only get rid of it at steep discounts.  It kind of sucks for everyone... and there has to be a better way.

I believe that shifting to a Clothing On Demand model is the solution the clothing industry needs.  When I first ran a pre-order sale, I was able to mitigate some of my risk, and that success allowed me to build upon my first product and continue to grow.  I am trying to do exactly the same thing with this Indiegogo campaign today.

To evolve with the times, the clothing industry will need to shift to be more “on demand.”  Through this campaign on Indiegogo, I want to test a Clothing On Demand system, where companies like mine have a mechanism to know how much of a product they should create before it is created.

By lowering the financial risk to clothing manufacturers like me, you will pay the absolute best price possible.  Manufacturers like me don't need to wonder if there is going to be $2 million worth of inventory sitting in a warehouse for a couple years that no one wants.

Bottom line: everyone wins, and this Indiegogo campaign is the first step in my experiment to see if clothing on demand is a viable model for my company and industry.


What are the risks of supporting this campaign?

Essentially… none.

We’ve been in business for 15 years, and our company has been featured all over the news:

If you look at any product on our site, you’ll see tons of amazing reviews.

And if you’re still not convinced that we are legit, just Google SCOTTeVEST and see for yourself.

Creating clothing as complex as mine is a completely different process from making an average piece of clothing. When we create a product design, it is about 50 pages long and contains details and specifications that you might expect to see on blueprints for a high-rise building, not a jacket.  


"There’s more design thought in Scott’s clothing than most smart phones.” - Guy Kawasaki, Chief Evangelist at Canva

Through a process that takes months of back-and-forth with our factories, we work through each minute detail in a process of prototyping that requires multiple iterations and long hours of detailed explanations.

For the Ultimate Pocket Fleece, we have already gone through that entire process… The prototype is our final proof, and the next step is to place an order and kick off production.  At this point, it's not a question of if, but when, so there is really no risk that we won’t deliver on our promises.

We are working with a factory that we have used on dozens of garments before, and their work is top-notch.

The only potential delivery risk would be a delay in shipping, which could hold things up for at most a week.  We have a hold on all materials required for our initial run, and have access to additional materials for follow-up orders.

I'm ready to order… how does sizing work?

I'm ready to order...how does sizing work

To determine which size is best for you, check out our sizing chart below. If you still have questions or if you’re not sure if your favorite device will fit, just ask and we’ll double check for you.

What is the return/exchange policy?

We will accept exchanges up to 30 days from the original ship date.

Items must be unworn, unwashed and with hangtags still attached.

A Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number is required prior to shipping your package back to us. To obtain an RMA # for your exchange, please fill out the necessary form on our website.
Where can I find high-res photos? 
We are flattered you want some high resolution photos of this garment. Hopefully that means you would like to feature our story. Photos and other assets can be found at SCOTTeVEST.com/IGG or you can contact pr@scottevest.com
story_txt:
SCOTTeVEST ULTIMATE POCKET FLEECE
 A smart fleece jacket with 19 tech-enabled, hidden pockets to carry everything you need… invisibly!








  While clothing styles and technology have changed dramatically over time, pockets have NOT evolved to keep up with either.  Today, people carry smartphones, tablets and the wires and batteries to keep devices charged… but we’re still essentially carrying that high-tech stuff in pockets designed in the 18th century.
…until now.
This is the Ultimate Pocket Fleece. A jacket so beautifully complex and precisely engineered with 19 pockets that we need to show you an x-ray view to appreciate all the details.   What sets SCOTTeVEST apart? 
Do you have an iPad?  We have a pocket for that.




Do you have a smartphone?  Just imagine being able to see and control your phone through the clear fabric of an interior pocket.



Ok, now stop imagining, because our clothing does all this and much more:


The Ultimate Pocket Fleece has 19 pockets, and each of them has a purpose.  We even include icons on the clothing with the suggested uses for each pocket to help you stay organized.



Ever had your headphones wind up getting tied into a knot in your pocket?  We have a patented system for running your wires through the lining of the jacket, so they will never get tangled again.



We pay extreme attention to the details.  If you’re a traveler, you need to protect the RFID information on your passport and credit cards… so we lined a special pocket with RFID blocking material.



No one likes smudges on their glasses or touch screens, so we include a cleaning cloth on an elastic tether in the glasses pocket.  It even has a mini pocket map printed on it so you can find all the pockets and features.




You will never lose your keys when you keep them attached to the integrated keychain.
And you’re more likely to stay hydrated when it’s easy to carry a water bottle hands-free without it spilling.
Too hot?  Take off the sleeves.



I could go on and on and on describing the specifics and features of the 19 pockets in this Ultimate Pocket Fleece.  
If you already “get” the idea and can imagine how awesome it would be to have a SCOTTeVEST in your life, I would be happy to share the world of pockets with you!  Just check out the sizing chart and jump right in.


If you want to really appreciate the quality and level of careful design that goes into this product, you should know why I created it in the first place.   Why 19 Pockets? While most fashion designers are concerned with things like hemlines and draping, we consider ourselves to be function designers first and foremost.
Yes, the outside matters, but the structure of the pockets, the way they improve your life, and the way they make carrying and accessing your technology easier are our first focuses.

Think of the stuff you use all day, every day.  Your cell phone.  Your keys.  Your subway pass.




When you carry it in a backpack or shoulder bag, you may have it with you, but you can’t easily access it.  Sure, you could wear a fanny pack, but they look terrible and you have the weight of everything you carry hanging from one part of your body.





All ^^that stuff^^ is being carried in the pockets of this vest… and you can’t even tell.The way we engineer our pockets spreads out the load of whatever you carry so that you aren’t weighted down, and you don’t look lumpy.  And because the pockets are laid out in an organized manner, everything is at your fingertips and you can access your gadgets whether you are sitting or standing, without needing to rummage through a bag.    Our Story

My personal quest to evolve pockets began years ago. I was commuting a lot for work – to a job I did not love – and was carrying all of the gadgets that I had to bring with me. I tried backpacks, computer bags, fanny packs… every variation of what could be considered a man-purse you could imagine.


Not my best look.
One day, while on a hike with my wife, she expressed very succinctly that she was tired of carrying my crap when we went out, and that I needed to find a better solution.
I looked into fishing vests, and while all those exterior pockets may have had the capacity, they were no better looking than a fanny pack, and none of those pockets were designed to hold the devices I wanted to carry.
With no clothing design background, I grabbed a pair of scissors, some scrap fabric, and a stapler.  I cobbled together a super rough prototype of my first pocket product: a vest.  I took a chance, quit my job, and formed a company – SCOTTeVEST – to produce and sell these pocket-filled vests.
In the 15 years since producing my first prototype, the devices have totally changed but my commitment remains the same: to produce high-quality, good-looking clothing with tons of hidden pockets.
Wearing SCOTTeVEST will change the way you look at clothing.



Why are we on IGG?
 
Clothing changes… Technology changes… Our products change… But one thing that has not changed very much is the business model of creating and selling clothing.Our Indiegogo campaign is not just about raising some cash to put a new product on the market.  We want to take the same type of radical thinking that we apply to the pockets in our products, and evolve the way clothing is ordered, produced, and sold.We’ve been changing the clothing industry since our first product:
We were the first clothing brand started online (in 2000) and set up exclusively to sell direct to the consumer.  Our first product was actually sold on a pre-order model, very much like Indiegogo today!
One of our guiding design principles in non-obsolescence, which is a fancy way of saying that our clothing doesn’t go out of fashion.  This allows us to order in larger quantities and sell the same style for several years.  No one else does this… but it’s not without its risks.
Now, I want to change the game again, reduce my inventory risk and pass those savings directly on to YOU.
I’m not a big gambler.  Nickel slots and low-stakes poker are about all I can stomach most of the time.  Unfortunately, the traditional clothing company model is set up as a gamble.Right now, any clothing company – whether they are massive or tiny – will come up with a design a full year in advance, produce a whole bunch of them, and hope that they sell.  If they do sell, great. Hopefully that success will help them break even for all the other styles that did not perform nearly as well.  Our first two innovations in the industry - selling online and creating timeless designs - have allowed us to succeed in spite of these gambles, but we still need to buy and stock huge quantities of clothing.  That’s a big risk, and a huge expense.This risk is why some clothing brands charge outrageous prices, and then you see them a few months later in discount stores for 75% to 90% off their original price.  Once “the season” is over, they know they won’t get any more money from all their stock, so they can only get rid of it at steep discounts.  It kind of sucks for everyone... and there has to be a better way.I believe that shifting to a Clothing On Demand model is the solution the clothing industry needs.  When I first ran a pre-order sale, I was able to mitigate some of my risk, and that success allowed me to build upon my first product and continue to grow.  I am trying to do exactly the same thing with this Indiegogo campaign today.To evolve with the times, the clothing industry will need to shift to be more “on demand.”  Through this campaign on Indiegogo, I want to test a Clothing On Demand system, where companies like mine have a mechanism to know how much of a product they should create before it is created.By lowering the financial risk to clothing manufacturers like me, you will pay the absolute best price possible.  Manufacturers like me don't need to wonder if there is going to be $2 million worth of inventory sitting in a warehouse for a couple years that no one wants.Bottom line: everyone wins, and this Indiegogo campaign is the first step in my experiment to see if clothing on demand is a viable model for my company and industry.
What are the risks of supporting this campaign?
Essentially… none.

We’ve been in business for 15 years, and our company has been featured all over the news:


If you look at any product on our site, you’ll see tons of amazing reviews.
And if you’re still not convinced that we are legit, just Google SCOTTeVEST and see for yourself.
Creating clothing as complex as mine is a completely different process from making an average piece of clothing. When we create a product design, it is about 50 pages long and contains details and specifications that you might expect to see on blueprints for a high-rise building, not a jacket.  



"There’s more design thought in Scott’s clothing than most smart phones.” - Guy Kawasaki, Chief Evangelist at Canva
Through a process that takes months of back-and-forth with our factories, we work through each minute detail in a process of prototyping that requires multiple iterations and long hours of detailed explanations.
For the Ultimate Pocket Fleece, we have already gone through that entire process… The prototype is our final proof, and the next step is to place an order and kick off production.  At this point, it's not a question of if, but when, so there is really no risk that we won’t deliver on our promises.
We are working with a factory that we have used on dozens of garments before, and their work is top-notch.

The only potential delivery risk would be a delay in shipping, which could hold things up for at most a week.  We have a hold on all materials required for our initial run, and have access to additional materials for follow-up orders.

I'm ready to order… how does sizing work?
I'm ready to order...how does sizing work
To determine which size is best for you, check out our sizing chart below. If you still have questions or if you’re not sure if your favorite device will fit, just ask and we’ll double check for you. 



What is the return/exchange policy?

We will accept exchanges up to 30 days from the original ship date.
Items must be unworn, unwashed and with hangtags still attached.
A Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number is required prior to shipping your package back to us. To obtain an RMA # for your exchange, please fill out the necessary form on our website.
Where can I find high-res photos? 
We are flattered you want some high resolution photos of this garment. Hopefully that means you would like to feature our story. Photos and other assets can be found at SCOTTeVEST.com/IGG or you can contact pr@scottevest.com

story:
RAVEAN PLEDGE LEVELS

 

 

WHAT PRODUCTS WORK WITH WHICH BATTERIES?

 

WHAT ARE THE BATTERY PLAY TIMES?

 

WHEN & WHERE YOU NEED THE RAVEAN HEATED DOWN 2.0 JACKET

 

PAST MEDIA COVERAGE & CUSTOMER REVIEWS

 

SAFETY | ARE THE RAVEAN JACKETS SAFE?

 

DURABILITY | HOW DURABLE ARE THE RAVEAN JACKETS?

 

TEAM & PAST SUCCESSFUL PROJECTS

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

For US and Canadian backers we will pay for the VAT and GST charges. For all other countries we are unable to cover VAT and GST, but will do our best to get it to you in the most cost efficient way possible and any savings we can discover, we will pass on to you.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes except for US and Canadians. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

One of our backers found this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...

REFUND POLICY

100% pledge back guarantee = you have 7 days after the end of the campaign to receive a full refund. After 7 days, we will start placing the POs for the products and will NOT issue any refunds or returns.

EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY

We do not do returns for crowdfunding products. However, if you receive the wrong size or wrong product, our exchange policy lasts 30 days from when your product arrived according to the tracking # we sent you. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we can’t offer you an exchange. To be eligible for an exchange, your item must be unused, free from dirt, dust or damage and in the same package and condition that you received it. If your return passes our inspection, you may receive an exchange. If you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product. See warranty guidelines below.

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, we will not be able to send you another product.

When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

WARRANTY

Our products come with a 90-day warranty starting on the day of receipt. You will need to apply for RA# and pay for the shipping to send your product in. When we have received your product with the associated RA# attached, if the product truly has a defect we will fix or replace your product and refund your shipping.

RISK & CHALLENGES

We have already completed and successfully fulfilled (1) $1.3M Kickstarter campaign (2) a $200K+ Indiegogo Campaign (3) we are fulfilling our $160K heated sleeping bag campaign (4) raised $225K on our Kickstarter wallet campaign (5) and raised approx. $400K on our Ultra-Light Heated Jacket campaign. We have LOTS of crowdfunding fulfillment experience. Our team combined has nearly 60+ years of manufacturing experience & 30+ years of design & branding experience. All of us are entrepreneurs and have started several successful businesses. We know how to get the job done and know how to do it right. So you can sleep well at night knowing not only will your jacket be freaking great, but it will be done right the first time!

We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We are also partnered with the best manufacturers in the industry. Our production lines are scheduled and we have priority on the line.

What you are seeing in our videos and pictures are prototypes. The final products will be even better!

Please feel to reach out to us if you have any concerns at support@ravean.com or leave a message on Indiegogo for us. Thanks for your support.

story:
Short Summary

Our company is growing and we need your help! We did a great job in 2018 releasing light up Light Up Fuzzy Scarves and Light-up Flowered Fedoras. In 2019 we want to grow our product base to include new items and in greater quantities and we need funds for manufacturing.

The good news is that the perks for your contribution are already in stock and ready to send you right now. And if we sell out, we'll add new items that are already designed and with the manufacturer, ready to be produced. We just need to know how many to create.

What We Need & What You Get

We just received a quote from manufacturing that we need to pay. But we realized we already have inventory that we'd like to offer you in exchange for helping us get to the next step! 

  • For a $65 contribution, you get two Light up Fuzzy Scarves! (a $90 value!)
  • For a $35 contribution, you can get a Light up Fuzzy Scarf (regularly $45)
  • For a $30 contribution you get a Light up Flowered Fedora! (normally $35)
  • For a $10 contribution, you get light up bunny ears in time for Easter, as long as you order by April 12th.  (on sale from $15)

The Impact

We are a triple bottom line company: People, Planet and Profit. This means that we care as much about helping people and the planet as we do about making a profit. The products you will be buying are made in Seattle by refugee women through an organization called Refugee Arts Initiative (http://refugeesarts.org). Your purchase helps support women who are staying home to take care of their kids and often don't speak English. This is one of the only jobs they can do to make money and they use the money to support their family. 

We also care about designing products that will last a long time. The Light up Fuzzy Scarves are designed so the electronics can be removed, they can be washed, and you can add new electronics as technology changes. The Light up Flowered Fedoras are well built and designed to last a long time. They easily re-shape and the batteries can be changed, allowing them to last for years. (I still wear my original prototype!)

Risks & Challenges

Those who act first get the first choice in colors and styles- so choose quickly!

Otherwise, there's not much risk. I already have these items in stock and ready to send. And by buying these items you are supporting refugee women in Seattle. Thank you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out! We're really excited about introducing new and innovative light up accessories into the world and you can help us make the next step a reality. Please share this campaign on social media and spread the love!

story:
The patent-pending, engineered design of the wrap features Sustained Heat Retention™ to prevent convective heat loss and keeps body temperatures from dropping in the cold or windy weather. The durable outer shell material and fleece-lined interior with concealed elastics helps hug Mozy close to your body.

 

As weather conditions can often change at a moment’s notice, Mozy’s Infinitely Adjustable Warmth™ gives you the ability to quickly adjust your level of warmth while you wear it. You can choose to wear Mozy at your waist, you can seal it halfway down, or you can fasten it snuggly all the way to your shoes. Choose how warm you want to be. 

 

 

 

 

 

Made of tightly woven, treated, heavy-duty 200 Denier Nylon, Mozy is water resistant and windproof — your wrap will keep you warm and dry making Mozy the best sideline companion. Now, sitting outside in the rain, snow or sleet at your child’s game is much more tolerable. 

 

Fit what you want, where you want it. Featuring three easy-to-reach pockets and a carabiner clip, Mozy can secure all your outdoor essentials: water bottles, cell phones, snacks, wipes, hats, gloves, glasses and more!

When it’s time to pack up your outdoor gear, don’t worry about finding a bag for Mozy. Your wrap actually packs into its own pocket for quick and easy storage. Mozy’s self-storage pocket also features a shoulder strap for easy carry.

 

Don’t worry if your child spills Gatorade in your lap or if your sideline spot is directly in the mud. Mozy can be machine washed in cold water on a gentle cycle and tumble dried on low.

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

 

Thermic Innovations LLC Founder Charles was sitting at his son's chilly, windy soccer game one Saturday in October. The metal bleachers were damp and too cold to sit on, and he noticed others struggling to keep their legs warm. He saw blankets sliding onto the ground and into the mud every time parents stood to cheer. He saw parents leaving the sidelines early to hop in their cars and warm up.  

 

As an entrepreneur with over 50 patents and masters degrees in engineering and business, Charles knew he could do something about this. Using his background in thermodynamics and heat transfer, he started brainstorming better solutions to keep warm. He knew that his exposed lower body comprised close to 45% of his body’s surface area and began designing. Soon, the first version of Mozy was born. After more than 30 engineered and tested iterations, he introduces Mozy to the crowdfunding space to help people keep warm at any outdoor spectator event.

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Mozy a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Mozy, if you’re a supporter of Mozy, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

He saw parents leaving the sidelines early to hop in their cars and warm up.   As an entrepreneur with over 50 patents and masters degrees in engineering and business, Charles knew he could do something about this. Using his background in thermodynamics and heat transfer, he started brainstorming better solutions to keep warm. He knew that his exposed lower body comprised close to 45% of his body’s surface area and began designing. Soon, the first version of Mozy was born. After more than 30 engineered and tested iterations, he introduces Mozy to the crowdfunding space to help people keep warm at any outdoor spectator event.  We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Mozy a reality. We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Mozy, if you’re a supporter of Mozy, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
We are here to finally add some style to the sport of bowling.   In every Sport there is the ability to color coordinate your uniforms, well today we are giving you bowlers that ability as well.    We are 2 average bowlers who have children who bowl on various sport teams and that is how and why we came up with the idea of adding a more modern High Top shoe to the sport of bowling while giving teams the ability to color coordinate their uniform.        We will initially have 4-5 color patterns available and we will post those colors once they are complete.  

The 50's are over and those old style shoes are now a thing of the past.  We are hear to offer you a more modern look while also providing great ankle support for those who really crank that ball.

Our biggest challenge since the start of this project is finding someone to do the SOLE of the shoe.   We know the importance of the sole and the slide and this was a HUGE road block for us.    Many factories loved our idea and many of those same factories wanted to put a HOUSE SHOE bottom on our shoe and we REFUSED and will never have such a bottom.     The good news is we found the right factory and the right bottom for our shoe.   In fact we are now using the same factory that is making the 3G Shoe which means we can put a high quality microfiber slide on the slide shoe and a nice rubber bottom on the nonslide.   Upon a successful launch we will expand and introduce the interchangeable bottoms on this same shoe. (2018 Production run).   

 

We would like to come out the gate with a pretty decent high quality shoe with a very nice high performing sole system while offering this new show under $100 retail.     In fact we expect retail to be $89.99.

story:
Press Kit

Featured on

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 In the first video, you will see we separate water with Ultra Suit fabric, on one side the fabric is holding up water over 6cm and on the other side it's dry, we then pump air from the dry end through the fabric and you will see bubbles coming through the fabric into the water. This simple experiment shows how breathable the suit is while stopping the water penetrating through fabric.

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

Ethically produced from recycled plastic bottles and coffee grounds, our suit is designed to adapt to the modern man’s active lifestyle. We offer two different styles, the Modern and Classic look.
story_txt: Press KitFeatured on   Anti-stain: red wine, orange juice, ketchup or anything NO PROBLEM! Rainproof and Waterproof   100% Breathable and Waterproof In the first video, you will see we separate water with Ultra Suit fabric, on one side the fabric is holding up water over 6cm and on the other side it's dry, we then pump air from the dry end through the fabric and you will see bubbles coming through the fabric into the water. This simple experiment shows how breathable the suit is while stopping the water penetrating through fabric.Anti-odour and Ultra-stretch Ultra-stretch with superb expansion in all directions!   Ultra-stretch in all directions!       Classic Look Modern LookEthically produced from recycled plastic bottles and coffee grounds, our suit is designed to adapt to the modern man’s active lifestyle. We offer two different styles, the Modern and Classic look.   These suits are made from recycled plastic bottles and wasted coffee grounds. Can you believe it?

story:
The Revolution Diver is an elegant and "tough-as-nails" dive watch that can seamlessly follow you from the beach to the boardroom. It's retro design is an homage to the bold dive watches of the 1960's. It's domed sapphire crystal, black dial, raised indices, and C3 Super Luminova make the Diver extremely easy to read, whether you are out to dinner or in the deep sea. The case is milled from a single piece of 316 stainless steel. It has been tested and certified to be water resistant up to 1000 feet. Put simply, the Revolution Diver is made from exceptional parts, has an exceptional look and is available at an exceptional price. 

 

Launching on Indiegogo allows us to sell straight to you and eliminates the markups of dealers and retailers. That's why here and now is the best opportunity to get a world class Dive Watch at a fraction of its true value! 

 

Inspired by the quality and passion put into some of the world’s best watches, we set out to create a watch that didn’t break the bank, yet, would last several lifetimes. We wanted to create something that was not built from “off the shelf” parts catalogs like many others. So, we designed, tooled and manufactured every single part from scratch, except for the precision automatic movement.

 

We have some exciting news! The Revolution Diver Referral program is here! This is your chance to earn some awesome accessories to go with your Revolution Diver. It's really easy. All you need to do is share our campaign.  Indiegogo will keep track of how many new backers you send our way. This is where the awards come in. Bring us just one backer and we will send you a luxury leather watch roll and a spring bar adjustment tool. Bring us two backers and we will throw in a gorgeous, glass topped, wooden display box. But bring us three backers and you get the whole enchilada! That's right, everyone who sends us just three new backers will get every single perk we are offering in this campaign! This includes all of the features of the Signature Edition Diver, all three straps, the Revolution Watch Company pen, and collectors edition Beach Boys Album. That's more than $600 work of additional perks! 

Participation in the referral program is easy. No registration or confusing instructions required. All you have to do is use the campaign social share buttons at the top of this page while you are signed in to your Indiegogo account (see below). For best results use every share option that applies to you as many times as you can while the campaign is active. And stay tuned, we have a special prize in store for the individual who brings us the most referrals! 

 

Case

  • 316 Stainless Steel. 41mm in diameter, 14 mm tall, lug width of 20mm
  • Screwed in back and double O Ring crown gaskets for ultimate water resistance under adverse conditions. Water resistant to 300 Meters

Crown

  • Screwed down and signed

Bracelet

  • 316L stainless steel Shark Mesh style bracelet with screwed links and signed diver’s clasp with safety, or, custom made rubber strap with signed buckle

Movement

  • Citizen/Miyota 9015 automatic / mechanical. 28,800 beats per hour. 42 Hours Power Reserve

Dial

  • C3 Super Lumi-Nova applied to minute, hour, second hand and indices, providing maximum legibility in less than ideal lighting conditions.
  • Date indicator located at 4:30

Crystal

  • Domed sapphire crystal
  • anti-reflective coating on the inside

Bezel

  • 120 click ratcheted bezel
  • Anodized aluminum insert
  • Luminous pip at 12

 

 

Note: Revolution Watch Company is not affiliated with Revolution Media Pte Ltd (Revolution Watch Magazine).

story:
Introducing MAYKR!

My name's Kate and I have been a keen crocheter for many, many years. 

One thing I always struggled with as a 'young' crocheter who travels often, was transporting my projects, and accessories from one place to another IN STYLE. No matter how hard I looked, I just couldn't find a project bag that catered to my needs both aesthetically OR functionally. 

After scouring the internet for hours on end, I discovered there was absolutely NOTHING like this (easily and affordably) available to us Aussies!

So, I changed my Google search from 'cute bags for crocheters' to 'custom bag manufacturers', and MAYKR was born!

MAYKR bags are not only pleasing on the eye, but they are an all-in-one handbag AND project bag, that will keep your projects, hooks, accessories and every day handbag items organised. 

MAYKR bags look just like your every day handbag on the outside, so will not draw unwanted attention to your crochet. However, on the inside they are a crocheters DREAM bag. 

 

Features Include:

 

Removable Hook and Accessory Storage - Attaches to inside of bag using two press studs, so you can easily organise and access your tools. No more turning your bag inside out, or having to completely empty your bag in order to organise your tools!

 

Removable Pouch - Perfect for storing 'bits and pieces'. Perfect for those of you who make amigurumi or projects with lots of moving parts - granny squares for example.

The removable pouch also comes with a cross body strap, so you can use it on its own! Perfect if you're ducking out for lunch or dinner, and don't want to take a large bag with you.

 

Other Features Include:

- Made from a quality PU leather which means it's VEGAN friendly!

- Stylish design, complete with gold details and stitching detail down centre of bag (one side only).

- Magnetic button for bag closure.

- Soft suede like fabric lining inside of bag.

- Spacious inside, so you can carry larger (or multiple) projects.

 

Measurements:

 

Tote Bag

W 40cm H 33cm D 13cm

 

Detachable Pouch

W 31cm H 23cm D 9cm

 

Hook Storage

W 30cm H 23cm

 

Please Note: Campaign photos are of our sample bag. Final bag design may vary slightly, but rest assured it will only get BETTER!

 

What We Need To Get This Baby Off The Ground

By pledging today, you will not only make the lives of crocheters around Australia (and hopefully the world) MUCH easier, but you will be supporting an Australian owned small business and an everyday chick with a dream (that's me!).

Let's break down the costs, and where your money will be going:

  • First shipment of bags, including freight - $5,000
  • Website subscription costs for the first year - ($43 per month) $516
  • Thank you gifts - $600 approximately 
  • INDIEGOGO Fees - $500 approximately

   

       GOAL - $6,616

 

What I hope to achieve from this campaign is to get these bags 'on the shelf', and available for you to purchase! All other costs involved in starting a new business will be covered by myself, or any extra funds we're able to raise during this campaign.

 

 

Perks:

 

Perks available for purchase include:

$1  

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.

 

$25

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.
  • Crochet Pattern Bundle which includes the following patterns from some AMAZING Aussie designers:

         

        - Weeping Rainbow Blanket by Little Cosy Things

         - Starlight Dancer Blanket by Redagape

         - Bobble Wave Blanket by Stitched Up Craft

         - Play All Day Vest (Child) by Little Golden Nook

         - Dear Debbie Jumper by Nanna Kate's Crochet (that's me!)

 

$50

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.
  • Reusable MAYKR Coffee Cup

 

$80

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.
  • ONE MAYKR Tote Bag from our first shipment.

 

$150.00

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.
  • TWO MAYKR Tote Bags from our first shipment.

 

$210.00

  • Your name on our website under our list of backers.
  • THREE MAYKR Tote Bags from our first shipment.

What If We Don't Reach Our Goal?

NEVER FEAR! In the unfortunate event that we are not able to reach our goal, all funds raised will still be invested into this project, and remaining costs will be covered by me!

The reason I have decided to go down the crowd funding route is purely because it will help me get this project off the ground a whole lot sooner than if I was to fund it myself. Although I'm not relying on this campaign to bring MAYKR to life, every pledge, no matter how big or small will be a huge help in speeding up the process.

No matter the result, all perks will be delivered. Delivery time will depend on whether or not we raise enough funds to begin production straight away.

I am 100% committed to this project and no matter the result, it WILL be going ahead. It may just take a little longer if we don't reach our goal during this campaign. Rest assured MAYKR will come to life, but how quickly will depend on the success of this campaign. So be sure to tell your friends!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not ready to pledge just yet? No problem!

There are SO many other ways you can help.

Here's how:

  • Share the link to this campaign on social media
  • Word of mouth - Tell your friends!
  • Share the link to our campaign video on social media - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rZBM4sDuAFg
  • Purchase one of my crochet patterns via - https://www.ravelry.com/designers/kate-bridge
  • Purchase crochet hooks or accessories from my shop - https://www.nannakatescrochet.com/shop

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out our campaign! If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact Kate at maykr.store@gmail.com.
